original: de'i nang du 'grib dang 'phel ba dag kyang bgrod pa 'gro ba'i dbang gis rim min rim pa ste /
analyzed: de'i nang du 'grib dang 'phel ba dag kyang bgrod pa 'gro ba'i dbang gis rim min rim pa ste /
translated: In that, the wane and the increase are the order and disorder of the path of the goer.

original: 'khor lo phyed phyed dag la mtha' dag nor dang dus kyi grangs rnams te bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi grangs rnams byed pa brjod par 'dod pa la rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo phyed phyed dag la mtha' dag nor dang dus kyi grangs rnams te bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi grangs rnams byed pa brjod par 'dod pa la rig par bya'o //
translated: In half of the wheels, the total, the wealth, and the number of the time, the number of forty-eight, should be known to be the agent of the desire to speak.

original: da ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sgra gcan 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa tshigs mtshams zhes pa la sogs pa ste tshigs mtshams ni nya'i mtha' 'am gnam stong gi mthar ro //
analyzed: da ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sgra gcan 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa tshigs mtshams zhes pa la sogs pa ste tshigs mtshams ni nya'i mtha' 'am gnam stong gi mthar ro //
translated: Now, the definition of Rāhu entering the orb of the moon is stated by “junction” and so on. The junction is the end of the new moon or the end of the full moon.

original: ri bong can gyi dkyil 'khor dag la sgra gcan rab tu 'jug ste dkyil 'khor yang /
analyzed: ri bong can gyi dkyil 'khor dag la sgra gcan rab tu 'jug ste dkyil 'khor yang /
translated: Rāhu enters the orb of the moon. The orb🔽is

original: dkyil 'khor gyi sgras ni 'dir chu tshod drug cu'i bdag nyid rgyu skar gcig gi longs spyod de de yang thams cad 'dzin pa'i dbang gis khyim bcu gnyis kyi bdag nyid dang cha bcu drug gi bdag nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi sgras ni 'dir chu tshod drug cu'i bdag nyid rgyu skar gcig gi longs spyod de de yang thams cad 'dzin pa'i dbang gis khyim bcu gnyis kyi bdag nyid dang cha bcu drug gi bdag nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: The term “circle” here refers to the enjoyment of one lunar mansion, which has a duration of sixty time-units. Moreover, it should be understood that, due to the influence of the “holder of all,” it has the nature of twelve houses and the nature of sixteen parts.

original: rnam dag gyur na thams cad 'dzin to gal te sgra gcan gyi longs spyod kyis zla ba'i longs spyod yongs su dag na de'i tshe chu tshod drug cu'i mthar thug par thams cad 'dzin no //
analyzed: rnam dag gyur na thams cad 'dzin to gal te sgra gcan gyi longs spyod kyis zla ba'i longs spyod yongs su dag na de'i tshe chu tshod drug cu'i mthar thug par thams cad 'dzin no //
translated: If the enjoyment of Rāhu completely purifies the enjoyment of the moon, then at that time, it holds all, up to the end of sixty time-units.

original: longs spyod phyed dag par gyur na phyed 'dzin no //
analyzed: longs spyod phyed dag par gyur na phyed 'dzin no //
translated: If half of the enjoyment is purified, then half is held.

original: ri bong can gyi rgyu ba'i dbang gis dkyil 'khor chu tshod drug cu ste zla ba'i cha bcu drug gi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: ri bong can gyi rgyu ba'i dbang gis dkyil 'khor chu tshod drug cu ste zla ba'i cha bcu drug gi bdag nyid do //
translated: Due to the influence of the movement of the moon, there are sixty time-units, which have the nature of the moon’s sixteen parts.

original: de bzhin du ri bong can gyis rgyu ba'i dbang gi chu tshod dag ni ji snyed yod pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du ri bong can gyis rgyu ba'i dbang gi chu tshod dag ni ji snyed yod pa ste /
translated: In the same way, there are as many time-units as there are movements of the moon.

original: sgra gcan gyi longs spyod la rab tu zhugs pa de snyed ni cha gcig gi bzhi cha'i bar du gza' dang 'grogs par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sgra gcan gyi longs spyod la rab tu zhugs pa de snyed ni cha gcig gi bzhi cha'i bar du gza' dang 'grogs par shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know that the enjoyments of Rāhu, up to one-fourth of the part, are associated with the planets.

original: sgra gcan 'khor ba la sogs pa 'di dag grub pa'i mtha' las phyi rol shes pa'i don du rgya cher rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sgra gcan 'khor ba la sogs pa 'di dag grub pa'i mtha' las phyi rol shes pa'i don du rgya cher rig par bya'o //
translated: These Rāhu, Saṃskṛta, and so forth, should be known extensively from the scriptures.

original: rgyud 'dir ni bsdus pa'i slad du 'jam dpal gyis gsal por @202b ma bstan te 'dir ni gang zhig nang la nye bar mkho ba de nyid mdor bsdus pas brjod do //
analyzed: rgyud 'dir ni bsdus pa'i slad du 'jam dpal gyis gsal por @202b ma bstan te 'dir ni gang zhig nang la nye bar mkho ba de nyid mdor bsdus pas brjod do //
translated: In this Tantra, they are not clearly taught by Mañjuśrī because of their brevity. Here, whatever is necessary for the inner is stated concisely.

original: de bzhin du gza' 'thab pa la sogs pa mtha' dag grub pa'i mtha' las shes par bya ste rgyud 'dir ni skar rtsis kyi yul gza' 'thab pa la sogs pa grub pa'i mtha' la ltos so //
analyzed: de bzhin du gza' 'thab pa la sogs pa mtha' dag grub pa'i mtha' las shes par bya ste rgyud 'dir ni skar rtsis kyi yul gza' 'thab pa la sogs pa grub pa'i mtha' la ltos so //
translated: Similarly, all the planetary conflicts and so forth should be known from the scriptures. In this Tantra, the field of astrology, such as planetary conflicts, depends on the scriptures.

original: nang du ni gza' 'thab par brjod par 'dod pa med do zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa ste phyi rol du zla ba 'dzin pa byung bar gyur pa na nang du sems can rnams kyi khu ba 'dzin par 'gyur ba ma yin zhing nyi ma 'dzin
analyzed: nang du ni gza' 'thab par brjod par 'dod pa med do zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa ste phyi rol du zla ba 'dzin pa byung bar gyur pa na nang du sems can rnams kyi khu ba 'dzin par 'gyur ba ma yin zhing nyi ma 'dzin
translated: This is the ascertainment of the Bhagavān. When there is an external lunar eclipse, internally there is no holding of the semen of sentient beings, and when there is a solar eclipse, there is no holding of the blood.

original: par rdul 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i nges pa yang thams cad du med do //
analyzed: par rdul 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i nges pa yang thams cad du med do //
translated: There is no ascertainment that the holding of the sun is the holding of the blood.

original: de'i phyir sangs rgyas pa rnams kyis phyi rol yongs su shes pa'i don du tshangs pa dang nyi ma dang gcer bu pa dang skra can gyi grub pa'i mtha' rnams shes par bya'o zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir sangs rgyas pa rnams kyis phyi rol yongs su shes pa'i don du tshangs pa dang nyi ma dang gcer bu pa dang skra can gyi grub pa'i mtha' rnams shes par bya'o zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
translated: Therefore, in order to understand the external, the tenets of Brahmā, the Sun, the Nirgranthas, and the Jaiminīyas should be understood by Buddhists. This is the ascertainment of the Bhagavān.

original: da ni gza' thams cad kyi rgyu ba dus bzhi'i mthar stong pa la 'jug pa gsungs pa ;
analyzed: da ni gza' thams cad kyi rgyu ba dus bzhi'i mthar stong pa la 'jug pa gsungs pa ;
translated: Now, it is said that the movements of all the planets enter emptiness at the end of the four yugas:

original: mi rnams kyi ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: mi rnams kyi ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: With respect to humans, etc.

original: mi rnams kyi lo brgya gang yin pa de dag gza' rnams dag gi lo'i longs spyod kyis ni bsgyur bar bya zhes pa ni dus kyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa'i gza' rnams kyis nyin zhag phyed dang gnyis kyis lo brgya longs spyod do //🔽nyin zhag gsum gyis nyis brgya'o //
analyzed: mi rnams kyi lo brgya gang yin pa de dag gza' rnams dag gi lo'i longs spyod kyis ni bsgyur bar bya zhes pa ni dus kyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa'i gza' rnams kyis nyin zhag phyed dang gnyis kyis lo brgya longs spyod do // nyin zhag gsum gyis nyis brgya'o //
translated: One hundred human years is one day and night for the gods of the Four Great Kings.🔽One hundred of their years is one day and night for the gods of the Thirty-three.🔽One hundred of their years is one day and night for the Yāma gods.

original: nyin zhag sum cus stong phrag gnyis so //
analyzed: nyin zhag sum cus stong phrag gnyis so //
translated: One hundred of their years is one day and night for the Tuṣita gods.🔽One hundred of their years is one day and night for the Nirmāṇarati gods.🔽One hundred of their years is one day and night for the Paranirmitavaśavartin gods.🔽One hundred of their years is one day and night for the gods of the Brahma realm.🔽One hundred of their years is one day and night for the gods of the second concentration.🔽One hundred of their years is one day and night for the gods of the third concentration.🔽One hundred of their years is one day and night for the gods of the fourth concentration.🔽One hundred of their years is one day and night for the Ābhāsvara gods.🔽One hundred of their years is one day and night for the Śubhakṛtsna gods.

original: nyin zhag sum brgya drug cus lo stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhis longs spyod par 'gyur te des lo brgya bsgyur ba'o //🔽gnas gnyis phyogs kyi chas thob bcu'i chas thob pa steng gi phung po dag la bu lon sbyang bar bya bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: nyin zhag sum brgya drug cus lo stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhis longs spyod par 'gyur te des lo brgya bsgyur ba'o // gnas gnyis phyogs kyi chas thob bcu'i chas thob pa steng gi phung po dag la bu lon sbyang bar bya bar 'gyur te /
translated: One hundred of their years is one day and night for the Bṛhatphala gods.🔽One hundred of their years is one day and night for the Avṛha gods.🔽One hundred of their years is one day and night for the Atapa gods.🔽One hundred of their years is one day and night for the Sudarśana gods.🔽One hundred of their years is one day and night for the Akaniṣṭha gods.

original: lhag ma 'bum phrag nyi shu gcig dang zhes pa ni 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang khri phrag drug gi lo grangs gang dag rnams ni dus kyi phyed la 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lhag ma 'bum phrag nyi shu gcig dang zhes pa ni 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang khri phrag drug gi lo grangs gang dag rnams ni dus kyi phyed la 'gyur ro //
translated: One hundred of their years is one day and night for the Ākāśānantyāyatana gods.🔽One hundred of their years is one day and night for the Vijñānānantyāyatana gods.🔽One hundred of their years is one day and night for the Ākiñcanyāyatana gods.🔽One hundred of their years is one day and night for the Naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatana gods.🔽One hundred of their years is one day and night for the gods of the first concentration.🔽One hundred of their years is one day and night for the gods of the second concentration.🔽One hundred of their years is one day and night for the gods of the third concentration.🔽One hundred of their years is one day and night for the gods of the fourth concentration.🔽One hundred of their years is one day and

original: dus kyi phyed kyi mtha' la rkang pa lnga ste rdzogs ldan gyi rkang pa bzhi dang gsum ldan gyi rkang pa gcig go //
analyzed: dus kyi phyed kyi mtha' la rkang pa lnga ste rdzogs ldan gyi rkang pa bzhi dang gsum ldan gyi rkang pa gcig go //
translated: The half of the time has five parts, that is, four parts of the Satya Yuga and one part of the Treta Yuga.

original: dus kyi phyed ni nam mkha' dang rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid de rim pa bzhin du gtso bo'i rtsa g-yon pa la srog yang dag par rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: dus kyi phyed ni nam mkha' dang rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid de rim pa bzhin du gtso bo'i rtsa g-yon pa la srog yang dag par rgyu ba'o //
translated: The half of the time is the nature of the spheres of space, wind, fire, water, and earth, respectively, the life force moving correctly through the principal channel on the left.

original: slar yang phung po gnyis kyis zhes pa slar yang gnyis pa'i phung po rkang pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyis te de la gsum ldan gyi rkang pa gnyis dang / @203a * //
analyzed: slar yang phung po gnyis kyis zhes pa slar yang gnyis pa'i phung po rkang pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyis te de la gsum ldan gyi rkang pa gnyis dang / @203a * //
translated: Again, by two aggregates, again by the two aggregates of five parts, there are two parts of the Treta Yuga,

original: gnyis ldan gyi rkang pa gnyis dang / rtsod ldan gyi rkang pa gcig ste /
analyzed: gnyis ldan gyi rkang pa gnyis dang / rtsod ldan gyi rkang pa gcig ste /
translated: two parts of the Dvapara Yuga, and one part of the Kali Yuga.

original: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang stong pa'i bdag nyid ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin du gtso bo'i rtsa g-yas pa nas srog yang dag par rgyu ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang stong pa'i bdag nyid ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin du gtso bo'i rtsa g-yas pa nas srog yang dag par rgyu ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The nature of earth, water, fire, wind, and space is the nature of the five spheres, respectively, the life force moving correctly through the principal channel on the right.

original: de ltar na rtsa gnyis ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi lo'i phung po gnyis kyis dus bzhi po rnams kyi lo yi grangs te mi rnams kyi lo khri phrag gnyis lhag pa'i 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gsum ste /
analyzed: de ltar na rtsa gnyis ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi lo'i phung po gnyis kyis dus bzhi po rnams kyi lo yi grangs te mi rnams kyi lo khri phrag gnyis lhag pa'i 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gsum ste /
translated: Thus, the two sets of years of the mandalas of the two nāḍīs are the number of years of the four ages.

original: gtso bo'i dus sbyor gnyis g-yon dang g-yas kyi rtsa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par rgyu ba las so //
analyzed: gtso bo'i dus sbyor gnyis g-yon dang g-yas kyi rtsa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par rgyu ba las so //
translated: The two principal ayanas move through the mandalas of the right and left nāḍīs.🔽Here the measure of each age is “the empty, the empty, the sky, the nāga, the hand, the sage, and the rabbit,” which is the measure of the age of the Satya Yuga, 170,000 years, plus 28,000 years.

original: 'dir dus so so rnams kyi tshad ni stong pa stong pa nam mkha' klu dang lag pa thub pa ri bong can rnams zhes pa ni lo stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad lhag pa'i 'bum phrag bcu bdun rdzogs ldan dus kyi tshad de dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rkang pa🔽nye bar longs spyod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir dus so so rnams kyi tshad ni stong pa stong pa nam mkha' klu dang lag pa thub pa ri bong can rnams zhes pa ni lo stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad lhag pa'i 'bum phrag bcu bdun rdzogs ldan dus kyi tshad de dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rkang pa🔽nye bar longs spyod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The four ages are the four feet of the mandala.

original: gsum ldan la ni nam mkha' mkha' stong ro dang dgu dang nyin phyed ces pa stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug lhan pa'i 'bum phrag bcu gnyis kyi lo yi grangs su rab tu grags so //
analyzed: gsum ldan la ni nam mkha' mkha' stong ro dang dgu dang nyin phyed ces pa stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug lhan pa'i 'bum phrag bcu gnyis kyi lo yi grangs su rab tu grags so //
translated: For the three-fold, it is well known that the years are the number of 120,000,000, namely, 96,000, of the following: space, empty space, taste, and the sky, half a day.

original: stong pa stong pa mkha' dang rig byed ro dang lag 'gro zhes pa ni stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi lhag pa'i 'bum phrag brgyad de gnyis ldan lor ni yang dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong pa stong pa mkha' dang rig byed ro dang lag 'gro zhes pa ni stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi lhag pa'i 'bum phrag brgyad de gnyis ldan lor ni yang dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: For the two-fold, the years are 800,000, namely, 64,000, of the following: empty, empty, space, and the Vedas, taste, and the planets.

original: stong pa nam mkha' mkha' mig yon tan chu gter rnams zhes pa ni stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis lhag pa'i 'bum phrag bzhi rnams kyi lo'i grangs ni rtsod pa'i dus la 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong pa nam mkha' mkha' mig yon tan chu gter rnams zhes pa ni stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis lhag pa'i 'bum phrag bzhi rnams kyi lo'i grangs ni rtsod pa'i dus la 'gyur ro //
translated: For the age of conflict, the years are 400,000, namely, 32,000, of the following: empty, space, space, eye, quality, and ocean.

original: de ltar na gsum ldan gyi rkang pa gsum dang / gnyis ldan gyi gnyis dang / rtsod ldan gyi rkang pa gcig go //
analyzed: de ltar na gsum ldan gyi rkang pa gsum dang / gnyis ldan gyi gnyis dang / rtsod ldan gyi rkang pa gcig go //
translated: Thus, there are three verses for the three-fold, two for the two-fold, and one verse for the age of conflict.

original: dkyil 'khor gsum dang / gnyis dang gcig gi bdag nyid de dkyil 'khor so so ni rtsod ldan gyi dus kyi lo'i tshad do //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gsum dang / gnyis dang gcig gi bdag nyid de dkyil 'khor so so ni rtsod ldan gyi dus kyi lo'i tshad do //
translated: The three mandalas, two mandalas, and one mandala are the measure of years in the age of discord.🔽At the end of time, the planets move through the empty houses.

original: lo ni 'di dag rnams kyis dus kyi mtha' ru gza' tshogs rgyu ba khyim ni stong pa dag la gnas zhes pa la lo ni sngar brjod pa 'di dag rnams kyis dus kyi mtha' ru ste dus bzhi'i mthar gza' tshogs rgyu ba nam gru'i mthar khyim ni stong🔽pa dag la gnas so //
analyzed: lo ni 'di dag rnams kyis dus kyi mtha' ru gza' tshogs rgyu ba khyim ni stong pa dag la gnas zhes pa la lo ni sngar brjod pa 'di dag rnams kyis dus kyi mtha' ru ste dus bzhi'i mthar gza' tshogs rgyu ba nam gru'i mthar khyim ni stong pa dag la gnas so //
translated: At the end of time, at the end of the four ages, the planets move through the empty houses, the end of the zodiac.

original: slar yang tha skar la sogs pa'i rgyu skar dag gza' rnams kyi longs spyod du 'gyur ro //🔽rab byung zhes par 'gyur ba ji lta ba de bzhin du nag pa'i zla ba la sogs par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: slar yang tha skar la sogs pa'i rgyu skar dag gza' rnams kyi longs spyod du 'gyur ro // rab byung zhes par 'gyur ba ji lta ba de bzhin du nag pa'i zla ba la sogs par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Again, the lunar mansions beginning with Āśleṣā are enjoyed by the planets.🔽Just as the lunar mansions beginning with Āśleṣā are enjoyed by the planets, the months beginning with Kārtika are enjoyed by the planets.

original: gza' dang sbyor @203b ba tshes dang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin dang po dag ste de'i dus su ni /
analyzed: gza' dang sbyor @203b ba tshes dang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin dang po dag ste de'i dus su ni /
translated: The conjunctions, lunar days, and activities are also like that.

original: gza' nyi ma dang / sbyor ba sel ba dang / tshes dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig dang / byed pa pa bam zhes pa dang po dag ste de'i dus su lha rnams dag dang lha min kla klo rnams kyi 'khrug pa drag po sa gzhi'i gnas p'a ga d'a rnams su 'byung bar 'gyur te de nas rdzogs ldan gyi dus 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gza' nyi ma dang / sbyor ba sel ba dang / tshes dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig dang / byed pa pa bam zhes pa dang po dag ste de'i dus su lha rnams dag dang lha min kla klo rnams kyi 'khrug pa drag po sa gzhi'i gnas p'a ga d'a rnams su 'byung bar 'gyur te de nas rdzogs ldan gyi dus 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: On Sunday, Tuesday, the first day of the bright fortnight, and the first day of the first part of the first month, the gods and the asuras fight fiercely on the ground of the world. Then the age of completeness begins.

original: da ni  tshes la sogs pa gza'i longs spyod thams cad stong pa la gnas pa ni slar yang nges pa 'byung bar gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni  tshes la sogs pa gza'i longs spyod thams cad stong pa la gnas pa ni slar yang nges pa 'byung bar gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the enjoyment of the planets, such as the lunar mansions, which are based on the empty [space], is again said to arise with certainty.

original: de nas rgyu skar rnams kyis nyin zhag gcig ni bsgyur bar 'gyur te chu tshod drug cu rnams kyis kyang /
analyzed: de nas rgyu skar rnams kyis nyin zhag gcig ni bsgyur bar 'gyur te chu tshod drug cu rnams kyis kyang /
translated: Then, the lunar mansions change in one day, and also with sixty muhūrtas,

original: gza' rnams kyi ni dkyil 'khor dag gis nges par cha ni rab tu thob par gyur pa longs spyod 'gyur /
analyzed: gza' rnams kyi ni dkyil 'khor dag gis nges par cha ni rab tu thob par gyur pa longs spyod 'gyur /
translated: the planets' maṇḍalas certainly obtain their parts and enjoy them.

original: zla ba rdzogs na nges par 'gyur te slar yang gza' dang chu tshod kyi ni gnas rnams dag tu 'gyur /
analyzed: zla ba rdzogs na nges par 'gyur te slar yang gza' dang chu tshod kyi ni gnas rnams dag tu 'gyur /
translated: When the month is completed, it is certain, and again the places of the planets and the hours will occur.

original: rgyu skar la ni nyi ma'i longs spyod du 'gyur zla ba gcig las sbyangs pa nyin zhag dag ni tshogs zhes so //
analyzed: rgyu skar la ni nyi ma'i longs spyod du 'gyur zla ba gcig las sbyangs pa nyin zhag dag ni tshogs zhes so //
translated: The lunar mansions are the enjoyment of the sun. The purification of one month is the collection of days.

original: da ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i lo dang phyogs las zla ba'i nges pa gsungs pa sde pa drug ni nyi ma'i dbyangs bcas zhes pa la sde pa drug ni ka tsa ta pa ta sa rnams ni gsal byed kyi yi ge sum cu'o //
analyzed: da ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i lo dang phyogs las zla ba'i nges pa gsungs pa sde pa drug ni nyi ma'i dbyangs bcas zhes pa la sde pa drug ni ka tsa ta pa ta sa rnams ni gsal byed kyi yi ge sum cu'o //
translated: Now, the determination of the month from the year and direction of the wheel of time is stated. The six classes are the vowels with the sun, that is, the six classes ka, ca, ṭa, ta, pa, and sa are the thirty consonants.

original: dbyangs bcu gnyis dang bcas pas sum brgya drug cur 'gyur te yi ge rnams thung ngu dang ring po'i dbyangs kyis phye bas so //
analyzed: dbyangs bcu gnyis dang bcas pas sum brgya drug cur 'gyur te yi ge rnams thung ngu dang ring po'i dbyangs kyis phye bas so //
translated: With the twelve vowels, they become three hundred and sixty, because the letters are distinguished by short and long vowels.🔽a ā🔽i ī🔽u ū

original: aa a'a / ai a'i /🔽ri r'i / au a'u /
analyzed: aa a'a / ai a'i / ri r'i / au a'u /
translated: ṛ ṝ🔽 Translation: When the month is completed, it is certain, and again the places of the planets and the hours will occur.

original: li l'i / aom aa:/
analyzed: li l'i / aom aa:/
translated: The lunar mansions are the enjoyment of the sun. The purification of one month is the collection of days.🔽Now, the determination of the month from the year and direction of the wheel of time is stated. The six classes are the vowels with the sun, that is, the six classes ka, ca, ṭa, ta, pa, and sa are the thirty consonants.🔽With the twelve vowels, they become three hundred and sixty, because the letters are distinguished by short and long vowels.

original: 'di dag gis ka yig la sogs pa'i yi ge so so la bcu gnyis kyi dbye bas tha dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di dag gis ka yig la sogs pa'i yi ge so so la bcu gnyis kyi dbye bas tha dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: a ā🔽i ī🔽u ū🔽ṛ ṝ

original: des na gsal byed sum cu po rnams bcu gnyis kyi dbye bas tha dad pa dag ni sum brgya drug cu ste /
analyzed: des na gsal byed sum cu po rnams bcu gnyis kyi dbye bas tha dad pa dag ni sum brgya drug cu ste /
translated: Therefore, the thirty consonants are differentiated by the twelve vowels, making three hundred and sixty.

original: slar yang ka yig la sogs pa de dag yon tan gzhan gyis phye ba dang / ya nar bsgyur bas phye ba dag ste nges par yon tan gyis bsgyur /
analyzed: slar yang ka yig la sogs pa de dag yon tan gzhan gyis phye ba dang / ya nar bsgyur bas phye ba dag ste nges par yon tan gyis bsgyur /
translated: Again, those consonants such as ka are differentiated by other qualities and by the yaṇ vowels, definitely transformed by the qualities.

original: yon tan ni aa ae aar ao aal aom /
analyzed: yon tan ni aa ae aar ao aal aom /
translated: The qualities are a, ai, ar, au, al, am.

original: 'phel ba ni a'a aee a'ar aoo aal a'a:/🔽ya na ra bsgyur ba ni ha h'a ya y'a ra r'a wa w'a la l'a ham h'a:/
analyzed: 'phel ba ni a'a aee a'ar aoo aal a'a:/ ya na ra bsgyur ba ni ha h'a ya y'a ra r'a wa w'a la l'a ham h'a:/
translated: The increase is ā, ai, ā, au, ā, āḥ.

original: zhes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ste /
translated: The yaṇ vowel transformation is ha, ha, ya, ya, ra, ra, wa, wa, la, la, haṃ, haḥ.

original: de ltar na lo gsum nyi ma dag la ste ka yig la sogs pa de rnams nyin zhag stong brgyad cur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na lo gsum nyi ma dag la ste ka yig la sogs pa de rnams nyin zhag stong brgyad cur 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, those consonants such as ka are one thousand eight hundred days and nights.🔽The short vowels such as a are fifteen days and nights.

original: aa sogs thung ngu nyin zhag ces bya bcva lnga ste sum 'gyur ri bong can cha thung ngu dang ring po dang shin tu ring po'i dbye bas phyed bcas zla ba @204a * //
analyzed: aa sogs thung ngu nyin zhag ces bya bcva lnga ste sum 'gyur ri bong can cha thung ngu dang ring po dang shin tu ring po'i dbye bas phyed bcas zla ba @204a * //
translated: The three hundred and sixty days and nights are divided into short, medium, and long phases by the waxing and waning moon.

original: phyogs gsum du zla ba la 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyogs gsum du zla ba la 'gyur ro //
translated: The three phases of the moon are the waxing moon, full moon, and waning moon.

original: de la aa ai ri au li /
analyzed: de la aa ai ri au li /
translated: The waxing moon is a, i, r, u, l.

original: aa ae aar ao aal /🔽ha ya ra wa la /
analyzed: aa ae aar ao aal / ha ya ra wa la /
translated: A, A, A, A, A, A, A, A.

original: l'a w'a r'a y'a h'a /🔽a'a la aoo a'ar aee a'a /
analyzed: l'a w'a r'a y'a h'a / a'a la aoo a'ar aee a'a /
translated: H, Y, R, V, L.🔽L, V, R, Y, H.🔽A, L, O, R, E, A.

original: l'i a'u r'i a'i a'a /🔽aom a'im r'im a'um l'im /
analyzed: l'i a'u r'i a'i a'a / aom a'im r'im a'um l'im /
translated: L, I, U, R, I, A.🔽O, I, R, I, U, L.

original: a'am aeem a'a ram aoom a'a lam /
analyzed: a'am aeem a'a ram aoom a'a lam /
translated: A, E, A, R, O, O, A, L.

original: h'am y'am r'am w'am l'am zhes pa ni phyogs gsum gyi dbyangs so ;
analyzed: h'am y'am r'am w'am l'am zhes pa ni phyogs gsum gyi dbyangs so ;
translated: H, Y, R, V, L, are the vowels of the three directions.

original: / chu tshod ha sogs rnams su 'gyur te dus sbyor bcu gnyis kyi dbye bas drug cu'i grangs so //
analyzed: / chu tshod ha sogs rnams su 'gyur te dus sbyor bcu gnyis kyi dbye bas drug cu'i grangs so //
translated: The hours are H and so forth, which are the sixty numbers by the division of the twelve houses.

original: sngar brjod pa'i cho gas nyi ma phyed nas mtshan phyed kyi bar du thung ngu rnams so //
analyzed: sngar brjod pa'i cho gas nyi ma phyed nas mtshan phyed kyi bar du thung ngu rnams so //
translated: By the procedure described above, the short vowels are from noon to midnight.

original: mtshan phyed nas nyi ma phyed kyi bar du ring po sum cu'o //
analyzed: mtshan phyed nas nyi ma phyed kyi bar du ring po sum cu'o //
translated: The long vowels are from midnight to noon.

original: dpal ldan stong pa gzhom med la sogs lnga po gang yin pa de dag snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa'i dbye bas sad pa dang rmi lam dang shin tu gnyid log pa'i rang bzhin gyis de dag ni sgra gcan te srog gi rlung gi dus sbyor gsum
analyzed: dpal ldan stong pa gzhom med la sogs lnga po gang yin pa de dag snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa'i dbye bas sad pa dang rmi lam dang shin tu gnyid log pa'i rang bzhin gyis de dag ni sgra gcan te srog gi rlung gi dus sbyor gsum
translated: The five glorious empty ones, the invincible ones, and so forth, by the division of sattva, rajas, and tamas, have the nature of the waking, dream, and deep sleep states. They are Rāhu, the time of the life-force wind, the three houses.

original: du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
translated: This is the rule.

original: 'byung ba nyi ma zla ba'i grangs ni slar yang lo gsum dang phyogs sum gyi nyin zhag ste nyi shu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i brgya phrag bcu gcig tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'byung ba nyi ma zla ba'i grangs ni slar yang lo gsum dang phyogs sum gyi nyin zhag ste nyi shu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i brgya phrag bcu gcig tu 'gyur ro //
translated: The number of the sun and moon is the number of days in three years and three half-months, which is eleven hundred and twenty-five.

original: kye mi'i bdag po zhes pa ste phyed bcas zla ba zhes pa ni phyogs gsum mo //
analyzed: kye mi'i bdag po zhes pa ste phyed bcas zla ba zhes pa ni phyogs gsum mo //
translated: O lord of men, half-month is three half-months.

original: phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba dor nas zhes pa ni de las phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba dor bas gzhan ni stong brgyad cur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba dor nas zhes pa ni de las phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba dor bas gzhan ni stong brgyad cur 'gyur ro //
translated: Having subtracted the half-month, the remaining eight hundred and seventy-five days are the other.

original: de nas lhag ma thub mchog bdun rnams kyis bcad pa'i thob pa dag ni bsdus pa'i dus kyi 'khor lor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas lhag ma thub mchog bdun rnams kyis bcad pa'i thob pa dag ni bsdus pa'i dus kyi 'khor lor 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, the remaining seven sages' portions are the obtained moments that become the condensed wheel of time.

original: de nyid zla ba'i nges pa la gza' gcig dang / chu tshong sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / tshogs gnyis rab tu bsres nas tshes gcig dang rgyu ba'i rkang pa lnga'o //
analyzed: de nyid zla ba'i nges pa la gza' gcig dang / chu tshong sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / tshogs gnyis rab tu bsres nas tshes gcig dang rgyu ba'i rkang pa lnga'o //
translated: In that very lunar rule, one planet, thirty-two ghatis, and two accumulations are thoroughly mixed, and the first lunar day and five moving feet.

original: 'khor lo dag las rnam par phye ba dag ni gzar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khor lo dag las rnam par phye ba dag ni gzar 'gyur ro //
translated: The sixtieth part of the zodiacal signs is the sign.

original: lha mo drug cu rnams kyis te chu tshod drug cu rnams kyis so zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: lha mo drug cu rnams kyis te chu tshod drug cu rnams kyis so zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The sixty signs are the sixty goddesses.🔽The thirty-two signs are the thirty-two goddesses.🔽The thirty-two signs are the thirty-two goddesses.🔽The thirty-two signs are the thirty-two goddesses.🔽The thirty-two signs are the thirty-two goddesses.

original: lha mo sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi chu tshod rnams kyis zla ba'i nges pa la chu tshod kyi gnas su sum cu rtsa gnyis so //🔽thub pa nor gyis bsgyur ba lnga bcu rtsa drug gi lha mo rnams kyis tshogs kyi gnas su tshogs gnyis su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lha mo sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi chu tshod rnams kyis zla ba'i nges pa la chu tshod kyi gnas su sum cu rtsa gnyis so // thub pa nor gyis bsgyur ba lnga bcu rtsa drug gi lha mo rnams kyis tshogs kyi gnas su tshogs gnyis su 'gyur ro //
translated: The thirty-two signs are the thirty-two goddesses.🔽The thirty-two signs are the thirty-two goddesses.

original: sbyin dor sbyin pa dag ni lha mo gcig tu 'gyur zhing rkang pa lnga ni lha mo lngar 'gyur te lnga po gcig dang bcas pa'i drug gis so //
analyzed: sbyin dor sbyin pa dag ni lha mo gcig tu 'gyur zhing rkang pa lnga ni lha mo lngar 'gyur te lnga po gcig dang bcas pa'i drug gis so //

analyzed: zla ba'i phyogs gsum nyin zhag rnams ni nyin zhag bzhi bcu rtsa lnga @204b ste sum 'gyur snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa'i bdag nyid dag kyang nyi ma'i longs spyod la ni rab tu grags so //
translated: The thirty-two signs are the thirty-two goddesses.🔽The thirty-two signs are the thirty

original: drug cus phye ba'i skar ma gnyis dang zhes pa chu tshod brgya nyi shus rgyu skar gyi nges pa la gnyis su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: drug cus phye ba'i skar ma gnyis dang zhes pa chu tshod brgya nyi shus rgyu skar gyi nges pa la gnyis su 'gyur ro //
translated: The two stars divided by sixty are the two certainties of the lunar mansion by one hundred and twenty hours.

original: nyi ma'i nyin zhag dang po la bzhis bsgyur ba'i chu tshod bzhi la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i dbang phyug chu tshod de chu tshod bcu gcig chu tshod kyi gnas su 'gyur ro zhes pa ni thams cad du nges pa'o //
analyzed: nyi ma'i nyin zhag dang po la bzhis bsgyur ba'i chu tshod bzhi la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i dbang phyug chu tshod de chu tshod bcu gcig chu tshod kyi gnas su 'gyur ro zhes pa ni thams cad du nges pa'o //
translated: On the first day of the sun, the four hours multiplied by four and so on are the hours of the lord of the day. That is the eleventh hour. This is the certainty in all cases.

original: dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo gza' yi tshogs dang bcas pa 'di dag ces pa la sogs pa brjod pa'i rim pas phyi dang lus la dbyer med pa bsdu ba dang ni spro ba'i slad du srid pa gsum 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa ste gnas
analyzed: dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo gza' yi tshogs dang bcas pa 'di dag ces pa la sogs pa brjod pa'i rim pas phyi dang lus la dbyer med pa bsdu ba dang ni spro ba'i slad du srid pa gsum 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa ste gnas
translated: The glorious Kālacakra with the host of planets, these and so on, are expressed in the sequence of statements. In order to gather and emanate inseparably in the external and the body, the three existences are desire, form, and formless.

original: der ro // nyi ma zhes pa ni kye nyi ma'i shing rta bsdus pa'i rgyud yang dag par 'ching ba la gsol ba 'debs pa po zhes 'jam dpal gyis bod pa'o //
analyzed: der ro // nyi ma zhes pa ni kye nyi ma'i shing rta bsdus pa'i rgyud yang dag par 'ching ba la gsol ba 'debs pa po zhes 'jam dpal gyis bod pa'o //
translated: There, the sun is the one who supplicates the perfect binding of the condensed tantra of the sun's chariot. This is the request of Mañjuśrī.

original: dus kyi gzugs ni srog gi gzugs kyis so ;
analyzed: dus kyi gzugs ni srog gi gzugs kyis so ;
translated: The form of time is by the form of life.🔽The division of wisdom and method is by the division of day and night, the division of moon and sun, and so on.🔽The division of long and short is by the cause of long and short, fast and slow, and so on.

original: / shes rab thabs kyi rab dbye ni nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba dang zla ba dang nyi ma'i dbye ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: / shes rab thabs kyi rab dbye ni nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba dang zla ba dang nyi ma'i dbye ba la sogs pas so //
translated: The division of the family of the supreme sage is by the cause of the family of the supreme sage, the family of Brahmā, the family of Viṣṇu, and so on.🔽The division of the family of the detached is by the cause of the family of the detached.🔽The division of the family of the supreme sage is by the cause of the family of the supreme sage.🔽The division of the family of Brahmā is by the cause of the family of Brahmā.🔽The division of the family of Viṣṇu is by the cause of the family of Viṣṇu.🔽The division of the family of the detached is by the cause of the family of the detached.

original: mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs ni mnyam pa ring po dang mi mnyam pa thung ngu dang myur 'khyog la sogs pa'i rgyu bas so //
analyzed: mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs ni mnyam pa ring po dang mi mnyam pa thung ngu dang myur 'khyog la sogs pa'i rgyu bas so //
translated: The division of the family of the supreme sage is by the cause of the family of the supreme sage.🔽The division of the family of Brahmā is by the cause of the family of Brahmā.🔽The division of the family of Viṣṇu is by the cause of the family of Viṣṇu.🔽The division of the family of the detached is by the cause of the family of the detached.🔽The division of the family of the supreme sage is by the cause of the family of the supreme sage.

original: chags bral dang ni thub mchog rigs dang tshangs dang dag po la sogs lha rnams kyis ni shes ma yin zhes pa ni de ltar sngar brjod pa'i cho gas tshangs pa la sogs pa 'di dag gis shes pa ma yin pa /
analyzed: chags bral dang ni thub mchog rigs dang tshangs dang dag po la sogs lha rnams kyis ni shes ma yin zhes pa ni de ltar sngar brjod pa'i cho gas tshangs pa la sogs pa 'di dag gis shes pa ma yin pa /
translated: The division of the family of Brahmā is by the cause of the family of Brahmā.🔽The division of the family of Viṣṇu is by the cause of the family of Viṣṇu.🔽The division of the family of the detached is by the cause of the family of the detached.🔽The division of the family of the supreme sage is by the cause of the family of the supreme sage.🔽The division of the family of Brahmā is by the cause of the family of Brahmā.🔽The division of the family of Viṣṇu is by the cause of the family of Viṣṇu.

original: bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo kun rdzob kyi tshul gyis rnam par gnas pa khyab par brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad la khyab par byed pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo kun rdzob kyi tshul gyis rnam par gnas pa khyab par brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad la khyab par byed pa /
translated: The division of the family of the detached is by the cause of the family of the detached.🔽The division of the family of the supreme sage is by the cause of the family of the supreme sage.🔽The division of the family of Brahmā is by the cause of

original: ji ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis phyag na rdo rje zla ba bzang po la rab tu bstan pa bzhin du mi'i dbang
analyzed: ji ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis phyag na rdo rje zla ba bzang po la rab tu bstan pa bzhin du mi'i dbang
translated: Just as the Bhagavān, the omniscient, perfectly complete Buddha, taught Vajrapāṇi the good moon the nature of the conventional and the ultimate, both mundane and supramundane, in the same way,🔽

original: po 'jam dpal grags pa bdag gis kyang nyi ma'i shing rta khyod la bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo de nyid mdor bsdus pas rab tu bstan to //🔽dpal ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas las phyung ba bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i 'grel bshad stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od las skar rtsis shes pa'i cho ga'i @205a * //
analyzed: po 'jam dpal grags pa bdag gis kyang nyi ma'i shing rta khyod la bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo de nyid mdor bsdus pas rab tu bstan to // dpal ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas las phyung ba bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i 'grel bshad stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od las skar rtsis shes pa'i cho ga'i @205a * //
translated: Just as the Omniscient Blessed One, the Perfectly Awakened Buddha, taught to Vajrapāṇi, the good moon, the nature of the conventional and the ultimate, both mundane and supramundane, in the same way, I, the lord of men, Mañjukeśa, have taught to you, the sun's chariot, the Bhagavān Kālacakra, in brief.

original: mdor bsdus chen po ste dgu pa'o /
analyzed: mdor bsdus chen po ste dgu pa'o /
translated: From the Stainless Light, a commentary on the glorious Primordial Buddha's King of Tantras, the Kālacakra, in twelve thousand verses, this concludes the ninth chapter on the great summary of the method of astrology.

original: // / da ni dbyangs 'char ba gsungs pa aa sogs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: // / da ni dbyangs 'char ba gsungs pa aa sogs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Now, the rising of the vowels is stated with a and so forth.

original: dbyangs gang dag gi dang po aa yig yin pa de dag ni aa sogs lnga ste aa ai ri au li zhes pa rang byung gi tshig go //
analyzed: dbyangs gang dag gi dang po aa yig yin pa de dag ni aa sogs lnga ste aa ai ri au li zhes pa rang byung gi tshig go //
translated: The words a, i, u, e, o are natural words.

analyzed: aa ai auna / ri li ka ces pa ni so sor brjod pa gzung ba'i phyir ro //
