analyzed: de'i phyir aa ai au ae ao zhes pa ni byis pa rnams la 'jig rten du grags pa'o //
translated: The words a, i, u, e, o are natural words.🔽The words a, i, u, e, o are natural words

original: yon tan dang ya na skyed pa'i phyir aa ai au na ri li ka ces par rigs te ai ka'i aa tsa la ya na'o zhes pa'i khyad par gyi phyir dang aa ka'i aa ka la ring po'o //🔽zhes pa'i shes par byed pa'i phyir ro //🔽dang por dbyangs lnga gang yin pa de dag rang byung du lung bstan pas mnyam pa'i ngo bo ste de dag kyang nam mkha' la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi dbang gis grangs bzhin du 'jam dpal gyis rang gi lung ston pa las bris pa aa ai ri au
analyzed: yon tan dang ya na skyed pa'i phyir aa ai au na ri li ka ces par rigs te ai ka'i aa tsa la ya na'o zhes pa'i khyad par gyi phyir dang aa ka'i aa ka la ring po'o // zhes pa'i shes par byed pa'i phyir ro // dang por dbyangs lnga gang yin pa de dag rang byung du lung bstan pas mnyam pa'i ngo bo ste de dag kyang nam mkha' la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi dbang gis grangs bzhin du 'jam dpal gyis rang gi lung ston pa las bris pa aa ai ri au
translated: And the rule is aṃ and aḥ are long in aṃ and aḥ.🔽The first five vowels are declared to be of the nature of equality, because they are self-originated. They are Mañjuśrī, Akṣobhya, Vairocana, Ratnasaṃbhava, and Amitābha, respectively, by the power of their nature as space, etc. This is written in Mañjuśrī's own declaration.

original: li ka ces pa ste nam mkha' dang rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i rang bzhin rim pa bzhin no //
analyzed: li ka ces pa ste nam mkha' dang rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i rang bzhin rim pa bzhin no //
translated: The special rule is ai and o are long in aka and aka, and the rule is aṃ and aḥ are long in aṃ and aḥ.

original: de bzhin du aa ae aar ao aal tsa dang de bzhin du ha ya ra wa la ta 'jam dpal gyis nges par bstan te yon tan dang ya na ra bsgyur ba las rang rang gi rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid la rten pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du aa ae aar ao aal tsa dang de bzhin du ha ya ra wa la ta 'jam dpal gyis nges par bstan te yon tan dang ya na ra bsgyur ba las rang rang gi rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid la rten pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Likewise, A, A, A, A, A, C, and likewise, H, Y, R, V, L, T, are taught by Mañjuśrī, and are transformed into the qualities and the ya, ra, la, va, śa, ṣa, sa, and ha, because they are based on their own natures.

original: dbyangs lnga po de dag dang po'i tshes grangs dbang gis zhes pa ni dang po'i tshes grangs lnga mun pa'i dbye bas te dkar po'i tshes gcig dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang lnga pa'o //
analyzed: dbyangs lnga po de dag dang po'i tshes grangs dbang gis zhes pa ni dang po'i tshes grangs lnga mun pa'i dbye bas te dkar po'i tshes gcig dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang lnga pa'o //
translated: Those five vowels are the first lunar days, by the power of the lunar days, by the division of the dark lunar days, the first lunar days are the white lunar days, the first, second, third, fourth, and fifth.

original: de dag gi dbang gis ni dang po'i tshes grangs dbang gis te dga' ba la sogs pa rnams lnga po dang ldan par gyur pa ste dbyangs lnga po rnams kyi dang po'i tshes ni dga' ba'o //
analyzed: de dag gi dbang gis ni dang po'i tshes grangs dbang gis te dga' ba la sogs pa rnams lnga po dang ldan par gyur pa ste dbyangs lnga po rnams kyi dang po'i tshes ni dga' ba'o //
translated: By the power of those, by the power of the first lunar days, the five, beginning with joy, are endowed with the five vowels. The first lunar day of the five vowels is joy.

original: gnyis pa ni bzang po'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa ni bzang po'o //
translated: The second is excellence.

original: gsum pa ni rgyal ba'o //
analyzed: gsum pa ni rgyal ba'o //
translated: The third is victory.

original: bzhi pa ni stong pa'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa ni stong pa'o //
translated: The fourth is emptiness.

original: lnga pa ni rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: lnga pa ni rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The fifth is perfection.

original: de bzhin du drug pa la sogs pa dang de bzhin du bcu gcig pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du drug pa la sogs pa dang de bzhin du bcu gcig pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Similarly, the sixth and so on, and similarly the eleventh and so on.

original: dga' ba @205b la sogs ldan pa 'di la de dag 'dir ni 'char bar byed de /
analyzed: dga' ba @205b la sogs ldan pa 'di la de dag 'dir ni 'char bar byed de /
translated: These planets arise here in this month and so on.

original: gal te de la sa skyes la sogs gza' dag ma gyur na'o zhes pa dga' ba las skyes dang / bzang po la gza' lag dang / rgyal ba la phur bu dang / stong pa la pa sangs dang / rdzogs pa la spen pa ste /
analyzed: gal te de la sa skyes la sogs gza' dag ma gyur na'o zhes pa dga' ba las skyes dang / bzang po la gza' lag dang / rgyal ba la phur bu dang / stong pa la pa sangs dang / rdzogs pa la spen pa ste /
translated: If they are not overtaken by other planets, then the one born in Mṛgaśiras and so on, the one born in Punarvasu, the one born in Puṣya, the one born in Āśleṣā, and the one born in Śravaṇa, if they are not overtaken by other planets such as the one born in Bharaṇī and so on, then they arise.

original: dga' ba la sogs pa 'di dag la gal te sa skyes la sogs pa'i gza' dag ma gyur na de'i tshe 'char bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dga' ba la sogs pa 'di dag la gal te sa skyes la sogs pa'i gza' dag ma gyur na de'i tshe 'char bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If these planets such as the one born in Mṛgaśiras and so on are not overtaken by other planets such as the one born in Bharaṇī and so on, then they arise.

original: rnam pa gzhan du mi shis pa 'char te kye mi'i bdag po sa skyes mi shis shar bar gyur cing dga' ba la gal te slar yang smin drug dag dang ldan pa nyid du gyur pa'i dga' ba'i tshes de la gal te g-yul lam nad du gyur na
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du mi shis pa 'char te kye mi'i bdag po sa skyes mi shis shar bar gyur cing dga' ba la gal te slar yang smin drug dag dang ldan pa nyid du gyur pa'i dga' ba'i tshes de la gal te g-yul lam nad du gyur na
translated: Otherwise, inauspicious planets arise. Alas, O lord of men, if the inauspicious one born in Bharaṇī arises, and if the day of Mṛgaśiras is again endowed with the sixth lunar mansion, then if there is battle or illness on that day of Mṛgaśiras,

original: mi rnams dag ni 'chi bar 'gyur te dang po'i dbyangs kyi'o zhes pa thog ma nam mkha'i dbyangs kyi zhes pa'i don te skyes pa'am bud med gang gi ming gi dang po aa yig yin pa de'o //🔽de bzhin du bzang po dang gza' lag la gal te rgyu skar mchur gyur na de'i tshe gnyis pa ai yig gi dbyangs kyi ming can 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi rnams dag ni 'chi bar 'gyur te dang po'i dbyangs kyi'o zhes pa thog ma nam mkha'i dbyangs kyi zhes pa'i don te skyes pa'am bud med gang gi ming gi dang po aa yig yin pa de'o // de bzhin du bzang po dang gza' lag la gal te rgyu skar mchur gyur na de'i tshe gnyis pa ai yig gi dbyangs kyi ming can 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If the ascendant is in the asterism of Aśvinī, then one whose name begins with the letter a will die.🔽 Similarly, if the ascendant is in the asterism of Bharaṇī, then one whose name begins with the letter i will die.🔽 If the ascendant is in the asterism of Śravaṇa, then one whose name begins with the letter ṛ will die.🔽 If the ascendant is in the asterism of Mṛgaśirā, then one whose name begins with the letter ḷ will die.

original: de bzhin du rgyal ba phur bu la gal te skag tu gyur na de'i tshe gsum pa ri yig gi dbyangs kyi ming can 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du rgyal ba phur bu la gal te skag tu gyur na de'i tshe gsum pa ri yig gi dbyangs kyi ming can 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If the ascendant is in the asterism of Puṣya, then one whose name begins with the letter e will die.🔽 If the ascendant is in the asterism of Āśleṣā, then one whose name begins with the letter ai will die.🔽 If the ascendant is in the asterism of Maghā, then one whose name begins with the letter o will die.

original: de bzhin du stong pa dang pa sangs la gal te mon grur gyur na de'i tshe bzhi pa au yig gi dbyangs kyi ming can 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du stong pa dang pa sangs la gal te mon grur gyur na de'i tshe bzhi pa au yig gi dbyangs kyi ming can 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If the ascendant is in the asterism of Mūla, then one whose name begins with the letter au will die.🔽 If the ascendant is in the asterism of Pūrvāṣāḍhā, then one whose name begins with the letter aṃ will die.🔽 If the ascendant is in the asterism of Uttarāṣāḍhā, then one whose name begins with the letter aḥ will die.

original: de bzhin du rdzogs pa dang spen pa la gal te bra nyer gyur na de'i tshe lnga pa li yig gi dbyangs kyi ming can 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du rdzogs pa dang spen pa la gal te bra nyer gyur na de'i tshe lnga pa li yig gi dbyangs kyi ming can 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, if the moon is in the asterism of Pūrvāṣāḍhā or Uttarāṣāḍhā, then the fifth, which is named after the vowel of the letter ḷ, will be death.

original: de ltar dbyangs 'char ba rnams la yang rgyu skar dang gza'i dbang gis 'chi ba'i sbyor bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar dbyangs 'char ba rnams la yang rgyu skar dang gza'i dbang gis 'chi ba'i sbyor bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the ascendant of the vowels also has the application of death by the power of the asterisms and planets.

original: de bzhin du gza' nyi ma dag la dga' ba 'char ba rnams kyi g-yul du rmar 'gyur te gzir ba rnams nyon mongs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du gza' nyi ma dag la dga' ba 'char ba rnams kyi g-yul du rmar 'gyur te gzir ba rnams nyon mongs par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, for those whose ascendant of the vowels arises in the planets, there will be wounds in battle, and those who are wounded will be afflicted.

original: de bzhin du gza' zla ba la ni bzang po 'char ba rnams kyi yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gza' zla ba la ni bzang po 'char ba rnams kyi yang shes par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, it should be understood for those whose ascendant of the vowels arises in the planet Moon.

original: bden par 'char ba lnga po rnams kyi ste aa yig la sogs pa rang rang gi tshes la shar ba rnams kyi 'bras bu mang por 'chi ba'i sbyor bas dman pa dag la 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bden par 'char ba lnga po rnams kyi ste aa yig la sogs pa rang rang gi tshes la shar ba rnams kyi 'bras bu mang por 'chi ba'i sbyor bas dman pa dag la 'gyur ro //
translated: For those whose five true ascendants arise, such as the letter A, on their respective lunar days, there will be many results of death by the application of death for those of inferior status.

original: nad dang g-yul dang yul du bgrod pa dang bag ma len pa'i dus dag tu dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu de nyid mtshams shes par bya'o //
analyzed: nad dang g-yul dang yul du bgrod pa dang bag ma len pa'i dus dag tu dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu de nyid mtshams shes par bya'o //
translated: The auspicious and inauspicious results of those [planets] should be known at the time of illness, battle, traveling to a country, and taking a bride.

original: de ltar @206a * //
analyzed: de ltar @206a * //
translated: Thus,🔽by the order of the planets and stars previously mentioned, the vowels, the groups of stars, and the lunar days, by the division of those five,

original: rgyu skar gza' sngar brjod pa'i rim pas te dbyangs tshogs tshes rnams dag ni de nyid lnga'i rab tu dbye ba yis zhes pa ni slar yang dbyangs rnams 'char ba 'di nyid phyogs dang zla ba dang bgrod pa dang lo dang lo drug cu la yang 'gyur ba
analyzed: rgyu skar gza' sngar brjod pa'i rim pas te dbyangs tshogs tshes rnams dag ni de nyid lnga'i rab tu dbye ba yis zhes pa ni slar yang dbyangs rnams 'char ba 'di nyid phyogs dang zla ba dang bgrod pa dang lo dang lo drug cu la yang 'gyur ba
translated: again the arising of the vowels is this. It is also in the directions, the moon, the path, the year, and the sixty years.

original: ste / 'dir nag pa la sogs pa nas 'char ba ni nag pa la sogs pa'i zla ba gnyis la nyin zhag drug cu ste de dag la nyin zhag bcu gnyis kyis rim pa bzhin du aa yig la sogs pa rnams 'char bar 'gyur te nag pa'i dkar po'i tshes
analyzed: ste / 'dir nag pa la sogs pa nas 'char ba ni nag pa la sogs pa'i zla ba gnyis la nyin zhag drug cu ste de dag la nyin zhag bcu gnyis kyis rim pa bzhin du aa yig la sogs pa rnams 'char bar 'gyur te nag pa'i dkar po'i tshes
translated: Here, the arising from Kṛṣṇa and so on is the sixty days of the two months of Kṛṣṇa and so on. In those, the vowels A and so on arise in order by twelve days.

original: gcig la sogs pa ji srid par zla ba gnyis pa'i yang dkar po'i tshes gcig go //
analyzed: gcig la sogs pa ji srid par zla ba gnyis pa'i yang dkar po'i tshes gcig go //
translated: The first day of the bright fortnight of Kṛṣṇa and so on is the first day of the bright fortnight of the second month.

original: de lta na lo zla dus kyi dbye bas dbyangs lnga po rnams lan drug yongs su 'khor bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na lo zla dus kyi dbye bas dbyangs lnga po rnams lan drug yongs su 'khor bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, the five vowels are completely cycled six times by the divisions of years, months, and days.

original: phyogs la 'char ba'i yul la yang nyin zhag bcu gnyis kyis phyogs kyi dbye ba'o //
analyzed: phyogs la 'char ba'i yul la yang nyin zhag bcu gnyis kyis phyogs kyi dbye ba'o //
translated: Also, the divisions of the directions are by twelve days in the country of the rising direction.

original: de bzhin du lo'i nyin zhag sum brgya drug cu la bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis aa yig la sogs rnams rim pas 'char bar shes par bya ste de nyid ni nag pa la sogs pa'i dkar po'i tshes gcig la sogs pa'i zla ba'i dbye ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du lo'i nyin zhag sum brgya drug cu la bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis aa yig la sogs rnams rim pas 'char bar shes par bya ste de nyid ni nag pa la sogs pa'i dkar po'i tshes gcig la sogs pa'i zla ba'i dbye ba'o //
translated: In the same way, one should understand that the vowels a and so on arise in sequence in the three hundred and sixty days of a year by seventy-two. That is the division of the months of the bright fortnight, such as the first day of the bright fortnight of Āṣāḍha, and so on.

original: de bzhin du rab byung la sogs pa'i lo drug cu la dbyangs lnga po rnams rim pa bzhin du dbyangs re re zla ba drug gis 'char te nyi shu rtsa bzhi yongs su bskor bas slar yang sngar gyi cho ga'o zhes pa ni bgrod pa la 'char ba'o
analyzed: de bzhin du rab byung la sogs pa'i lo drug cu la dbyangs lnga po rnams rim pa bzhin du dbyangs re re zla ba drug gis 'char te nyi shu rtsa bzhi yongs su bskor bas slar yang sngar gyi cho ga'o zhes pa ni bgrod pa la 'char ba'o
translated: In the same way, the five vowels arise in sequence in the sixty years of the sexagenary cycle, with each vowel lasting for six months. Since twenty-four are completely cycled, the procedure is the same as before.🔽This is the arising in the movement.

original: // rab byung la sogs pa'i lo bcu gnyis la 'char ba ni rab byung la sogs pa rnams de bzhin du yongs su bskor ba ste lo la sogs pa rnams shes par bya'o //
analyzed: // rab byung la sogs pa'i lo bcu gnyis la 'char ba ni rab byung la sogs pa rnams de bzhin du yongs su bskor ba ste lo la sogs pa rnams shes par bya'o //
translated: The twelve years beginning with the renunciate are the twelve years beginning with the renunciate, and so on, which are to be understood as the years, and so on.

original: de ltar dbyangs ni lnga po rnams dag 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur te de ni slar yang nub pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar dbyangs ni lnga po rnams dag 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur te de ni slar yang nub pa'o //
translated: Thus, the five tones arise here, and then they set.

original: zhes pa ni 'dir phyogs kyi dbye ba la nyin zhag bcu gnyis ni dga' ba ste de bzhin du bzang po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'dir phyogs kyi dbye ba la nyin zhag bcu gnyis ni dga' ba ste de bzhin du bzang po la sogs pa'o //
translated: Here, in the division of the directions, twelve days are joy, and likewise good, and so on.

original: zla ba'i dbye ba la nyin zhag bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni dga' ba ste /
analyzed: zla ba'i dbye ba la nyin zhag bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni dga' ba ste /
translated: In the division of the months, seventy-two days are joy,

original: de bzhin du bzang po la sogs pa yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du bzang po la sogs pa yang ngo //
translated: and likewise good, and so on.

original: bgrod pa'i dbye ba la bsod pa ni dga' ba ste de bzhin du bzang po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bgrod pa'i dbye ba la bsod pa ni dga' ba ste de bzhin du bzang po la sogs pa'o //
translated: In the division of the paths, the good is joy, and likewise good, and so on.

original: lo'i dbye ba la lo bcu gnyis ni dga' ba ste de bzhin du bzang po la sogs pa yang ngo //
analyzed: lo'i dbye ba la lo bcu gnyis ni dga' ba ste de bzhin du bzang po la sogs pa yang ngo //
translated: In the division of the years, twelve years are joy, and likewise good, and so on.

original: dang po la ni dbyangs dang po rnams byis pa ste rang tshes yon tan dbang gis zhes pa nam mkha' dang rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i yon tan @206b gyi dbang gis dang sgra dang reg dang ro dang gzugs dang dri yi yon tan gyi dbang gis
analyzed: dang po la ni dbyangs dang po rnams byis pa ste rang tshes yon tan dbang gis zhes pa nam mkha' dang rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i yon tan @206b gyi dbang gis dang sgra dang reg dang ro dang gzugs dang dri yi yon tan gyi dbang gis
translated: The first is the childish, who are so called because they are the first to arise.🔽They are governed by the qualities of space, wind, fire, water and earth, and by the qualities of sound, touch, taste, form and smell.

original: te grangs bzhin no //
analyzed: te grangs bzhin no //
translated: The first is the children of the first vowels, by the power of their own qualities, by the power of the qualities of space, wind, fire, water, and earth, and by the power of the qualities of sound, touch, taste, form, and smell, respectively.

original: 'dir dga' ba la aa yig 'char ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir dga' ba la aa yig 'char ba'o //
translated: Here, joy arises as the letter a.

original: bzang po la ai yig go //
analyzed: bzang po la ai yig go //
translated: Goodness arises as the letter i.

original: rgyal ba la ri yig go //
analyzed: rgyal ba la ri yig go //
translated: Victory arises as the letter ri.

original: stong pa la au yig go //
analyzed: stong pa la au yig go //
translated: Emptiness arises as the letter u.

original: rdzogs pa la li yig go //
analyzed: rdzogs pa la li yig go //
translated: Completion arises as the letter li.

original: de bzhin du rang rang gi 'char ba'i nyin zhag las nyin zhag gnyis pa la dpal ldan gzhon nu yang ste bzang po la aa yig gzhon nu'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rang rang gi 'char ba'i nyin zhag las nyin zhag gnyis pa la dpal ldan gzhon nu yang ste bzang po la aa yig gzhon nu'o //
translated: Similarly, in the second day arising from each one’s own day, glorious youth arises in goodness as the letter a.

original: rgyal ba la ai yig go //
analyzed: rgyal ba la ai yig go //
translated: Victory arises as the letter i.

original: stong pa la ri yig go //
analyzed: stong pa la ri yig go //
translated: Emptiness arises as the letter ri.

original: rdzogs pa la au yig go //
analyzed: rdzogs pa la au yig go //
translated: Completion arises as the letter u.

original: dga' ba la li yig go //
analyzed: dga' ba la li yig go //
translated: Joy arises as the letter li.

original: dar ba brgan po rim pas me dang chu gter nyin zhag la ste zhes pa ni rang gi nyin zhag las me zhes pa nyin zhag gsum pa la dar la bab par 'gyur te rgyal ba la aa yig dar la bab pa'o //🔽stong pa la ai yig go //🔽rdzogs pa la ri yig go //
analyzed: dar ba brgan po rim pas me dang chu gter nyin zhag la ste zhes pa ni rang gi nyin zhag las me zhes pa nyin zhag gsum pa la dar la bab par 'gyur te rgyal ba la aa yig dar la bab pa'o // stong pa la ai yig go // rdzogs pa la ri yig go //
translated: The “youthful” is the third day, the “middle-aged” is the fourth day, and the “old” is the fifth day.

original: dga' ba la au yig go //🔽bzang po la li yig go //🔽rgan po chu gter zhes pa ni rang gi tshes las nyin zhag bzhi pa la ste 'dir stong pa la aa yig rgan po'o //
analyzed: dga' ba la au yig go // bzang po la li yig go // rgan po chu gter zhes pa ni rang gi tshes las nyin zhag bzhi pa la ste 'dir stong pa la aa yig rgan po'o //
translated: The “empty” is the sixth day, the “complete” is the seventh day, the “joy” is the eighth day, the “good” is the ninth day, and the “victorious” is the tenth day.🔽The “youthful” is the third day, the “middle-aged” is the fourth day, and the “old” is the fifth day.🔽The “empty” is the sixth day, the “complete” is the seventh day, the “joy” is the eighth day, the “good” is the ninth day, and the “victorious” is the tenth day.

original: rdzogs pa la ai yig go //🔽dga' ba la ri yig go //🔽bzang po la au yig go //
analyzed: rdzogs pa la ai yig go // dga' ba la ri yig go // bzang po la au yig go //
translated: The “youthful” is the third day, the “middle-aged” is the fourth day, and the “old” is the fifth day.

original: rgyal ba la li yig go //
analyzed: rgyal ba la li yig go //
translated: The “empty” is the sixth day, the “complete” is the seventh day, the “joy” is the eighth day, the “good” is the ninth day, and the “victorious” is the tenth day.

original: lnga pa la ni nub par 'gyur zhes pa ni rdzogs pa la aa yig nub par gyur pa'o //🔽dga' ba la ai yig go //🔽bzang po la ri yig go //
analyzed: lnga pa la ni nub par 'gyur zhes pa ni rdzogs pa la aa yig nub par gyur pa'o // dga' ba la ai yig go // bzang po la ri yig go //
translated: The “youthful” is the third day, the “middle-aged” is the fourth day, and the “old” is the fifth day.

original: rgyal ba la au yig go //
analyzed: rgyal ba la au yig go //
translated: The “empty” is the sixth day, the “complete” is the seventh day, the “joy” is the eighth day, the “good” is the ninth day, and the “victorious” is the tenth day.🔽The “youthful” is the third day, the “middle-aged” is the fourth day, and the “old” is the fifth day.

original: stong pa la li yig go zhes pa ste dbyangs rnams kyi 'char ba la sogs pa rnam pa lnga'i dbye ba shes par bya'o //
analyzed: stong pa la li yig go zhes pa ste dbyangs rnams kyi 'char ba la sogs pa rnam pa lnga'i dbye ba shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know the five divisions of the arising, etc. of the vowels.🔽The five vowels beginning with a are definitely transformed by the gunas,

original: aa sogs dbyangs lnga gang dag nges par yon tan gyis bsgyur zhes pa ni snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa'i yon tan gyis bsgyur bas bco lngar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: aa sogs dbyangs lnga gang dag nges par yon tan gyis bsgyur zhes pa ni snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa'i yon tan gyis bsgyur bas bco lngar 'gyur ro //
translated: that is, they become fifteen by the transformation of the gunas of sattva, rajas, and tamas.

original: de rnams slar yang rnam gnyis sum cu nyid de /🔽aa ai ri au li /
analyzed: de rnams slar yang rnam gnyis sum cu nyid de / aa ai ri au li /
translated: Those are again twofold, thirty.🔽a i r i u l🔽a a e a r a o a l

original: aa ae aar ao aal /
analyzed: aa ae aar ao aal /
translated: ha ya ra wa la

original: ha ya ra wa la zhes pa dga' ba la sogs pa sum 'gyur te dkar po'i phyogs la'o //
analyzed: ha ya ra wa la zhes pa dga' ba la sogs pa sum 'gyur te dkar po'i phyogs la'o //
translated: are the thirty of the bright fortnight, beginning with the delight.🔽Likewise,

original: de bzhin du l'a w'a r'a y'a h'a /
analyzed: de bzhin du l'a w'a r'a y'a h'a /
translated: la wa ra ya ha🔽a la o a ra e a

original: a'a la aoo a'a ra aee a'a /
analyzed: a'a la aoo a'a ra aee a'a /
translated: li a u ri a i a

original: l'i a'u r'i a'i a'a zhes pa ni dga' ma la sogs pa ste nag po'i phyogs la'o //
analyzed: l'i a'u r'i a'i a'a zhes pa ni dga' ma la sogs pa ste nag po'i phyogs la'o //
translated: are the delight, etc. of the dark fortnight.

original: de ltar na phyogs gnyis ka la tshes sum cu rnams grangs bzhin no //
analyzed: de ltar na phyogs gnyis ka la tshes sum cu rnams grangs bzhin no //
translated: Thus, in both fortnights, the thirty days are in order.

original: ka sogs sde pa'i yi ge rnams la rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis dbyangs de dag mtha' dag sbyar bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: ka sogs sde pa'i yi ge rnams la rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis dbyangs de dag mtha' dag sbyar bar bya ba ste /
translated: The vowels are applied to the consonants ka and so on by the power of their natural qualities.

original: thung ngu rnams ni 'dir yang @207a * //
analyzed: thung ngu rnams ni 'dir yang @207a * //
translated: The short ones arise in the bright fortnight,🔽and the long ones in the dark fortnight.

original: dkar po'i phyogs la 'char bar 'gyur te de nyid lnga yi dbye ba yis zhes pa ni 'dir gsal byed gang zhig dbyangs thung  dus brjod pa de ni dkar po'i phyogs la 'char ro //
analyzed: dkar po'i phyogs la 'char bar 'gyur te de nyid lnga yi dbye ba yis zhes pa ni 'dir gsal byed gang zhig dbyangs thung  dus brjod pa de ni dkar po'i phyogs la 'char ro //
translated: Here, the consonants that are expressed by short vowels arise in the bright fortnight.

original: ring po rnams ni nag po'i phyogs la ste de bzhin du gang zhig dbyangs ring pos brjod pa'i gsal byed ring po ni nag po'i phyogs la 'char ro //
analyzed: ring po rnams ni nag po'i phyogs la ste de bzhin du gang zhig dbyangs ring pos brjod pa'i gsal byed ring po ni nag po'i phyogs la 'char ro //
translated: The long consonants that are expressed by long vowels arise in the dark fortnight.

original: 'dir gsal byed kyi yul la nyi ma 'pho ba'i phyogs su rig par bya ste spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas so //
analyzed: 'dir gsal byed kyi yul la nyi ma 'pho ba'i phyogs su rig par bya ste spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas so //
translated: Here, the movement of the sun in the field of the consonants should be understood in terms of the conjunctions of the sun's northern and southern courses.

original: nyi shu rtsa bdun rgyu skar de la zhes pa rgyu skar gyi tshogs nyi shu rtsa bdun te de dag las rkang pa dang bcas pa'i rgyu skar gnyis kyis nyi ma'i dus sbyor bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa bdun rgyu skar de la zhes pa rgyu skar gyi tshogs nyi shu rtsa bdun te de dag las rkang pa dang bcas pa'i rgyu skar gnyis kyis nyi ma'i dus sbyor bcu gnyis so //
translated: The twenty-seven constellations are the twenty-seven groups of stars. Two of them, together with the lunar mansions, make up the twelve solar mansions.

original: gsal bar mda' zhes pa ni de dag chu tshod lnga'i bdag nyid kyi cha dgu pa'o //
analyzed: gsal bar mda' zhes pa ni de dag chu tshod lnga'i bdag nyid kyi cha dgu pa'o //
translated: The clear arrow is the ninth part of the five-hour period.

original: 'di dag rnams kyang rang bzhin gsum ste g-yo ba lug la sogs pa dang brtan pa glang la sogs pa dang mnyam pa gnyis kyi rang bzhin 'khrig pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag rnams kyang rang bzhin gsum ste g-yo ba lug la sogs pa dang brtan pa glang la sogs pa dang mnyam pa gnyis kyi rang bzhin 'khrig pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: These are also of three natures: the movable ones, Aries and so on; the fixed ones, Taurus and so on; and the dual ones, Cancer and so on.

original: lug dang ka rka ta dang srang dang chu srin ni g-yo ba bzhi'o //
analyzed: lug dang ka rka ta dang srang dang chu srin ni g-yo ba bzhi'o //
translated: Aries, Cancer, Libra, and Capricorn are the four movable ones.

original: glang dang seng ge dang sdig pa dang bum pa ni brtan pa'o //
analyzed: glang dang seng ge dang sdig pa dang bum pa ni brtan pa'o //
translated: Taurus, Leo, Scorpio, and Aquarius are the fixed ones.

original: 'khrig pa dang bu mo dang gzhu dang nya ni gnyis kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'khrig pa dang bu mo dang gzhu dang nya ni gnyis kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: Gemini, Virgo, Sagittarius, and Pisces are the dual ones.

original: de ltar de dag rtag pa nyid du 'char te nyin mtshan la bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: de ltar de dag rtag pa nyid du 'char te nyin mtshan la bcu gnyis so //
translated: Thus, they always appear in the twelve solar mansions, six by day and six by night.

original: 'dir 'dri ba'i dus su g-yo ba rnams kyis bya ba myur du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir 'dri ba'i dus su g-yo ba rnams kyis bya ba myur du 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, the actions of the mobile [planets] are quick at the time of the question.

original: brtan pa rnams kyis brtan pa'o //
analyzed: brtan pa rnams kyis brtan pa'o //
translated: The actions of the fixed [planets] are slow.

original: gnyis kyi rang bzhin rnams kyis bya ba 'bring po'o //
analyzed: gnyis kyi rang bzhin rnams kyis bya ba 'bring po'o //
translated: The actions of the dual [planets] are middling.

original: de la yud tsam sum cu rnams dang zhes pa dus sbyor gyi tshogs de la yud tsam sum cu'o //
analyzed: de la yud tsam sum cu rnams dang zhes pa dus sbyor gyi tshogs de la yud tsam sum cu'o //
translated: Therein, the thirty muhūrtas, the collection of the [twelve] houses, are thirty muhūrtas.

original: nyin zhag dus thun brgyad kyi bdag nyid la chu tshod dag kyang drug cu kho nar 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: nyin zhag dus thun brgyad kyi bdag nyid la chu tshod dag kyang drug cu kho nar 'gyur ro ;
translated: In a day, which is of eight praharas, there are exactly sixty muhūrtas.

original: / dang por de thog mar sun  cu'i dbyangs rnams 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur ba nyid de yud tsam yud tsam dag la'o //
analyzed: / dang por de thog mar sun  cu'i dbyangs rnams 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur ba nyid de yud tsam yud tsam dag la'o //
translated: First, the thirty vowels arise here in the muhūrtas, in the beginning of that [day].

original: zla ba'i dbus su  chos kyi cha la zhes pa ni tshes grangs gcig yud tsam sum cu'i char byas nas yud tsam re re'i cha la ste tshes gcig la aa yig la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zla ba'i dbus su  chos kyi cha la zhes pa ni tshes grangs gcig yud tsam sum cu'i char byas nas yud tsam re re'i cha la ste tshes gcig la aa yig la sogs pa'o //
translated: In the middle of the moon, in the dharma portion, in one lunar day, divided into thirty muhūrtas, in each muhūrtas portion, in the first lunar day, [there is] the letter A, and so on.

original: gnyis pa la ai yig la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa la ai yig la sogs pa'o //
translated: In the second lunar day, [there is] the letter I, and so on.

original: gsum pa la ri yig la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsum pa la ri yig la sogs pa'o //
translated: In the third lunar day, [there is] the letter R, and so on.

original: bzhi pa la au yig la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa la au yig la sogs pa'o //
translated: In the fourth, the letter u, and so on.

original: lnga pa la li yig la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lnga pa la li yig la sogs pa'o //
translated: In the fifth, the letter li, and so on.

original: drug pa la yon tan gyi aa yig la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: drug pa la yon tan gyi aa yig la sogs pa'o //
translated: In the sixth, the letter a of the qualities, and so on.

original: bdun pa la ae yig la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bdun pa la ae yig la sogs pa'o //
translated: In the seventh, the letter e, and so on.

original: brgyad pa la aar yig @207b la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: brgyad pa la aar yig @207b la sogs pa'o //
translated: In the eighth, the letter ar, and so on.

original: dgu pa la ao yig la sogs pa'o //🔽bcu pa la aal yig la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dgu pa la ao yig la sogs pa'o // bcu pa la aal yig la sogs pa'o //
translated: In the ninth, the letter o, and so on.🔽In the tenth, the letter al, and so on.

original: bcu gcig pa la ha yig la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bcu gcig pa la ha yig la sogs pa'o //
translated: In the eleventh, the letter ha, and so on.

original: bcu gnyis pa la ya yig la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bcu gnyis pa la ya yig la sogs pa'o //
translated: In the twelfth, the letter ya, and so on.

original: bcu gsum pa la ra yig la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bcu gsum pa la ra yig la sogs pa'o //
translated: In the thirteenth, the letter ra, and so on.

original: bcu bzhi pa la wa yig la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bcu bzhi pa la wa yig la sogs pa'o //
translated: In the fourteenth, the letter va, and so on.

original: nya la la yig la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: nya la la yig la sogs pa ste /
translated: In the fifteenth, the letter la, and so on.

original: dbyangs sum cu rnams spro ba'i rim pas dkar po'i phyogs kyi  tshes grangs so so la sum cu'i dbye bas 'char ro //
analyzed: dbyangs sum cu rnams spro ba'i rim pas dkar po'i phyogs kyi  tshes grangs so so la sum cu'i dbye bas 'char ro //
translated: The thirty vowels arise in the order of emanation, by the division of thirty, on each of the lunar days of the bright half.

original: de nas nag po'i phyogs kyi chos gcig gi tshes dga' ba la dbyangs sum cu po rnams sdud pa'i rim pas 'char ro //
analyzed: de nas nag po'i phyogs kyi chos gcig gi tshes dga' ba la dbyangs sum cu po rnams sdud pa'i rim pas 'char ro //
translated: Then, on the first day of the dark half, the thirty vowels arise in the order of gathering, on the day of the joy of Dharma.

original: de la tshes gcig la l'a yig la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de la tshes gcig la l'a yig la sogs pa'o //
translated: There, on the first day, the letter la, and so on.

original: gnyis pa la w'a yig la sogs pa ste de bzhin du thams cad do //
analyzed: gnyis pa la w'a yig la sogs pa ste de bzhin du thams cad do //
translated: In the second, the vowel sign ā, and so on, and likewise all.

original: zla ba'i dbus su tshes kyi cha la 'char bar brjod de de dag nub pa dag kyang de nyid la'o zhes pa zla ba la ste /
analyzed: zla ba'i dbus su tshes kyi cha la 'char bar brjod de de dag nub pa dag kyang de nyid la'o zhes pa zla ba la ste /
translated: In the middle of the moon, the digits rise, and so on, and they set there, too, in the moon.

original: 'dir dbyangs yig gang dkar po'i tshes gcig la sogs pa la shar ba de dag nag po'i tshes gcig la sogs pa la nub pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir dbyangs yig gang dkar po'i tshes gcig la sogs pa la shar ba de dag nag po'i tshes gcig la sogs pa la nub pa'o //
translated: Here, the vowel sign that rises on the first day of the bright fortnight, and so on, sets on the first day of the dark fortnight, and so on.

original: stong pa rlung me chu dang sa rnams dag kyang aa la sogs pa dbyangs ni lnga po rnams kyi rigs zhes pa ni sngar brjod pa'i rim pas nam mkha' la sogs pa rnams ni aa yig la sogs pa rnams kyi rigs so //
analyzed: stong pa rlung me chu dang sa rnams dag kyang aa la sogs pa dbyangs ni lnga po rnams kyi rigs zhes pa ni sngar brjod pa'i rim pas nam mkha' la sogs pa rnams ni aa yig la sogs pa rnams kyi rigs so //
translated: The empty ones, the elements of wind, fire, water, and earth, are the five long vowels, a, and so on, of the families.

original: sgra gcan la sogs pa'i gza' rnams ni grangs bzhin du thung ngu dang ring po rnams kyi lhag pa'i lha ste sgra gcan dang dus me ni aa yig thung ngu dang ring po dag gi'o //
analyzed: sgra gcan la sogs pa'i gza' rnams ni grangs bzhin du thung ngu dang ring po rnams kyi lhag pa'i lha ste sgra gcan dang dus me ni aa yig thung ngu dang ring po dag gi'o //
translated: The planets Rāhu and so on are the long and short vowels, respectively, of the additional deities. Rāhu and Ketu are the short and long a.

original: zla ba dang nyi ma ni ai yig dag gi'o //
analyzed: zla ba dang nyi ma ni ai yig dag gi'o //
translated: The moon and sun are of the vowels I.

original: gza' lag dang sa skyes ni ri yig dag gi'o //
analyzed: gza' lag dang sa skyes ni ri yig dag gi'o //
translated: The planets Mars and Mercury are of the vowels R.

original: pa sangs dang bla ma ni au yig dag gi'o //
analyzed: pa sangs dang bla ma ni au yig dag gi'o //
translated: Jupiter and Venus are of the vowels U.

original: mjug rings dang spen pa ni li yig dag gi ste 'dir ji ltar rigs par lhag pa'i lha'o //
analyzed: mjug rings dang spen pa ni li yig dag gi ste 'dir ji ltar rigs par lhag pa'i lha'o //
translated: Rahu and Ketu are of the vowels L. Here the remaining planets are as appropriate.

original: de bzhin du dus sbyor bcu gnyis las dus sbyor so so de dag nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbang gis chu tshod rnams ni bsgrub par bya ste da ltar gyi dus sbyor 'char ba la cha lnga pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dus sbyor bcu gnyis las dus sbyor so so de dag nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbang gis chu tshod rnams ni bsgrub par bya ste da ltar gyi dus sbyor 'char ba la cha lnga pa'o //
translated: Thus, from the twelve houses, the hours are to be accomplished by the power of day and night in each house. The rising house is the fifth part of the present house.

original: de'i dbus su dbyangs gang byung ba'i gza' zhes bya ba stobs ldan de yis dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya /
analyzed: de'i dbus su dbyangs gang byung ba'i gza' zhes bya ba stobs ldan de yis dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya /
translated: In the middle of that, the planet of the vowel that arises is called the powerful one. By that, the mandala is accomplished.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i dus sbyor gyi dbye bas stong pa la sogs pa dang sa la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i dus sbyor gyi dbye bas stong pa la sogs pa dang sa la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: By the division of the unequal and equal houses, the empty and so on and the earth and so on are accomplished.

original: g-yon pa dag la thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams 'dir ni 'char te @208a * //
analyzed: g-yon pa dag la thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams 'dir ni 'char te @208a * //
translated: The short vowels are on the left here.

original: g-yon pa mi mnyam pa'i dus sbyor la dbyangs dang gsal byed thung ngu rnams 'char bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: g-yon pa mi mnyam pa'i dus sbyor la dbyangs dang gsal byed thung ngu rnams 'char bar 'gyur ro //
translated: On the left, in the unequal muhūrta, the short vowels and consonants arise.

original: g-yas pa mnyam pa'i dus sbyor nas gzhan ring po brjod pa'i gsal byed rnams su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: g-yas pa mnyam pa'i dus sbyor nas gzhan ring po brjod pa'i gsal byed rnams su 'gyur ro //
translated: On the right, in the equal muhūrta, the other long vowels and consonants are expressed.

original: de bzhin du g-yon la stong pa la sogs pa de nyid dkyil 'khor lnga'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du g-yon la stong pa la sogs pa de nyid dkyil 'khor lnga'o //
translated: Similarly, on the left, in the empty and so forth, there are the five maṇḍalas.

original: sgra gcan la sogs pa gcig gis bar du chod pa'i gza'i tshogs te sgra gcan la sogs mtha' dag ces pa ni sgra gcan dang zla ba dang gza' lag dang pa sangs dang mjug rings so //
analyzed: sgra gcan la sogs pa gcig gis bar du chod pa'i gza'i tshogs te sgra gcan la sogs mtha' dag ces pa ni sgra gcan dang zla ba dang gza' lag dang pa sangs dang mjug rings so //
translated: The group of planets, Rāhu and so forth, is the group of planets, Rāhu and so forth, which is Rāhu, the moon, Mars, Mercury, and Jupiter.

original: g-yas pa lho'i dus sbyor la de nyid 'dzin ma la sogs dkyil 'khor lnga'i dbye ba'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa lho'i dus sbyor la de nyid 'dzin ma la sogs dkyil 'khor lnga'i dbye ba'o //
translated: On the right, in the southern muhūrta, there is the division of the five maṇḍalas, Aḍaḍa and so forth.

original: gza'i tshogs ni nges par nyi ma'i bu la sogs pa zhes pa ni spen pa dang phur bu dang bkra shis dang nyi ma dang dus me'o //
analyzed: gza'i tshogs ni nges par nyi ma'i bu la sogs pa zhes pa ni spen pa dang phur bu dang bkra shis dang nyi ma dang dus me'o //
translated: The group of planets is the group of planets, the sons of the sun and so forth, which is Saturn, Venus, Ketu, the sun, and Rāhu.

original: 'dir mnyam pa'i dus sbyor chu srin la chu tshod lnga ni grags bzhin du a'a yig la sogs pa'i dbyangs rnams dang / yon tan dang 'phel ba rnams kyis dbyangs ring pos brjod pa'i gsal byed rnams 'char ro //
analyzed: 'dir mnyam pa'i dus sbyor chu srin la chu tshod lnga ni grags bzhin du a'a yig la sogs pa'i dbyangs rnams dang / yon tan dang 'phel ba rnams kyis dbyangs ring pos brjod pa'i gsal byed rnams 'char ro //
translated: Here, in the Cancer ascendant, the five hours are known to be the vowels ā and so forth, and the consonants pronounced by long vowels, such as the qualities and the increases.

original: de la chu tshod dang po sa'i dkyil 'khor la k'a'o //
analyzed: de la chu tshod dang po sa'i dkyil 'khor la k'a'o //
translated: In that, the first hour is ka in the earth maṇḍala.

original: gnyis pa chu'i dkyil 'khor la kh'a'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa chu'i dkyil 'khor la kh'a'o //
translated: The second is kha in the water maṇḍala.

original: gsum pa me'i dkyil 'khor la g'a'o //
analyzed: gsum pa me'i dkyil 'khor la g'a'o //
translated: The third is ga in the fire maṇḍala.

original: bzhi pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gh'a'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gh'a'o //
translated: The fourth is gha in the wind maṇḍala.

original: lnga pa stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la d'a ste de la ka la sogs pa'i gsal byed aa yig la sogs pas brjod pa dag ni chu srin gyi dkyil 'khor lnga la rim pa bzhin du 'char ro //
analyzed: lnga pa stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la d'a ste de la ka la sogs pa'i gsal byed aa yig la sogs pas brjod pa dag ni chu srin gyi dkyil 'khor lnga la rim pa bzhin du 'char ro //
translated: The fifth is ḍa in the space maṇḍala. The consonants ka and so forth, which are pronounced by the vowels ā and so forth, arise in the five maṇḍalas of Cancer in order.

original: de bzhin du bum pa'i stong pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga la dbyangs thung ngus brjod pa'i nga la sogs pa rnams lugs las bzlog pas rig par bya ste de la chu tshod dang po ni nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la da'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du bum pa'i stong pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga la dbyangs thung ngus brjod pa'i nga la sogs pa rnams lugs las bzlog pas rig par bya ste de la chu tshod dang po ni nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la da'o //
translated: In the first watch, the a of space arises.

original: gnyis pa la gha'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa la gha'o //
translated: In the second, the gha of air.

original: gsum pa la ga'o //
analyzed: gsum pa la ga'o //
translated: In the third, the ga of fire.

original: bzhi pa la kha'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa la kha'o //
translated: In the fourth, the kha of water.

original: lnga pa sa'i dkyil 'khor la ka 'char ro //
analyzed: lnga pa sa'i dkyil 'khor la ka 'char ro //
translated: In the fifth, the ka of earth arises.

original: de bzhin du nya la ts'a tsh'a dz'a dzh'a ny'a'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du nya la ts'a tsh'a dz'a dzh'a ny'a'o //
translated: Likewise, in the fish maṇḍala, the ña, jha, ja, jha, ña arise.

original: lug gi dkyil 'khor lnga rnams la nya dzha dza tsha tsa'o //
analyzed: lug gi dkyil 'khor lnga rnams la nya dzha dza tsha tsa'o //
translated: In the five maṇḍalas of Aries, the ña, jha, ja, jha, ña arise.

original: de bzhin du glang la t'a th'a d'a dh'a n'a'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du glang la t'a th'a d'a dh'a n'a'o //
translated: Likewise, in the bull maṇḍala, the ṭa, ṭha, ḍa, ḍha, ṇa arise.

original: 'khrig pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga la na dha da tha ta'o //
analyzed: 'khrig pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga la na dha da tha ta'o //
translated: In the five maṇḍalas of the bull, the ṇa, ḍha, ḍa, ṭha, ṭa arise.

original: de bzhin du ka rka ta la p'a ph'a b'a bha m'a'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du ka rka ta la p'a ph'a b'a bha m'a'o //
translated: Likewise, in the maṇḍala of Cancer, the pa, pha, ba, bha, ma arise.

original: seng ge'i dkyil 'khor lnga la ma bha ba pha pa'o //
analyzed: seng ge'i dkyil 'khor lnga la ma bha ba pha pa'o //
translated: In the five maṇḍalas of the lion, the ma, bha, ba, pha, pa arise.

original: bu mo la t'a th'a d'a dh'a n'a'o //
analyzed: bu mo la t'a th'a d'a dh'a n'a'o //
translated: In the maṇḍala of Virgo, the ta, tha, da, dha, na arise.

original: srang gi dkyil 'khor lnga la na dha da tha ta'o //
analyzed: srang gi dkyil 'khor lnga la na dha da tha ta'o //
translated: The five circles of the scales are na, dha, da, tha, and ta.

original: de bzhin du sdig pa la s'a  p'a sh'a sh'a  thk'a'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du sdig pa la s'a  p'a sh'a sh'a  thk'a'o //
translated: Similarly, for sin, they are sa, pa, ṣa, ṣa, and tha.

original: @208b gzhu'i dkyil 'khor lnga la  thka sha sha wa sa ste chu tshod 'char ba la gsal byed rnams ni lhag pa'i lha'o //
analyzed: @208b gzhu'i dkyil 'khor lnga la  thka sha sha wa sa ste chu tshod 'char ba la gsal byed rnams ni lhag pa'i lha'o //
translated: The five circles of the bow are tha, ka, ṣa, va, and sa.

original: 'dir gsal byed brjod pa'i dbyangs ni gsal byed kyi yi ge'i dbyangs su 'gyur zhing dbyangs ni srog gi dbyangs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir gsal byed brjod pa'i dbyangs ni gsal byed kyi yi ge'i dbyangs su 'gyur zhing dbyangs ni srog gi dbyangs su 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, the vowels of the consonants are the vowels of the consonant letters, and the vowels of the life are the vowels of the life.

original: srog gi dbyangs de yang zla ba'i chal thung ngu dang ring po'i dbye ba dang yud tsam gyi dbye ba sngar brjod pas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: srog gi dbyangs de yang zla ba'i chal thung ngu dang ring po'i dbye ba dang yud tsam gyi dbye ba sngar brjod pas shes par bya'o //
translated: The vowels of the life should be understood by the division of short and long lunar days and the division of moments, as previously stated.

original: gsal byed 'char ba ni dus sbyor gyi chu tshod kyi dbye bas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gsal byed 'char ba ni dus sbyor gyi chu tshod kyi dbye bas shes par bya'o //
translated: The arising of the consonants should be understood by the division of the hours of the lunar mansions.

original: 'dir g-yul du srog gi dbyangs nub par gyur na 'chi zhing yi ge'i dbyangs nub par gyur na rma ste nad pa rnams ni 'chi ba dang nyon mongs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir g-yul du srog gi dbyangs nub par gyur na 'chi zhing yi ge'i dbyangs nub par gyur na rma ste nad pa rnams ni 'chi ba dang nyon mongs pa'o //
translated: Here, if the vowels of the life are set in battle, there is death. If the vowels of the letters are set, there is a wound. The sick are either dying or afflicted.

original: de bzhin du gang la ming gi yi ge dang po la gsal byed med pa de la dbyangs nyid srog gi dbyangs te cig shos ni yi ge'i dbyangs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du gang la ming gi yi ge dang po la gsal byed med pa de la dbyangs nyid srog gi dbyangs te cig shos ni yi ge'i dbyangs so //
translated: In the same way, in the case of a name in which the first letter is not a consonant, the vowel is the life-vowel, and the other is the letter-vowel.

original: de ltar na nang la g-yon dang g-yas kyi sna bug nas dkyil 'khor 'bab pa'i dbye bas gsal byed 'char bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na nang la g-yon dang g-yas kyi sna bug nas dkyil 'khor 'bab pa'i dbye bas gsal byed 'char bar shes par bya'o //
translated: Thus, in the inner, one should know that the consonants arise by the division of the mandala falling from the left and right nostrils.

original: phyi rol du yang dus kyi chu tshod ces pa ni de las dus can 'char ba'i chu tshod phyi rol gyi gza'i gnas dang mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: phyi rol du yang dus kyi chu tshod ces pa ni de las dus can 'char ba'i chu tshod phyi rol gyi gza'i gnas dang mnyam pa'o //
translated: And in the outer, the hour of the time-water is the hour of the arising of the time-possessor, which is equal to the place of the outer planets.

original: gza' gnas ni dkyil 'khor te de dang mnyam pa'i dbyangs bcas gsal byed dang bcas pa dag ni bsgrub par bya ste dge ba dang mi dge ba yongs su shes pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: gza' gnas ni dkyil 'khor te de dang mnyam pa'i dbyangs bcas gsal byed dang bcas pa dag ni bsgrub par bya ste dge ba dang mi dge ba yongs su shes pa'i don du'o //
translated: The place of the planets is the mandala, and the vowels and consonants equal to that are to be accomplished for the purpose of knowing the virtuous and non-virtuous.

original: da ni dris na zhes pa la sogs pas dris pa las dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu gsungs pa dris par gyur na g-yul gyi dus su rab tu 'chi bar 'gyur te stong pa la ni dus dag shar bar gyur pa na'o //
analyzed: da ni dris na zhes pa la sogs pas dris pa las dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu gsungs pa dris par gyur na g-yul gyi dus su rab tu 'chi bar 'gyur te stong pa la ni dus dag shar bar gyur pa na'o //
translated: If asked about the results of virtue and nonvirtue, then at the time of battle, one should die. When the empty [planets] rise,

original: g-yas kyi rtsar stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la dus me shar par gyur pa na g-yul gyi slad du gang zhig dang por 'bod par byed na rgyal po 'am mi bdag de ni rab tu 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: g-yas kyi rtsar stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la dus me shar par gyur pa na g-yul gyi slad du gang zhig dang por 'bod par byed na rgyal po 'am mi bdag de ni rab tu 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: if one first calls out on the right channel, the empty maṇḍala, when the sun of the time fire rises, then the king or lord will die.

original: de bzhin du rlung du ste rlung gi dkyil 'khor du nyi ma shar ba la 'pham par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du rlung du ste rlung gi dkyil 'khor du nyi ma shar ba la 'pham par 'gyur ro //
translated: Similarly, in the wind, on the wind maṇḍala, when the sun rises, there will be defeat.

original: me'i dkyil 'khor las skyes shar bar gyur pa la rma'o //
analyzed: me'i dkyil 'khor las skyes shar bar gyur pa la rma'o //
translated: When the sun rises from the fire maṇḍala, there will be wounds.

original: chu'i dkyil 'khor la bla ma shar ba la ni 'dum par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chu'i dkyil 'khor la bla ma shar ba la ni 'dum par 'gyur ro //
translated: When the sun rises on the water maṇḍala, there will be peace.

original: sa la spen pa shar ba la g-yul du 'thab par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa ni 'dri ba'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: sa la spen pa shar ba la g-yul du 'thab par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa ni 'dri ba'i nges pa'o //
translated: When the sun rises on the earth maṇḍala, there will be no battle in the war. This is the rule of the questions.

original: de bzhin du nad pa la ni stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa la grangs bzhin du 'chi ba dang nyon mongs pa dang rma dang bde ba dang mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur te 'dri byed kyis dris par @209a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du nad pa la ni stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa la grangs bzhin du 'chi ba dang nyon mongs pa dang rma dang bde ba dang mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur te 'dri byed kyis dris par @209a * //
translated: Likewise, for the sick, in the empty maṇḍala of the moon, and so on, death, affliction, wound, happiness, and equality will occur, respectively, when asked by the inquirer.

original: gyur pa na nad pa rnams la 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gyur pa na nad pa rnams la 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: They will occur for the sick.

original: g-yul du dgra ni nges par rab tu nyams /
analyzed: g-yul du dgra ni nges par rab tu nyams /
translated: In battle, the enemy is certainly defeated.

original: 'dir sngar brjod pa'i g-yul du dgra ni nges par rab tu nyams par 'gyur te g-yon gyi rtsar sgra gcan stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la shar na'o //
analyzed: 'dir sngar brjod pa'i g-yul du dgra ni nges par rab tu nyams par 'gyur te g-yon gyi rtsar sgra gcan stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la shar na'o //
translated: Here, in the battle mentioned previously, the enemy is certainly defeated when Rāhu rises in the empty maṇḍala of the left channel.

original: yang yig ni tshig kha bskang ba'i don to ;
analyzed: yang yig ni tshig kha bskang ba'i don to ;
translated: The word “also” has the sense of “and.”

original: / rlung ste rlung gi dkyil 'khor la zla ba shar ba na 'pham par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: / rlung ste rlung gi dkyil 'khor la zla ba shar ba na 'pham par 'gyur ro //
translated: When the moon rises in the maṇḍala of the wind, there is defeat.

original: zla skyes me la shar ba dag pho nyas dris pa na dgra'i rma yang ngo //
analyzed: zla skyes me la shar ba dag pho nyas dris pa na dgra'i rma yang ngo //
translated: When the moon-born [planet] rises in the fire [maṇḍala], there is a wound to the enemy when asked by the messenger.

original: chu'i dkyil 'khor la pa sangs shar ba la don rnyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chu'i dkyil 'khor la pa sangs shar ba la don rnyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: When Venus rises in the maṇḍala of water, one obtains the goal.

original: sa la mjug rings shar ba dag la dang por brjod pa'i dgra yang dbang du 'gyur te /
analyzed: sa la mjug rings shar ba dag la dang por brjod pa'i dgra yang dbang du 'gyur te /
translated: For those born in the ascendant sign, even an enemy at the beginning of the year will come under one’s power.

original: g-yul gyi yul la'o //
analyzed: g-yul gyi yul la'o //
translated: This is in the realm of battle.

original: de bzhin bgrod pa bag ma dag la g-yon gyi lam la gza' rnams kyi ni mang ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur te dri ba byas par gyur na'o zhes pa ste 'dri ba'i dus su sna las 'char ba'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin bgrod pa bag ma dag la g-yon gyi lam la gza' rnams kyi ni mang ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur te dri ba byas par gyur na'o zhes pa ste 'dri ba'i dus su sna las 'char ba'i nges pa'o //
translated: Similarly, for those born in the sign of the bride, the result is that the planets in the left path will be many, if there is questioning. This is the rule for the ascendant.

original: da ni dris pa'i dbyangs gsungs pa pho nyas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: da ni dris pa'i dbyangs gsungs pa pho nyas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Now, the song of the question is stated: “The song of the messenger, etc.”

original: pho nyas brjod pa'i dbyangs rnams gang dag nges par bcu yis bsgyur te zhes pa g-yon dang g-yas kyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyis bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: pho nyas brjod pa'i dbyangs rnams gang dag nges par bcu yis bsgyur te zhes pa g-yon dang g-yas kyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyis bsgyur ba'o //
translated: The songs of the messenger are definitely multiplied by ten, that is, multiplied by the left and right circles.

original: khyim gyi 'khor lo bcu gnyis dag gis bsre'o //
analyzed: khyim gyi 'khor lo bcu gnyis dag gis bsre'o //
translated: They are added to the twelve houses.

original: slar yang de dag 'byung bas snun pa ni lngas bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: slar yang de dag 'byung bas snun pa ni lngas bsgyur ba'o //
translated: Again, they are multiplied by five.

original: nye ba'i skye bo dang ldan mtshan ma mkhan po ma gtogs pa'i nye ba'i skye bo dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: nye ba'i skye bo dang ldan mtshan ma mkhan po ma gtogs pa'i nye ba'i skye bo dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The one endowed with relatives is endowed with relatives except for the astrologer.

original: bdun gyi cha'i lhag ma ni gza'i cha'i lhag ma ste /
analyzed: bdun gyi cha'i lhag ma ni gza'i cha'i lhag ma ste /
translated: The remainder of the seventh part is the remainder of the planet.

original: zla ba ste gza' gcig la gnas pa dang / me ste gza' gsum pa dang / mda' ste gza' lnga pa dang ri bo ste gza' bdun pa la lhag ma la gnas par gyur na mi rnams la grub pa yod pa ma yin te nyi ma dang bkra shis dang phur bu dang spen pa ste mi mnyam pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: zla ba ste gza' gcig la gnas pa dang / me ste gza' gsum pa dang / mda' ste gza' lnga pa dang ri bo ste gza' bdun pa la lhag ma la gnas par gyur na mi rnams la grub pa yod pa ma yin te nyi ma dang bkra shis dang phur bu dang spen pa ste mi mnyam pa rnams la'o //
translated: The moon, which is the first planet, Mars, which is the third planet, Mercury, which is the fifth planet, and Jupiter, which is the seventh planet, if the remainder is situated in the remainder, then there is no success for men, in the uneven ones, the sun, Venus, Saturn, and Rahu.🔽The second planet, Venus, the fourth planet, Jupiter, and the sixth planet, Mercury, if the remainder is situated in the remainder, the very even ones, the moon, Mars, and Jupiter, then the action will be accomplished.

original: mig ste gza' gnyis pa dang / rig byed de gza' bzhi pa dang ro ste drug pa la bya ba 'grub par 'gyur te shin tu mnyam pa'i gnas su gyur pa zla ba dang gza' lag dang pa sangs rnams la lhag ma gnas par gyur na'o zhes pa ste dris pa'i dbyangs kyi nges pa'o
analyzed: mig ste gza' gnyis pa dang / rig byed de gza' bzhi pa dang ro ste drug pa la bya ba 'grub par 'gyur te shin tu mnyam pa'i gnas su gyur pa zla ba dang gza' lag dang pa sangs rnams la lhag ma gnas par gyur na'o zhes pa ste dris pa'i dbyangs kyi nges pa'o
translated: This is the determination of the interrogative svaras.

original: // da ni lo la sogs pa'i khyad par las khyad par gsungs pa lo dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: // da ni lo la sogs pa'i khyad par las khyad par gsungs pa lo dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Now, beginning with the distinction of the year, etc., he speaks of the distinction: the year, etc.

original: lo ste lo drug cu dang / zla ba bcu gnyis dang / phyogs nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang / nyin dang mtshan @209b mo'i dus nyin mtshan dang thun brgyad ni dus sbyor bcu gnyis kyi dbus su rab tu zhugs pa ste /
analyzed: lo ste lo drug cu dang / zla ba bcu gnyis dang / phyogs nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang / nyin dang mtshan @209b mo'i dus nyin mtshan dang thun brgyad ni dus sbyor bcu gnyis kyi dbus su rab tu zhugs pa ste /
translated: The year, the sixty years, the twelve months, the twenty-four half-months, the day and night, the day and night in eight periods, are the twelve two-hour periods, which are the middle of the movement of the planets.

original: de dag la dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu'i slad du dus sbyor dbus su rab tu zhugs shing dus sbyor gyi 'bras bu la nub par 'gyur ba ste 'di dag gi stobs dus sbyor rgyu ba las gzhan pa med do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de dag la dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu'i slad du dus sbyor dbus su rab tu zhugs shing dus sbyor gyi 'bras bu la nub par 'gyur ba ste 'di dag gi stobs dus sbyor rgyu ba las gzhan pa med do zhes pa'o //
translated: They are the middle of the movement of the planets, because of the results of virtue and nonvirtue. They are the results of the two-hour periods. They are the setting of the planets. Their strength is nothing other than the movement of the planets.

original: dus sbyor gcig ni lnga'i dbye bas gza' tshogs dang ldan dbyangs dang bcas pa'i de nyid tha dad du 'gyur te sngar brjod pa'i tshogs so //
analyzed: dus sbyor gcig ni lnga'i dbye bas gza' tshogs dang ldan dbyangs dang bcas pa'i de nyid tha dad du 'gyur te sngar brjod pa'i tshogs so //
translated: One two-hour period, by the division into five, is endowed with the group of planets and the vowels. That is the difference. The group mentioned above.

original: de nyid gcig ni dbugs rnams drug cus mngon lhag yon tan brgya ste sum brgya'i dus kyi chu tshod de chu tshod kyi dkyil 'khor dag la gnas so //
analyzed: de nyid gcig ni dbugs rnams drug cus mngon lhag yon tan brgya ste sum brgya'i dus kyi chu tshod de chu tshod kyi dkyil 'khor dag la gnas so //
translated: One of those, by the sixty breaths, is the excess of one hundred qualities. That is the three hundred two-hour periods. That is the wheel of two-hour periods.

original: chu tshod kyi cha shas chu srang drug cu'o //
analyzed: chu tshod kyi cha shas chu srang drug cu'o //
translated: Sixty palas are one kṣaṇa.

original: de yi cha shas zhes pa chu srang gi cha shas te dbugs drug rnams so /
analyzed: de yi cha shas zhes pa chu srang gi cha shas te dbugs drug rnams so /
translated: The parts of that are the parts of the palas, which are six breaths.

original: mi yi dbang zhes pa ni bod pa ste khyad par las khyad par gyi dbugs kyi stobs nges pa'o //
analyzed: mi yi dbang zhes pa ni bod pa ste khyad par las khyad par gyi dbugs kyi stobs nges pa'o //
translated: The power of the breath is ascertained from the special to the special.

original: da ni dbugs 'byung ba dang 'jug pa'i dbus su mi dge ba dang dge ba'i 'bras bu gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni dbugs 'byung ba dang 'jug pa'i dbus su mi dge ba dang dge ba'i 'bras bu gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the result of virtue and nonvirtue is stated in the middle of the exhalation and inhalation of the breath.

original: dbugs 'byung ba dang 'jug pa dag gi dbus su grangs bzhin du mi dge ba dang dge ba'i 'bras bu ste 'dri ba'i dus su dbugs 'byung ba ste lte ba nas srog phyir 'byung na mi dge ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbugs 'byung ba dang 'jug pa dag gi dbus su grangs bzhin du mi dge ba dang dge ba'i 'bras bu ste 'dri ba'i dus su dbugs 'byung ba ste lte ba nas srog phyir 'byung na mi dge ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro //
translated: In the middle of the exhalation and inhalation of the breath, the result of nonvirtue and virtue is in order. At the time of inquiry, if the exhalation of the breath, the life force leaving from the navel, is nonvirtuous,

original: 'dri ba'i dus su dbugs 'jug pa ste phyi rol nas lte bar srog rab tu 'jug par gyur na dge ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dri ba'i dus su dbugs 'jug pa ste phyi rol nas lte bar srog rab tu 'jug par gyur na dge ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro //
translated: at the time of inquiry, if the inhalation of the breath, the life force entering from outside into the navel, is virtuous.

original: de nyid ni gang zhig rnal 'byor ldan pas shes par byed de gzhan rnams kyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid ni gang zhig rnal 'byor ldan pas shes par byed de gzhan rnams kyis ni ma yin no //
translated: That is known by one who possesses yoga, not by others.

original: lha shes skar rtsis pa rnams kyis kyang dus kyi chu tshod shes par byed de nyin zhag 'das pa'i dbang gis nyi ma zla ba bsgrubs nas te mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i dus sbyor g-yon dang g-yas kyi dkyil 'khor gyi chu tshod phyi rol la bsgrubs nas
analyzed: lha shes skar rtsis pa rnams kyis kyang dus kyi chu tshod shes par byed de nyin zhag 'das pa'i dbang gis nyi ma zla ba bsgrubs nas te mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i dus sbyor g-yon dang g-yas kyi dkyil 'khor gyi chu tshod phyi rol la bsgrubs nas
translated: The astrologers, too, know the time, for they determine the sun and moon by the passing of the day and night, and having determined the unequal and equal periods of the left and right mandalas, they determine the external time.

original: so // da ltar byung ba shes pa min par te de ltar sngar brjod pa dag da ltar byung ba'i dus su shes par gyur pa ma yin par dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu 'jig rten 'dir ni gang brjod pa ;
analyzed: so // da ltar byung ba shes pa min par te de ltar sngar brjod pa dag da ltar byung ba'i dus su shes par gyur pa ma yin par dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu 'jig rten 'dir ni gang brjod pa ;
translated: But they do not know the present, that is, they do not know at the present time what has been said above, namely, the result of virtue and non-virtue in this world.

original: de ni long ba yis kyang long ba bzung nas glang chen seng ges gtams pa'i thibs por rab tu 'jug ces pa ste dge ba dang mi dge ba ston pa'i 'bras bu'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: de ni long ba yis kyang long ba bzung nas glang chen seng ges gtams pa'i thibs por rab tu 'jug ces pa ste dge ba dang mi dge ba ston pa'i 'bras bu'i nges pa'o //
translated: That is, even the blind, having grasped the blind, enter the thick forest filled with elephants and lions. This is the certainty of the result of teaching virtue and non-virtue.

original: da ni dus sbyor gyi sbyor ba gsungs pa phra mo zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: da ni dus sbyor gyi sbyor ba gsungs pa phra mo zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Now, the calculation of the periods is stated beginning with subtle and so on.

original: phra mo'i rnal 'byor mi shes pa la zhes pa ni @210a * //
analyzed: phra mo'i rnal 'byor mi shes pa la zhes pa ni @210a * //
translated: For one who does not know the subtle yoga means

original: sngar brjod pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor dbugs 'byung ba dang 'jug pa'i sbyor ba mi shes par gyur pa la 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gza' yi stobs dang bcas pa'i dus sbyor gyi sbyor ba sbyin pa ni 'char ba'i dus sbyor dang / 'char ba las bdun pa'i dus sbyor la gal te dus kyi me yod na de'i tshe dge ba'i bya ba don du gnyer ba rnams 'chi bar 'gyur ro //🔽gal te nyi ma yod na de'i tshe nad kyis thebs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngar brjod pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor dbugs 'byung ba dang 'jug pa'i sbyor ba mi shes par gyur pa la 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gza' yi stobs dang bcas pa'i dus sbyor gyi sbyor ba sbyin pa ni 'char ba'i dus sbyor dang / 'char ba las bdun pa'i dus sbyor la gal te dus kyi me yod na de'i tshe dge ba'i bya ba don du gnyer ba rnams 'chi bar 'gyur ro // gal te nyi ma yod na de'i tshe nad kyis thebs par 'gyur ro //
translated: for one who does not know the subtle yoga mentioned above, the yoga of exhalation and inhalation of breath, the yoga of the strength of the planets along with the conjunctions of the world is given. If the conjunction of the rising sign and the seventh house conjunction has the time fire, then those who seek virtuous deeds will die.🔽If the sun is present, then they will be afflicted with illness.

original: gal te sa skyes yod na rma 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te sa skyes yod na rma 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If Saturn is present, then wounds will occur.

original: gal te spen pa yod na de'i tshe nor rnam par nyams par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te spen pa yod na de'i tshe nor rnam par nyams par 'gyur te /
translated: If Mars is present, then wealth will be destroyed.

original: de ltar na skye ba'i dus sbyor te 'char ba'i dus sbyor dang bdun pa de la gza' rnams kyis 'di dag thams cad byed pa gang yin pa de'i phyir de dag spang bar bya ste gsal bar bdag gi tshig gis dus sbyor gzhan ni sngags pas rab tu🔽sbyin par bya'o //🔽'dir 'char ba'i dus sbyor dang bdun pa la gal te sgra gcan yod na de'i tshe dgra nyams par 'gyur ro //🔽gal te zla ba yod na de'i tshe rang nyid rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na skye ba'i dus sbyor te 'char ba'i dus sbyor dang bdun pa de la gza' rnams kyis 'di dag thams cad byed pa gang yin pa de'i phyir de dag spang bar bya ste gsal bar bdag gi tshig gis dus sbyor gzhan ni sngags pas rab tu sbyin par bya'o // 'dir 'char ba'i dus sbyor dang bdun pa la gal te sgra gcan yod na de'i tshe dgra nyams par 'gyur ro // gal te zla ba yod na de'i tshe rang nyid rgyas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the seven, the ascendant, the rising sign, and the seven planets, do all this. Therefore, one should avoid them.🔽The other periods are to be given by the mantra practitioner.🔽Here, if Rahu is in the ascendant or the seventh house, then enemies will be harmed.🔽If the moon is there, then one will flourish oneself.🔽

original: gal te yang dag dus sbyor thams cad kyis te gal te slar yang dus sbyor bcu gnyis po zhi ba'i gza' dang bcas par gyur na dge bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te yang dag dus sbyor thams cad kyis te gal te slar yang dus sbyor bcu gnyis po zhi ba'i gza' dang bcas par gyur na dge bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If all the right conjunctions occur, that is, if the twelve conjunctions are with the benefic planets, then it is virtuous.

original: slar yang gal te rang lus g-yon gyi rtsa la gyur pa na /
analyzed: slar yang gal te rang lus g-yon gyi rtsa la gyur pa na /
translated: Moreover, if it is on the left channel of one's body,

original: nges par don ni thams cad 'grub ste /
analyzed: nges par don ni thams cad 'grub ste /
translated: then all goals are definitely accomplished.

original: mtha' dag sa yi steng du dag pa'i gza' dang tshes la'o //
analyzed: mtha' dag sa yi steng du dag pa'i gza' dang tshes la'o //
translated: On the entire earth, the pure planets and lunar days.

original: 'dir dag pa'i gza' ni rgyu skar me bzhi dang nyi ma'o //
analyzed: 'dir dag pa'i gza' ni rgyu skar me bzhi dang nyi ma'o //
translated: Here, the pure planets are the nakṣatras Āśleṣā and Vṛścika and the sun.

original: rgyal dang bla ma'o //
analyzed: rgyal dang bla ma'o //
translated: [The pure planets are] Śukra and Guru.

original: lha mtshams dang gza' lag go //
analyzed: lha mtshams dang gza' lag go //
translated: [The pure planets are] Śravaṇa and Śukra.

original: snar ma dang spen pa'o //🔽gro bzhin dang zla ba'o //🔽tha skar dang bkra shis so //
analyzed: snar ma dang spen pa'o // gro bzhin dang zla ba'o // tha skar dang bkra shis so //
translated: [The pure planets are] Puṣya and Śani.🔽[The pure planets are] Maghā and Candra.🔽[The pure planets are] Aśvinī and Bṛhaspati.

original: nam gru dang pa sangs te grub pa'i sbyor ba'o //🔽'dir mi dge ba ni /
analyzed: nam gru dang pa sangs te grub pa'i sbyor ba'o // 'dir mi dge ba ni /
translated: [The pure planets are] Viśākhā and Budha.

original: lha mtshams dang nyi ma'o //🔽smin drug dang zla ba'o //
analyzed: lha mtshams dang nyi ma'o // smin drug dang zla ba'o //
translated: Here, the inauspicious [planets are] Śravaṇa and Sūrya.

original: mon gru dang sa skyes so //
analyzed: mon gru dang sa skyes so //
translated: [The inauspicious planets are] Mṛgaśira and Candra.🔽[The inauspicious planets are] Viśākhā and Budha.

original: tha skar dang gza' lag go //
analyzed: tha skar dang gza' lag go //
translated: [The inauspicious planets are] Aśvinī and Śukra.

original: mgo dang bla ma'o //
analyzed: mgo dang bla ma'o //
translated: [The inauspicious planets are] Puṣya and Guru.

original: snar @210b ma dang pa sangs so //
analyzed: snar @210b ma dang pa sangs so //
translated: Śravaṇa and Puṣya.

original: me bzhi dang spen pa ste 'di dag ni 'chi ba'i sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: me bzhi dang spen pa ste 'di dag ni 'chi ba'i sbyor ba'o //
translated: Maghā and Mūla. These are the conjunctions of death.

original: sreg pa'i tshes rnams spangs nas gza' thams cad dang tshes thams cad dag pa ste bishti'i longs spyod ni spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: sreg pa'i tshes rnams spangs nas gza' thams cad dang tshes thams cad dag pa ste bishti'i longs spyod ni spang bar bya'o //
translated: Having abandoned the days of burning, all the planets and all the lunar days are pure. The enjoyment of Viṣṭi should be abandoned.

original: 'dir sreg pa'i tshes rnams ni nyi ma dang bcu gnyis pa sreg pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir sreg pa'i tshes rnams ni nyi ma dang bcu gnyis pa sreg pa'o //
translated: Here, the days of burning are the sun and the twelfth day, which burns.

original: zla ba dang bcu gcig pa'o //
analyzed: zla ba dang bcu gcig pa'o //
translated: The moon and the eleventh day.

original: bkra shis dang bcu pa'o //🔽gza' lag dang gsum pa'o //
analyzed: bkra shis dang bcu pa'o // gza' lag dang gsum pa'o //
translated: Bṛhaspati and the tenth day.

original: phur bu dang drug pa'o //🔽pa sangs dang gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: phur bu dang drug pa'o // pa sangs dang gnyis pa'o //
translated: Śukra and the sixth day.

original: spen pa dang bdun pa ste tshes grangs 'di dag dge ba'i bya ba la spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: spen pa dang bdun pa ste tshes grangs 'di dag dge ba'i bya ba la spang bar bya'o //
translated: Śani and the seventh day. These lunar days should be abandoned for virtuous activities.

original: mi dge ba'i bya ba la ni gdug pa'i gza' dang tshes la sogs pa thams cad gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: mi dge ba'i bya ba la ni gdug pa'i gza' dang tshes la sogs pa thams cad gzung bar bya'o //
translated: For non-virtuous activities, all the evil planets, lunar days, and so forth should be taken.

original: 'dir shin tu ltung dang yongs 'joms dang khon 'dzin spangs pa'i sbyor ba thams cad ni dge ba'i bya ba la shis pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir shin tu ltung dang yongs 'joms dang khon 'dzin spangs pa'i sbyor ba thams cad ni dge ba'i bya ba la shis pa ste /
translated: Here, all the practices of avoiding the very bad, the very destructive, and the very harmful are auspicious for virtuous actions.

original: de bzhin du sel ba la chu tshod gsum spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du sel ba la chu tshod gsum spang bar bya'o //
translated: Similarly, for the elimination, the three periods of the day should be avoided.

original: zug rngu la yang lnga spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: zug rngu la yang lnga spang bar bya'o //
translated: For the piercing, the five should be avoided.

original: skrang ba dang shin tu skrang ba la drug go //
analyzed: skrang ba dang shin tu skrang ba la drug go //
translated: For the swelling and the very swelling, the six.

original: kun 'joms dang rdo rje la dgu'o zhes pa ni sbyor ba ma dag pa'o //
analyzed: kun 'joms dang rdo rje la dgu'o zhes pa ni sbyor ba ma dag pa'o //
translated: For the very destructive and the vajra, the nine. This is the impure practice.

original: de bzhin du dag pa'i gza' dang tshes la'o zhes pa ni 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad kyis gza' la sogs pa yongs su dag pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du dag pa'i gza' dang tshes la'o zhes pa ni 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad kyis gza' la sogs pa yongs su dag pa ste /
translated: Similarly, for the pure planets and lunar days. This is the complete purity of the planets and so forth by worldly convention.

original: don dam par sems can rnams kyi sngar bsgrubs pa'i las kyis dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: don dam par sems can rnams kyi sngar bsgrubs pa'i las kyis dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
translated: Ultimately, the results of virtue and nonvirtue are due to the previous karma of sentient beings. This is the definitive statement of the Tathāgata.

original: da ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis skar ma la sogs pa'i stobs gsungs pa rgyu skar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: da ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis skar ma la sogs pa'i stobs gsungs pa rgyu skar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Now, the power of the stars and so forth is taught by worldly convention, beginning with “The stars.”

original: rgyu skar rnams ni cha gsum byas nas zhes pa ni rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun po 'di dag cha gsum ste dgu dang dgu dang dgu yis so //
analyzed: rgyu skar rnams ni cha gsum byas nas zhes pa ni rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun po 'di dag cha gsum ste dgu dang dgu dang dgu yis so //
translated: The constellations are divided into three parts means that these twenty-seven constellations are divided into three groups of nine each.

original: dgu pa de dag so so la nad pa'am g-yul du 'thab mo dag gi skyes pa'i rgyu skar ni dgu dgu las dang po'i ste thog mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dgu pa de dag so so la nad pa'am g-yul du 'thab mo dag gi skyes pa'i rgyu skar ni dgu dgu las dang po'i ste thog mar 'gyur ro //
translated: In each of the nine groups, the first constellation is the cause of illness or battle for men.

original: de nas gcig gis bar du chod pa'i skar ma ni mi mnyam pa'i gnas te mi mnyam pa'i gnas de la gal te gdug pa'i nyi ma dang bkra shis dang spen pa dang dus me rnams ni zla ba dag dang lhan cig tu gyur na de'i tshe nad
analyzed: de nas gcig gis bar du chod pa'i skar ma ni mi mnyam pa'i gnas te mi mnyam pa'i gnas de la gal te gdug pa'i nyi ma dang bkra shis dang spen pa dang dus me rnams ni zla ba dag dang lhan cig tu gyur na de'i tshe nad
translated: The constellation that is one away from that is the uneven place. If the evil planets, the sun, Jupiter, Saturn, and Rahu, are together with the moon, then at that time the ill

original: pa rnams sam @211a * //
analyzed: pa rnams sam @211a * //
translated: The four are the four formless states.🔽

original: g-yul du 'thab mo rnams ni 'chi ba nyid de mnyam pa'i gnas la rgyal ba'o zhes pa ni skar ma'i stobs kyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: g-yul du 'thab mo rnams ni 'chi ba nyid de mnyam pa'i gnas la rgyal ba'o zhes pa ni skar ma'i stobs kyi nges pa'o //
translated: those in battle will die. Victory is in the even places. This is the determination of the power of the stars.🔽Now, the wheel of the hooded ones is stated:

original: da ni gdengs can gyi 'khor lo gsungs pa tha skar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: da ni gdengs can gyi 'khor lo gsungs pa tha skar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The constellations and so on.

original: tha skar la sogs pa rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun rnams kyis rtsa gsum sprul yang spras par gyur pa rgyu skar nam gru nyid kyi bar du ste sdig zla zhes pa sdig pa'i gza' dang zla ba ni sdig zla ste nang  pa'am 'thab mo ba'i skyes🔽pa'i rgyu skar gal te rtsa gcig  ngag la gyur na de'i tshe mi rnams dag ni rnam par nyams te 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes pa rtsa gsum pa gdengs can gyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: tha skar la sogs pa rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun rnams kyis rtsa gsum sprul yang spras par gyur pa rgyu skar nam gru nyid kyi bar du ste sdig zla zhes pa sdig pa'i gza' dang zla ba ni sdig zla ste nang  pa'am 'thab mo ba'i skyes pa'i rgyu skar gal te rtsa gcig  ngag la gyur na de'i tshe mi rnams dag ni rnam par nyams te 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes pa rtsa gsum pa gdengs can gyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'o //
translated: The twenty-seven lunar mansions such as Āśleṣā emanate from the three nāḍīs.🔽If the lunar mansion of the enemy moon, that is, the moon in conjunction with an evil planet, is the first lunar mansion of the month, that is, the lunar mansion of Āśleṣā, then people will be weakened and die.

original: rtsa gsum la smin drug la sogs pa gcig gis bar du chod pa dang de bzhin du rtsa gsum la lag la sogs pa rgyu skar gsum gyis bar du chod pa rnams la zla ba gnas na gang thog mar g-yul gyi sar zhugs pa de rnam par rgyal🔽bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtsa gsum la smin drug la sogs pa gcig gis bar du chod pa dang de bzhin du rtsa gsum la lag la sogs pa rgyu skar gsum gyis bar du chod pa rnams la zla ba gnas na gang thog mar g-yul gyi sar zhugs pa de rnam par rgyal🔽bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If the moon is in the three nāḍīs such as Puṣya, which are separated by one lunar mansion such as Āśleṣā, and in the three nāḍīs such as Hasta, which are separated by three lunar mansions such as Puṣya, then whoever enters the battlefield first will be victorious.

original: rtsa'i phyi rol gyi rgyu skar gsum po rnams la zla ba gnas na gang phyi nas zhugs pa rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni gdengs can gyi 'khor lo gsum pa'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: rtsa'i phyi rol gyi rgyu skar gsum po rnams la zla ba gnas na gang phyi nas zhugs pa rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni gdengs can gyi 'khor lo gsum pa'i nges pa'o //
translated: If the moon is in the three outer constellations, the one who enters last will be victorious.

original: tshe'i gnas skabs kyi 'bras bu gsungs pa drug dang tshes dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: tshe'i gnas skabs kyi 'bras bu gsungs pa drug dang tshes dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The result of the state of life is stated:

original: 'dir rtsibs brgyad pa'i 'khor lo byas la de nas shar nas dbang ldan gyi bar du nyi ma la sogs pa'i gza' rnams kyi longs spyod lo rgya rtsa brgyad dgong par bya ste shar gyi rtsibs la drug go //
analyzed: 'dir rtsibs brgyad pa'i 'khor lo byas la de nas shar nas dbang ldan gyi bar du nyi ma la sogs pa'i gza' rnams kyi longs spyod lo rgya rtsa brgyad dgong par bya ste shar gyi rtsibs la drug go //
translated: Here one should make an eight-spoked wheel and then from east to northeast, the enjoyments of the planets such as the sun should be calculated in years, months, and days. On the eastern spoke, six.

original: mer tshes zhes pa bcva lnga'o //
analyzed: mer tshes zhes pa bcva lnga'o //
translated: In the south, fifteen.

original: gshin rjer brgyad do //
analyzed: gshin rjer brgyad do //
translated: In the southwest, eight.

original: bden bral du ri zla zhes pa bcu bdun no //
analyzed: bden bral du ri zla zhes pa bcu bdun no //
translated: In the west, seventeen.

original: chu ru bcu'o //
analyzed: chu ru bcu'o //
translated: In the northwest, ten.

original: rlung du bcu dgu zhes pa gcig gis  ma tshang ba'i nyi shu'o //
analyzed: rlung du bcu dgu zhes pa gcig gis  ma tshang ba'i nyi shu'o //
