translated: In the north, nineteen, which is twenty minus one.

original: byang du nyi ma zhes pa bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: byang du nyi ma zhes pa bcu gnyis so //
translated: In the northeast, twelve.

original: dbang ldan du nyi shu gcig ste nyi mas drug longs spyod do //
analyzed: dbang ldan du nyi shu gcig ste nyi mas drug longs spyod do //
translated: In the powerful [quarter] twenty-one [years] are enjoyed by the sun, six by Jupiter,

original: zla bas bcva lnga'o //
analyzed: zla bas bcva lnga'o //
translated: fifteen by the moon,

original: mig dmar gyis lo brgyad spyod do //🔽gza' lag gis bcu bdun spyod do //
analyzed: mig dmar gyis lo brgyad spyod do // gza' lag gis bcu bdun spyod do //
translated: eight by Mars,🔽seventeen by Mercury,

original: nyi skyes kyis bcu spyod do //
analyzed: nyi skyes kyis bcu spyod do //
translated: ten by Saturn,

original: bla ma ste phur bus bcu dgu spyod do //
analyzed: bla ma ste phur bus bcu dgu spyod do //
translated: nineteen by the preceptor [Rahu],

original: lag 'gro zhes pa sgra gcan te lo bcu gnyis spyod do //
analyzed: lag 'gro zhes pa sgra gcan te lo bcu gnyis spyod do //
translated: twelve by Ketu, and

original: dkar po ste pa sangs kyis lo nyi shu rtsa gcig @211b spyod do //
analyzed: dkar po ste pa sangs kyis lo nyi shu rtsa gcig @211b spyod do //
translated: twenty-one by Venus.

original: de ltar na lo brgya rtsa brgyad grangs bzhin du nyi ma la sogs pa rnams kyis te de dag rim pas spyod ces so //
analyzed: de ltar na lo brgya rtsa brgyad grangs bzhin du nyi ma la sogs pa rnams kyis te de dag rim pas spyod ces so //
translated: Thus, the sun and so forth enjoy [the years] in order, one hundred and eight in number.

original: slar yang de dang nang gi gnas skabs la zhes pa ste 'dir rags pa'i gnas skabs la drag po rnams kyis zhi ba min pa byed de nyi ma dang bkra shis dang spen pa dang sgra gcan rnams kyis so //
analyzed: slar yang de dang nang gi gnas skabs la zhes pa ste 'dir rags pa'i gnas skabs la drag po rnams kyis zhi ba min pa byed de nyi ma dang bkra shis dang spen pa dang sgra gcan rnams kyis so //
translated: Again, in the inner situation, in this case, the gross situation, the fierce ones make it inauspicious, namely, the sun, Bṛhaspati, Śukra, and Rāhu.

original: zhi ba rnams kyis zhi ba byed de zla ba dang gza' lag dang phur bu dang pa sangs rnams kyis so zhes grag go //
analyzed: zhi ba rnams kyis zhi ba byed de zla ba dang gza' lag dang phur bu dang pa sangs rnams kyis so zhes grag go //
translated: The pacifying planets are pacifying: the moon, Mercury, Jupiter, and Venus.

original: 'dir lo drug la sogs pa gnas skabs gcig la slar yang nang gi gnas skabs rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir lo drug la sogs pa gnas skabs gcig la slar yang nang gi gnas skabs rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, in one period of six years, there are again eight internal periods.

original: de dang nang gi gnas skabs la yang de las sde pa brgyad po rnams kyi yi ge dag gis zhes pa la /
analyzed: de dang nang gi gnas skabs la yang de las sde pa brgyad po rnams kyi yi ge dag gis zhes pa la /
translated: And in those, the eight groups of letters are used.

original: 'dir sde pa'i yi ge rnams ni rnam pa gnyis te gcig ni 'jig rten la grags pa'i brjod pas yin la gzhan ni rang byung gi brjod pas so //
analyzed: 'dir sde pa'i yi ge rnams ni rnam pa gnyis te gcig ni 'jig rten la grags pa'i brjod pas yin la gzhan ni rang byung gi brjod pas so //
translated: Here, the letters of the groups are of two kinds: one is by worldly expression, and the other is by natural expression.

original: 'dir 'jig rten pa'i brjod pas aa'i sde pa ni aa ai au ae ao ste aa ai ri au li ka ces pa ni rigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir 'jig rten pa'i brjod pas aa'i sde pa ni aa ai au ae ao ste aa ai ri au li ka ces pa ni rigs pa'o //
translated: Here, by worldly expression, the group of a is a ai au e ai o, and the group of a is a i ri u li ka.

original: ka'i sde pa ni ka kha ga gha nga ste /
analyzed: ka'i sde pa ni ka kha ga gha nga ste /
translated: The group of ka is ka kha ga gha ṅga.

original: de bzhin du rtsa'i sde pa dang / ta'i sde pa dang / ta'i sde pa dang / pa'i sde pa dang / ya'i sde pa ya ra la wa dang / sha'i sde pa sha sha sa ha zhes pa ni 'jig rten pa'i brjod pas so //
analyzed: de bzhin du rtsa'i sde pa dang / ta'i sde pa dang / ta'i sde pa dang / pa'i sde pa dang / ya'i sde pa ya ra la wa dang / sha'i sde pa sha sha sa ha zhes pa ni 'jig rten pa'i brjod pas so //
translated: , and so on, are [called] worldly expressions.

original: ha ya wa ra la na /
analyzed: ha ya wa ra la na /
translated: ha ya va ra la

original: nya ma nga na na ma /
analyzed: nya ma nga na na ma /
translated: na ma ṅa na na

original: dzha bha nya /🔽gha dha dha sha /
analyzed: dzha bha nya / gha dha dha sha /
translated: jha bha nya🔽gha dha dha śa🔽ja bha ga da da śa

original: dza ba ga da da sha / kha pha cha tha tha tsa ta ta ba /
analyzed: dza ba ga da da sha / kha pha cha tha tha tsa ta ta ba /
translated: kha pha cha tha tha

original: ka pa ya /
analyzed: ka pa ya /
translated: ca ta ta ya🔽śa śa sa

original: sha sha sar zhes pa la sogs pa ni nam mkha' la sogs pa'i rigs pa'o //
analyzed: sha sha sar zhes pa la sogs pa ni nam mkha' la sogs pa'i rigs pa'o //
translated: and so on, are the classes of space and so forth.

original: 'di nyid la nam mkha' la sogs pas sde pa'i yi ge rnams yongs su dag pa med de bde byed spros pas brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di nyid la nam mkha' la sogs pas sde pa'i yi ge rnams yongs su dag pa med de bde byed spros pas brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In this very [system], the letters of the classes of space and so forth are not pure, because they are expressed by the proliferation of bliss.

original: 'dir yang aa ai ri au li zhes pa ni nyi ma'i rags pa'i gnas skabs lo drug dang nang gi gnas skabs la rnam pa brgyad longs spyod do //
analyzed: 'dir yang aa ai ri au li zhes pa ni nyi ma'i rags pa'i gnas skabs lo drug dang nang gi gnas skabs la rnam pa brgyad longs spyod do //
translated: Here also, a ai ri u li are enjoyed in the outer state of the sun for six years and in the inner state for eight years.

original: de bzhin du ha ya wa ra la na zhes pa ni zla ba'i lo bcva lnga dang nang gi gnas skabs la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du ha ya wa ra la na zhes pa ni zla ba'i lo bcva lnga dang nang gi gnas skabs la'o //
translated: Likewise, ha ya wa ra la na is the fifteenth year of the moon and the inner condition.

original: nga gha ga kha ka ni bkra shis kyi lo brgyad dang nang gi gnas skabs la'o //
analyzed: nga gha ga kha ka ni bkra shis kyi lo brgyad dang nang gi gnas skabs la'o //
translated: Na gha ga kha ka is the eighth year of Bṛhaspati and the inner condition.

original: nya dzha dza tsha tsa ni gza' lag gi lo bcu bdun dang nang gi gnas skabs la'o //
analyzed: nya dzha dza tsha tsa ni gza' lag gi lo bcu bdun dang nang gi gnas skabs la'o //
translated: Nya jha ja jha cha is the seventeenth year of Mars and the inner condition.

original: na dha da tha ta ni spen pa'i lo bcu dang nang gi gnas skabs la'o //🔽ma bha ba pha pa ni phur @212a * //
analyzed: na dha da tha ta ni spen pa'i lo bcu dang nang gi gnas skabs la'o // ma bha ba pha pa ni phur @212a * //
translated: Na dha da tha ta is the tenth year of Saturn and the inner condition.

original: bu'i lo bcu dgu dang nang gi gnas skabs la'o //
analyzed: bu'i lo bcu dgu dang nang gi gnas skabs la'o //
translated: Ma bha ba pha pa is the nineteenth year of Rāhu and the inner condition.

original: na dha da tha ta ni sgra gcan gyi lo bcu gnyis dang nang gi gnas skabs la'o //
analyzed: na dha da tha ta ni sgra gcan gyi lo bcu gnyis dang nang gi gnas skabs la'o //
translated: Na dha da tha ta is the twelfth year of Ketu and the inner condition.

original: thka sha sha  wa sa ni dkar po'i lo nyi shu rtsa gcig dang nang gi gnas skabs la rnam pa brgyad longs spyod do //
analyzed: thka sha sha  wa sa ni dkar po'i lo nyi shu rtsa gcig dang nang gi gnas skabs la rnam pa brgyad longs spyod do //
translated: Tha ka śa ṣa sa ha is the twenty-first year of Śukra and the inner condition.

original: de bzhin du sde pa'i rang bzhin ni nyi ma dang zla ba dang nam mkha' dang rlung dang me dang chu dang sa dang / ye shes kyi khams kyi rang bzhin te rim pa bzhin du yi ge lnga lnga'i bdag nyid kyi sde pa brgyad po rnams so //
analyzed: de bzhin du sde pa'i rang bzhin ni nyi ma dang zla ba dang nam mkha' dang rlung dang me dang chu dang sa dang / ye shes kyi khams kyi rang bzhin te rim pa bzhin du yi ge lnga lnga'i bdag nyid kyi sde pa brgyad po rnams so //
translated: Likewise, the nature of the houses is the nature of the elements of sun, moon, space, wind, fire, water, earth, and intuition, which are the eight houses, each with the nature of five syllables.

original: gang du ae ao aa ra a'a ra aa la a'a la yod pa der rtsa ba'i rang bzhin gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang du ae ao aa ra a'a ra aa la a'a la yod pa der rtsa ba'i rang bzhin gzung bar bya'o //
translated: Where there is e ai o au aṃ aḥ, there one should take the nature of the root.

original: de ltar sde pa brgyad kyi yi ge rnams las yi ge lnga rnams la nyi ma la sogs pa rnams lo drug la sogs pa rnams la dbyangs kyis yud tsam dang / gsal byed kyis dkyil 'khor longs spyod de /
analyzed: de ltar sde pa brgyad kyi yi ge rnams las yi ge lnga rnams la nyi ma la sogs pa rnams lo drug la sogs pa rnams la dbyangs kyis yud tsam dang / gsal byed kyis dkyil 'khor longs spyod de /
translated: Thus, from among the syllables of the eight houses, the five syllables are the sun and so forth, and the vowels are the moments in the six years and so forth, and the consonants are the enjoyments of the maṇḍala.

original: lnga pa rnam par phye ba las so //
analyzed: lnga pa rnam par phye ba las so //
translated: The fifth is the analysis.

original: cha brgyad kyis lo drug la sogs pa rnams kyi nang gi gnas skabs la'o zhes pa ni /
analyzed: cha brgyad kyis lo drug la sogs pa rnams kyi nang gi gnas skabs la'o zhes pa ni /
translated: The eight parts are the internal states of the six years and so forth.

original: gnas skabs kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: gnas skabs kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'o //
translated: This is the definition of the wheel of states.

original: gzi'i longs spyod so so'i dang po'i cha la tshe'i gnas skabs kyi bdag po ste de nas gzhan bdun po go rims bzhin no zhes pa ni tshe'i gnas skabs kyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: gzi'i longs spyod so so'i dang po'i cha la tshe'i gnas skabs kyi bdag po ste de nas gzhan bdun po go rims bzhin no zhes pa ni tshe'i gnas skabs kyi nges pa'o //
translated: The enjoyment of the first part of each of the signs is the lord of the stage of life. The other seven are in order. This is the determination of the stage of life.

original: da ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the dependent origination is stated:

original: rgyal zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rgyal zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: “The month of Jyeṣṭha,” and so on.

original: rgyal gyi zla bar zhes pa rgyal 'das shing mchu 'jug pa'i nyin zhag la ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal gyi zla bar zhes pa rgyal 'das shing mchu 'jug pa'i nyin zhag la ma rig pa'o //
translated: The day of the conjunction of Jyeṣṭha and Mūla is ignorance.

original: 'dir chu srin la sogs pa'i khyim gyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir chu srin la sogs pa'i khyim gyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'o //
translated: Here, the wheel of the houses of Capricorn and so on has twelve spokes.

original: de la dang po'i rtsibs la /
analyzed: de la dang po'i rtsibs la /
translated: On the first spoke,

original: chu srin te der nyi ma son pa la'o //
analyzed: chu srin te der nyi ma son pa la'o //
translated: Capricorn, the sun has entered there.

original: bum par nyi ma mchu la yang /
analyzed: bum par nyi ma mchu la yang /
translated: In Aquarius and in Libra,

original: yang yig gis mchu'i mtha' 'di nyid du dbo 'jug pa'i nyin zhag la 'du byed do //
analyzed: yang yig gis mchu'i mtha' 'di nyid du dbo 'jug pa'i nyin zhag la 'du byed do //
translated: the word “also” indicates that in the end of Libra, the day of the conjunction of Virgo, is formation.

original: de bzhin du dbo'i mtha' nag pa'i dang po nya'i nyin zhag la rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dbo'i mtha' nag pa'i dang po nya'i nyin zhag la rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Similarly, at the end of Virgo, the first day of Libra, is consciousness.

original: de bzhin du nag pa'i mtha' sa ga'i dang po lug gi nyin zhag la ming dang gzugs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du nag pa'i mtha' sa ga'i dang po lug gi nyin zhag la ming dang gzugs so //
translated: In the same way, in the first day of the Sheep, which is the first day of the dark half of Śravaṇa, there is name-and-form.

original: de bzhin du sa ga'i mtha' snron gyi dang po glang gi nyin zhag la skye mched drug go //
analyzed: de bzhin du sa ga'i mtha' snron gyi dang po glang gi nyin zhag la skye mched drug go //
translated: In the same way, in the first day of the Ox, which is the first day of the bright half of Aśvayuj, there are the six sense spheres.

original: de bzhin du snron gyi mtha' chu stod kyi dang po 'khrig pa'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la reg pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du snron gyi mtha' chu stod kyi dang po 'khrig pa'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la reg pa'o //
translated: In the same way, in the first day of the Twin, which is the first day of the dark half of Bhadrapada, there is contact.

original: de bzhin du chu stod kyi mtha' gro @212b bzhin gyi dang po ka rka ta'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la tshor ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du chu stod kyi mtha' gro @212b bzhin gyi dang po ka rka ta'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la tshor ba'o //
translated: In the same way, in the first day of the Crab, which is the first day of the bright half of Aśvayuj, there is feeling.

original: de bzhin du gro bzhin gyi mtha' khrums kyi dang po seng ge'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la sred pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gro bzhin gyi mtha' khrums kyi dang po seng ge'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la sred pa'o //
translated: In the same way, in the first day of the Lion, which is the first day of the dark half of Kārtika, there is craving.

original: de bzhin du khrums kyi mtha' tha skar gyi dang po bu mo'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la len pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du khrums kyi mtha' tha skar gyi dang po bu mo'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la len pa'o //
translated: In the same way, in the first day of the Maiden, which is the first day of the bright half of Mārgaśīrṣa, there is grasping.

original: de bzhin du tha skar gyi mtha' smin drug gi dang po srang gi 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la srid pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du tha skar gyi mtha' smin drug gi dang po srang gi 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la srid pa'o //
translated: In the same way, in the first day of the Libra, which is the first day of the dark half of Pauṣa, there is existence.

original: de bzhin du smin drug gi mtha' mgo'i dang po sdig pa'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la skye ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du smin drug gi mtha' mgo'i dang po sdig pa'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la skye ba'o //
translated: Likewise, on the day of the movement of the first of the head, which is the last of the asterism Hasta, there is birth.

original: de bzhin du mgo'i mtha' rgyal gyi dang po gzhu'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la rga shi ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du mgo'i mtha' rgyal gyi dang po gzhu'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la rga shi ste /
translated: Likewise, on the day of the movement of the first of the bow, which is the last of the head, there is old age and death.

original: rtsibs bcu gnyis po rnams la rim pa bzhin yan lag bcu gnyis po rnams shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rtsibs bcu gnyis po rnams la rim pa bzhin yan lag bcu gnyis po rnams shes par bya'o //
translated: The twelve branches should be understood in order on the twelve spokes.

original: nyi ma'i dbye ba dang zla ba'i dbye ba ni rgyal gyi tshes gcig la sogs pas thams cad du rab tu grags so //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dbye ba dang zla ba'i dbye ba ni rgyal gyi tshes gcig la sogs pas thams cad du rab tu grags so //
translated: The division of the sun and the division of the moon are well known everywhere by the first of the bright fortnight and so on.

original: gnyis ka'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis zhes pa ni 'pho ba'i bgrod pa'i dbang dang zla ba'i phyogs dang tshes kyi bgrod pa'i dbang gis te yan lag bcu gnyis po rnams so //
analyzed: gnyis ka'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis zhes pa ni 'pho ba'i bgrod pa'i dbang dang zla ba'i phyogs dang tshes kyi bgrod pa'i dbang gis te yan lag bcu gnyis po rnams so //
translated: By the power of the movement of both is by the power of the movement of the asterisms and by the power of the movement of the lunar day and the lunar mansion.

original: rgyal dang mchu yi mtshams su chu srin dag la nyi ma gnas pa'i gza' de la ni ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal dang mchu yi mtshams su chu srin dag la nyi ma gnas pa'i gza' de la ni ma rig pa'o //
translated: At the conjunction of the asterisms Hasta and Citra, when the sun is in the sign of Capricorn, that is ignorance.

original: nyin zhag de nas nyin zhag gnyis pa la rga shi'o //
analyzed: nyin zhag de nas nyin zhag gnyis pa la rga shi'o //
translated: On the second day from that day, there is old age and death.

original: gza' gsum pa la skye ba'o //
analyzed: gza' gsum pa la skye ba'o //
translated: On the third day, birth.

original: bzhi pa la srid pa'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa la srid pa'o //
translated: On the fourth, existence.

original: lnga pa la len pa'o //
analyzed: lnga pa la len pa'o //
translated: On the fifth, grasping.

original: drug pa la sred pa'o //
analyzed: drug pa la sred pa'o //
translated: On the sixth, craving.

original: bdun pa la tshor ba'o //
analyzed: bdun pa la tshor ba'o //
translated: On the seventh, feeling.

original: brgyad pa la reg pa'o //
analyzed: brgyad pa la reg pa'o //
translated: On the eighth, contact.

original: dgu pa la skye mched drug go //
analyzed: dgu pa la skye mched drug go //
translated: On the ninth, the six sense bases.

original: bcu pa la ming dang gzugs so //
analyzed: bcu pa la ming dang gzugs so //
translated: On the tenth, name and form.

original: bcu gcig pa la rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: bcu gcig pa la rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: On the eleventh, consciousness.

original: bcu gnyis pa la 'du byed do //
analyzed: bcu gnyis pa la 'du byed do //
translated: On the twelfth, formation.

original: gza' gsum pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du bcu gsum pa la skye ba'o //
analyzed: gza' gsum pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du bcu gsum pa la skye ba'o //
translated: Just as on the third day, so on the thirteenth, birth.

original: bcu bzhi pa la srid pa'o //
analyzed: bcu bzhi pa la srid pa'o //
translated: On the fourteenth, existence.

original: bco lnga pa la len pa'o //
analyzed: bco lnga pa la len pa'o //
translated: On the fifteenth, grasping.

original: res 'ga' gza' bcu drug pa la yang sred pa'o //
analyzed: res 'ga' gza' bcu drug pa la yang sred pa'o //
translated: Sometimes, on the sixteenth day, craving.

original: nyi ma'i bgrod pa'i dbye bas yan lag rnams te /
analyzed: nyi ma'i bgrod pa'i dbye bas yan lag rnams te /
translated: The limbs are by the division of the sun’s path.

original: 'pho ba'i phyogs 'ga' zhig la gza' bcu drug tu 'gyur ro zhes pa ste /
analyzed: 'pho ba'i phyogs 'ga' zhig la gza' bcu drug tu 'gyur ro zhes pa ste /
translated: In some directions of the movement, there are sixteen days.

original: g-yas kyi rtsal chu srin gyi dus sbyor mnyam pa'i dbang gis so //
analyzed: g-yas kyi rtsal chu srin gyi dus sbyor mnyam pa'i dbang gis so //
translated: By the power of the equal zodiac of Capricorn in the right channel.

original: de bzhin du mchu dang dbo'i mtshams su bum par nyi ma son pa'i gza' de la 'du byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin du mchu dang dbo'i mtshams su bum par nyi ma son pa'i gza' de la 'du byed do //
translated: In the same way, in the interval between the lips and the nose, the planets which have entered the zodiacal sign of the vase, are the formations.

original: gnyis pa la rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa la rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: In the second, consciousness.

original: gsum pa la ming dang gzugs so //
analyzed: gsum pa la ming dang gzugs so //
translated: In the third, name-and-form.

original: @213a * // bzhi pa la skye mched drug go //
analyzed: @213a * // bzhi pa la skye mched drug go //
translated: In the fourth, the six sense-spheres.

original: lnga pa la reg pa'o //
analyzed: lnga pa la reg pa'o //
translated: In the fifth, contact.

original: drug pa la tshor ba'o //
analyzed: drug pa la tshor ba'o //
translated: In the sixth, feeling.

original: bdun pa la sred pa'o //
analyzed: bdun pa la sred pa'o //
translated: In the seventh, craving.

original: brgyad pa la len pa'o //
analyzed: brgyad pa la len pa'o //
translated: In the eighth, grasping.

original: dgu pa la srid pa'o //
analyzed: dgu pa la srid pa'o //
translated: In the ninth, becoming.

original: bcu pa la skye ba'o //
analyzed: bcu pa la skye ba'o //
translated: In the tenth, birth.

original: bcu gcig pa la rga shi'o //
analyzed: bcu gcig pa la rga shi'o //
translated: In the eleventh, old age and death.

original: bcu gnyis pa la ma rig pa ste ;
analyzed: bcu gnyis pa la ma rig pa ste ;
translated: In the twelfth, ignorance.

original: g-yon gyi char bum pa'i dus sbyor mi mnyam pa'i dbang gis spro ba'i rim pas so //
analyzed: g-yon gyi char bum pa'i dus sbyor mi mnyam pa'i dbang gis spro ba'i rim pas so //
translated: In the left half, the zodiacal sign of the vase, by the power of the unequal planets, in the order of expansion.

original: 'dir gsum pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du bcu gsum pa la ming dang gzugs so //
analyzed: 'dir gsum pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du bcu gsum pa la ming dang gzugs so //
translated: Here, as in the third, so in the thirteenth, name-and-form.

original: bcu bzhi pa la skye mched drug go //
analyzed: bcu bzhi pa la skye mched drug go //
translated: In the fourteenth, the six sense-spheres.

original: bco lnga pa la reg pa'o //
analyzed: bco lnga pa la reg pa'o //
translated: In the fifteenth, contact.

original: kha cig tu bcu drug pa la tshor ba'o //
analyzed: kha cig tu bcu drug pa la tshor ba'o //
translated: In some, in the sixteenth, feeling.

original: de ltar thams cad du nyi ma dang zla ba'i rgyu ba mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa'i dbye bas shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar thams cad du nyi ma dang zla ba'i rgyu ba mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa'i dbye bas shes par bya ste /
translated: Thus, the movement of the sun and moon should be understood everywhere by the division of equal and unequal.

original: gnyis ka'i phyogs kyi 'pho ba la gza'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: gnyis ka'i phyogs kyi 'pho ba la gza'i dbye bas so //
translated: The movement of both sides is by the division of the planets.

original: 'dir ma rig pa la sogs pa'i yan lag mi mnyam pa ni zhi ba'i bya ba kun la dge ba ste /
analyzed: 'dir ma rig pa la sogs pa'i yan lag mi mnyam pa ni zhi ba'i bya ba kun la dge ba ste /
translated: Here, the unequal members such as ignorance are virtuous in all actions of pacification.

original: ma rig pa dang rnam par shes pa dang skye mched drug dang tshor ba dang len pa dang skye ba ni mi mnyam pa'i yan lag go //
analyzed: ma rig pa dang rnam par shes pa dang skye mched drug dang tshor ba dang len pa dang skye ba ni mi mnyam pa'i yan lag go //
translated: Ignorance, consciousness, the six sense bases, feeling, grasping, and birth are the unequal members.

original: gang zhig 'du byed la sogs pa mnyam pa ni zhi ba'i bya ba la mi dge ba ste /
analyzed: gang zhig 'du byed la sogs pa mnyam pa ni zhi ba'i bya ba la mi dge ba ste /
translated: That which is equal, such as formation, is non-virtuous in the action of pacification.

original: 'du byed dang ming dang gzugs dang reg pa dang sred pa dang srid pa dang rga shi ni mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: 'du byed dang ming dang gzugs dang reg pa dang sred pa dang srid pa dang rga shi ni mnyam pa ste /
translated: Formation, name-and-form, contact, craving, becoming, and old age and death are the equal ones.

original: mnyam pa ni drag po'i las la shis par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mnyam pa ni drag po'i las la shis par 'gyur ro //
translated: The equal one becomes auspicious for fierce action.

original: de bzhin du rgyal gyi zla ba'i dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig la ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rgyal gyi zla ba'i dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig la ma rig pa'o //
translated: Similarly, on the first day of the bright fortnight of Jyeṣṭha, it is ignorance.

original: gnyis pa la 'du byed de spro ba'i rim pas so //
analyzed: gnyis pa la 'du byed de spro ba'i rim pas so //
translated: In the second, the formation, because of the process of expansion.

original: nag po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig la ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: nag po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig la ma rig pa'o //
translated: On the first day of the dark half of the month, ignorance.

original: gnyis pa la rga shi ste /
analyzed: gnyis pa la rga shi ste /
translated: On the second, old age and death.

original: de ltar nye bar sdud pa'i rim pas tshes bcu gnyis po rnams la yan lag bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: de ltar nye bar sdud pa'i rim pas tshes bcu gnyis po rnams la yan lag bcu gnyis so //
translated: Thus, in the process of contraction, the twelve branches are in the twelve days.

original: rgyal gyi zla ba la dkar po dang nag po'i phyogs kyi dbye bas ma rig pa la sogs pa'i yan lag rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du mchu la dkar po dang nag po'i phyogs kyi dbye bas 'du byed la sogs pa rnams spro ba dang bsdu ba'i
analyzed: rgyal gyi zla ba la dkar po dang nag po'i phyogs kyi dbye bas ma rig pa la sogs pa'i yan lag rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du mchu la dkar po dang nag po'i phyogs kyi dbye bas 'du byed la sogs pa rnams spro ba dang bsdu ba'i
translated: In the month of Jyaistha, the branches such as ignorance are in the white and black halves of the month, just as they are in the branches of formation, etc., in the white and black halves of the month of Ashadha.

original: dbye bas rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: dbye bas rtogs par bya'o //
translated: They should be understood in the process of expansion and contraction.

original: de bzhin du dbo la sogs pa'i dkar po dang nag po'i phyogs rnams la rnam par shes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du dbo la sogs pa'i dkar po dang nag po'i phyogs rnams la rnam par shes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: In the same way, in the white and black halves of the month of Sravana, etc., there are the twelve branches such as consciousness.

original: yan lag bcu gnyis rnams so sor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yan lag bcu gnyis rnams so sor 'gyur ro //
translated: The twelve branches are in each of the white and black halves of the month.

original: 'dir 'jig rten pa'i tha @213b snyad kyis skar rtsis shes pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du mngon par shes pa dang bral ba rnams kyis shes par bya'o zhes pa ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i nges pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir 'jig rten pa'i tha @213b snyad kyis skar rtsis shes pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du mngon par shes pa dang bral ba rnams kyis shes par bya'o zhes pa ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i nges pa ste /
translated: Here, just as one who knows astrology by means of worldly convention, so should those who are devoid of superknowledge understand. This is the certainty of dependent origination.

original: des na rgyas par ma gsungs so //
analyzed: des na rgyas par ma gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is not stated extensively.

original: da ni sa'i stobs gsungs pa nyi ma zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: da ni sa'i stobs gsungs pa nyi ma zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Now, the power of the earth is stated: sun, etc.

original: 'dir sa'i dkyil 'khor phyogs brgyad kyi bdag nyid dang khyim gyi 'khor lo la gza'i 'khor lo 'khor ba shes nas /
analyzed: 'dir sa'i dkyil 'khor phyogs brgyad kyi bdag nyid dang khyim gyi 'khor lo la gza'i 'khor lo 'khor ba shes nas /
translated: Here, having known the movement of the planets in the circle of the houses, which has the nature of the eight directions of the circle of the earth,

original: sa'i phyogs brgyad po de dag la gang du nyi ma mig dmar mjug rings spen pa thams cad g-yas te /
analyzed: sa'i phyogs brgyad po de dag la gang du nyi ma mig dmar mjug rings spen pa thams cad g-yas te /
translated: in those eight directions of the earth, wherever the sun, Mars, Saturn, and Rāhu are to the right,

original: g-yas sam rgyab tu yang dag gnas pas dgra ni 'chi bar byed de dgra rnams kyi mdun dang g-yon du gnas pas 'chi bar byed do //
analyzed: g-yas sam rgyab tu yang dag gnas pas dgra ni 'chi bar byed de dgra rnams kyi mdun dang g-yon du gnas pas 'chi bar byed do //
translated: to the right or the back, they cause death to the enemy; they cause death to the enemy who is in front or to the left.

original: g-yon dang mdun du zhi ba'i rang bzhin gza' tshogs mtha' dag g-yul gyi sar ni de bzhin kho na dgra ni 'chi bar byed de zla ba dang gza' lag dang pa sangs dang bla ma ni zhi ba'i rang bzhin gza' tshogs te dgra rnams kyi g-yas dang rgyab
analyzed: g-yon dang mdun du zhi ba'i rang bzhin gza' tshogs mtha' dag g-yul gyi sar ni de bzhin kho na dgra ni 'chi bar byed de zla ba dang gza' lag dang pa sangs dang bla ma ni zhi ba'i rang bzhin gza' tshogs te dgra rnams kyi g-yas dang rgyab
translated: On the left and in front, the entire host of planets of a peaceful nature, in the same way, on the battlefield, kill the enemies. The moon, Mars, Mercury, and Jupiter are the entire host of planets of a peaceful nature.

original: na gnas na dgra ni 'chi bar byed do zhes pa nges pa'o //
analyzed: na gnas na dgra ni 'chi bar byed do zhes pa nges pa'o //
translated: If they are located on the right and in the back of the enemies, they kill the enemies.🔽This is the rule.

original: de bzhin du 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rnal 'byor ma dang bi shti drag po rlung dang bcas pa g-yas dang rgyab tu bde ba sbyin pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rnal 'byor ma dang bi shti drag po rlung dang bcas pa g-yas dang rgyab tu bde ba sbyin pa ste /
translated: In the same way, the yoginis and Visakha, along with fierce winds, on the right and in the back, bestow happiness.

original: dgra rnams kyi g-yon dang mdun du gnas pas 'chi bar byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dgra rnams kyi g-yon dang mdun du gnas pas 'chi bar byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: If they are located on the left and in front of the enemies, they will kill them.

original: mnyam dang mi mnyam gyur pa ste /
analyzed: mnyam dang mi mnyam gyur pa ste /
translated: Equal and unequal.

original: drag po phyed dgra rnams kyi g-yas dang rgyab tu yin la drag po phyed ni ma yin zhing zhi ba phyed g-yon dang mdun du yin la zhi ba phyed ni ma yin pa de'i tshe gnyis ka'i dbung ni 'joms par 'gyur te /
analyzed: drag po phyed dgra rnams kyi g-yas dang rgyab tu yin la drag po phyed ni ma yin zhing zhi ba phyed g-yon dang mdun du yin la zhi ba phyed ni ma yin pa de'i tshe gnyis ka'i dbung ni 'joms par 'gyur te /
translated: When half of Rudra is on the right and back of the enemies, and not half of Rudra, and half of Shiva is on the left and front, and not half of Shiva, then the armies of both are destroyed.

original: gnyis ka'i dpung rnams 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis ka'i dpung rnams 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
translated: It is certain that the armies of both die.

original: da ni tshangs ma la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi stobs gsungs pa tshangs ma zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: da ni tshangs ma la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi stobs gsungs pa tshangs ma zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Now, the power of the yoginis, Brahma, etc., is stated: Brahma, etc.

original: 'dir dkar po'i phyogs sam nag po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig la brgya byin du tshangs ma'o //
analyzed: 'dir dkar po'i phyogs sam nag po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig la brgya byin du tshangs ma'o //
translated: Here, on the first day of the bright or dark fortnight, Brahma is in Indra.

original: gnyis pa la gnod sbyin du drag mo'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa la gnod sbyin du drag mo'o //
translated: On the second day, Rudra is in Yaksha.

original: gsum pa la me'i mtshams su gzhon nu ma'o //
analyzed: gsum pa la me'i mtshams su gzhon nu ma'o //
translated: On the third day, Kumari is in Agni.

original: bzhi pa la bden bral du khyab 'jug ma'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa la bden bral du khyab 'jug ma'o //
translated: On the fourth day, Vishnu is in Raktasa.

original: lnga pa la gshin rjer phag mo'o //
analyzed: lnga pa la gshin rjer phag mo'o //
translated: On the fifth day, Varahi is in Yama.

original: drug pa la chur dbang mo'o //
analyzed: drug pa la chur dbang mo'o //
translated: On the sixth day, Ishvari is in Varuna.

original: bdun pa la rlung du ts'a mu nd'a'o //
analyzed: bdun pa la rlung du ts'a mu nd'a'o //
translated: On the seventh day, Chamunda is in Vayu.

original: brgyad pa la dbang ldan du dpal mo chen @214a * //
analyzed: brgyad pa la dbang ldan du dpal mo chen @214a * //
translated: In the eighth, in the direction of Indra, is Śrīmahādevī.

original: mo ste nor gyi tshes la zhes pa brgyad kyi tshes la'o //
analyzed: mo ste nor gyi tshes la zhes pa brgyad kyi tshes la'o //
translated: On the eighth day of the fortnight, that is, on the eighth day of the lunar month.

original: dang po ni tshes gcig la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dang po ni tshes gcig la sogs pa'o //
translated: The first is the first day of the lunar fortnight, and so on.

original: dgu pa la zhes pa ni slar yang dgu pa la brgya byin du tshangs ma'o //
analyzed: dgu pa la zhes pa ni slar yang dgu pa la brgya byin du tshangs ma'o //
translated: In the ninth, again on the ninth day, is Brahmāṇī in Indra’s direction.

original: bcu pa la gnod sbyin du drag mo'o //
analyzed: bcu pa la gnod sbyin du drag mo'o //
translated: In the tenth, on the tenth day, is Caṇḍī in the Yakṣa direction.

original: bcu gcig pa la mer gzhon nu ma'o //
analyzed: bcu gcig pa la mer gzhon nu ma'o //
translated: In the eleventh, on the eleventh day, is Kumārī in Agni’s direction.

original: bcu gnyis pa la bden bral du khyab 'jug ma'o //
analyzed: bcu gnyis pa la bden bral du khyab 'jug ma'o //
translated: In the twelfth, on the twelfth day, is Viṣṇu in the Rākṣasa direction.

original: bcu gsum pa la gshin rjer phag mo'o //
analyzed: bcu gsum pa la gshin rjer phag mo'o //
translated: In the thirteenth, on the thirteenth day, is Vārāhī in Yama’s direction.

original: bcu bzhi pa la chur dbang mo'o //🔽bcva lnga pa la nya'am /
analyzed: bcu bzhi pa la chur dbang mo'o // bcva lnga pa la nya'am /
translated: In the fourteenth, on the fourteenth day, is Vaiṣṇavī in Varuṇa’s direction.🔽In the fifteenth, on the full moon day, is Māheśvarī in the Nairṛti direction.

original: gnam stong gi tshes phyed la ts'a mu nd'a dang tshes phyed la dpal chen mo'o zhes pa ni rigs pa'o //
analyzed: gnam stong gi tshes phyed la ts'a mu nd'a dang tshes phyed la dpal chen mo'o zhes pa ni rigs pa'o //
translated: On the new moon day, the fifteenth day of the dark fortnight, is Caṇḍikā in the Vāyu direction.

original: de ltar phyogs brgyad po 'di dag tu rnal 'byor ma de dag 'char bar byed do //
analyzed: de ltar phyogs brgyad po 'di dag tu rnal 'byor ma de dag 'char bar byed do //
translated: Thus, these yoginīs arise in these eight directions.

original: slar yang tshes gcig la sogs pa'i tshes rnams la phyed snga ma brgyad du dbye zhing phyed phyi ma brgyad du dbye ste /
analyzed: slar yang tshes gcig la sogs pa'i tshes rnams la phyed snga ma brgyad du dbye zhing phyed phyi ma brgyad du dbye ste /
translated: Again, the lunar days such as the first day and so on are divided into eight parts in the first half and eight parts in the second half.

original: de ltar na tshes de dag tu brgyad gnyis kyi dbye ba rnams la 'char bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na tshes de dag tu brgyad gnyis kyi dbye ba rnams la 'char bar shes par bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should understand that they arise in the divisions of eight parts in those lunar days.

original: de dag rnams kyi rang rang gi tshes la brgyad cha dang po longs spyod pa ni tshes kyi bdag mo ste phyi nas ji ltar brjod pa'i rim pas bdun po longs spyod pa ni bdun po rnams so zhes pa ni rigs pa'o //
analyzed: de dag rnams kyi rang rang gi tshes la brgyad cha dang po longs spyod pa ni tshes kyi bdag mo ste phyi nas ji ltar brjod pa'i rim pas bdun po longs spyod pa ni bdun po rnams so zhes pa ni rigs pa'o //
translated: The first of those eight parts of each lunar day is the mistress of the lunar day. The enjoyment of the seven is the seven, in the order as previously stated. This is the reasoning.

original: de bzhin du tshes kyi phyed phyi ma la yang shes par bya'o zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo 'char ba'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshes kyi phyed phyi ma la yang shes par bya'o zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo 'char ba'i nges pa'o //
translated: Thus, one should understand the second half of the lunar day in the same way. This is the certainty of the arising of the Yoginī cakra.

original: da ni bi sht'i stobs gsungs pa bi shti rnams ni dkar po'i phyogs kyi bzhi pa dang brgyad pa dang bcu gcig pa dang nya la 'char te rim pa bzhin du brgya byin dang gshin rje dang nub dang byang du'o //
analyzed: da ni bi sht'i stobs gsungs pa bi shti rnams ni dkar po'i phyogs kyi bzhi pa dang brgyad pa dang bcu gcig pa dang nya la 'char te rim pa bzhin du brgya byin dang gshin rje dang nub dang byang du'o //
translated: Now the power of Viṣṇu is stated. The Viṣṇus rise on the fourth, eighth, eleventh, and fifteenth of the bright fortnight, in Indra, Yama, the west, and the north, respectively.

original: nag po'i phyogs kyi gsum pa dang bdun pa dang bcu pa dang bcu bzhi pa la 'char te rim pa bzhin du me dang bden bral dang rlung dang dbang ldan du'o zhes pa ni bi shti 'char ba'i nges pa ste 'di dag gi bya ba ni sngar nyid🔽du gsungs so //
analyzed: nag po'i phyogs kyi gsum pa dang bdun pa dang bcu pa dang bcu bzhi pa la 'char te rim pa bzhin du me dang bden bral dang rlung dang dbang ldan du'o zhes pa ni bi shti 'char ba'i nges pa ste 'di dag gi bya ba ni sngar nyid du gsungs so //
translated: On the third, seventh, tenth, and fourteenth of the dark fortnight, they rise in Agni, Nirṛti, Vāyu, and Kubera, respectively. This is the rule for the rising of the Viṣṇus. Their activities have already been stated.

original: da ni drag po'i stobs gsungs pa drag po shar nas te shar gyi phyogs nas gzhan phyed chu'i bar du 'gro ste nyin zhag dbang gis ni 'pho ba rgyu ba'i dbang gis so //
analyzed: da ni drag po'i stobs gsungs pa drag po shar nas te shar gyi phyogs nas gzhan phyed chu'i bar du 'gro ste nyin zhag dbang gis ni 'pho ba rgyu ba'i dbang gis so //
translated: Now the power of Rudra is stated. Rudra moves from the east, from the eastern direction, to the other half, as far as the water, by the power of the day, by the power of the movement of the saṃkrānti.

original: byang du zhes pa ni g-yon skor gyis so //
analyzed: byang du zhes pa ni g-yon skor gyis so //
translated: To the north means in a counterclockwise direction.

original: byang gi nyi ma la zhes pa ni byang bgrod la gnas pa la ste chu srin dang bum pa'i phyed la shar du'o //
analyzed: byang gi nyi ma la zhes pa ni byang bgrod la gnas pa la ste chu srin dang bum pa'i phyed la shar du'o //
translated: The northern sun is the northern solstice, at which time the sun is in Capricorn and Aquarius at sunrise.

original: bum pa'i phyed dang nya la dbang ldan du'o //🔽lug dang glang gi phyed la byang du'o //
analyzed: bum pa'i phyed dang nya la dbang ldan du'o // lug dang glang gi phyed la byang du'o //
translated: At noon it is in the middle of Aquarius and Pisces.🔽 At sunset it is in the middle of Pisces and Aries.

original: glang gi phyed dang @214b 'khrig pa la rlung du'o //
analyzed: glang gi phyed dang @214b 'khrig pa la rlung du'o //
translated: At midnight it is in the middle of Aries and Taurus.

original: de'i 'og tu chu nas me ldan zhes pa ni nyi ma lhor bgrod pa la gnas pa la drag po lhor 'gro ste ka rka ta dang seng ge'i phyed la chu ru'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu chu nas me ldan zhes pa ni nyi ma lhor bgrod pa la gnas pa la drag po lhor 'gro ste ka rka ta dang seng ge'i phyed la chu ru'o //
translated: After that, from water to Agni means that the sun is in the southern solstice, and Rudra moves south. At sunrise it is in Cancer and Leo.

original: seng ge'i phyed dang bu mo la bden bral du'o //
analyzed: seng ge'i phyed dang bu mo la bden bral du'o //
translated: At noon it is in the middle of Leo and Virgo.🔽 At sunset it is in the middle of Virgo and Libra.

original: srang dang srid pa'i phyed la gshin rjer ro //
analyzed: srang dang srid pa'i phyed la gshin rjer ro //
translated: At midnight it is in the middle of Libra and Scorpio.

original: sdig pa'i phyed dang gzhu la me ru'o zhes pa ni drag po 'char ba'i nges pa'o zhes pa la sogs pa zla ba'i drag po dang phyogs kyi drag po dang nyin zhag gi drag po dang dus kyi drag po dang rnam pa drug ni don med pa ste
analyzed: sdig pa'i phyed dang gzhu la me ru'o zhes pa ni drag po 'char ba'i nges pa'o zhes pa la sogs pa zla ba'i drag po dang phyogs kyi drag po dang nyin zhag gi drag po dang dus kyi drag po dang rnam pa drug ni don med pa ste
translated: This is the determination of Rudra's rising and so on. The six types of Rudra - lunar, directional, daily, seasonal, and so on - are meaningless.

original: / des na ma gsungs so //
analyzed: / des na ma gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is not mentioned.

original: da ni thun phyed pa'i sgra gcan gyi stobs gsungs te 'dir gza' bdun po rnams las nyi ma 'char ba la shar nas te shar gyi phyogs kyi cha nas thun phyed kyi mjug tu rlung du rab tu 'jug go //
analyzed: da ni thun phyed pa'i sgra gcan gyi stobs gsungs te 'dir gza' bdun po rnams las nyi ma 'char ba la shar nas te shar gyi phyogs kyi cha nas thun phyed kyi mjug tu rlung du rab tu 'jug go //
translated: Now, the strength of Rāhu at the end of the watch is stated. Here, of the seven planets, the sun rises in the east, that is, from the eastern direction, at the end of the half-watch, and enters Vāyu.

original: de nas thun phyed gzhan gyi mthar lho ru 'gro bar byed do //
analyzed: de nas thun phyed gzhan gyi mthar lho ru 'gro bar byed do //
translated: Then, at the end of the other half-watch, it moves to the south.

original: slar yang thun phyed gzhan gyi mthar dbang ldan du 'gro'o //🔽de nas thun phyed gzhan gyi mthar chu ru 'gro'o //
analyzed: slar yang thun phyed gzhan gyi mthar dbang ldan du 'gro'o // de nas thun phyed gzhan gyi mthar chu ru 'gro'o //
translated: Again, at the end of the other half-watch, it moves to Indra.🔽Then, at the end of the other half-watch, it moves to Jala.

original: de nas thun phyed gzhan gyi mthar mer ro //
analyzed: de nas thun phyed gzhan gyi mthar mer ro //
translated: Then, at the end of the other half-watch, it moves to Agni.

original: de nas thun phyed gzhan gyi mthar gnod sbyin du'o //
analyzed: de nas thun phyed gzhan gyi mthar gnod sbyin du'o //
translated: Then, at the end of the other half-watch, it moves to Yakṣa.

original: de nas thun phyed gzhan gyi mthar bden bral du 'jug go zhes pa ni phyogs brgyad po rnams la nyi ma 'char ba nas nyi ma nub pa'i bar du nges pa ste de bzhin du mtshan mo la shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas thun phyed gzhan gyi mthar bden bral du 'jug go zhes pa ni phyogs brgyad po rnams la nyi ma 'char ba nas nyi ma nub pa'i bar du nges pa ste de bzhin du mtshan mo la shes par bya'o //
translated: Then, at the end of the other half-watch, it enters Nairṛti. This is the certainty of the sun from rising in the eight directions until setting. It should be understood in the same way for the night.

original: dpal ldan rtsa ba'i sgra gcan dor nas rlung dag las kyang 'di ni rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: dpal ldan rtsa ba'i sgra gcan dor nas rlung dag las kyang 'di ni rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur te /
translated: Having cast off the glorious fundamental Rāhu, this one will be victorious even over the pure winds.

original: mtshan ma'i 'thab mo 'thab mo pa gnyis kyis 'thab mo dang 'khrug pa dag la yang rtsa ba'i sgra gcan gyis ni dgra'i stobs 'joms te zla ba la sogs pa'i sgra gcan rnams kyi nang na de dang mtshungs pa'i sgra gcan gzhan yod pa min no zhes pa
analyzed: mtshan ma'i 'thab mo 'thab mo pa gnyis kyis 'thab mo dang 'khrug pa dag la yang rtsa ba'i sgra gcan gyis ni dgra'i stobs 'joms te zla ba la sogs pa'i sgra gcan rnams kyi nang na de dang mtshungs pa'i sgra gcan gzhan yod pa min no zhes pa
translated: In the battle of the battle of the signs, the fundamental Rāhu conquers the power of the enemy in the battle and the fight. Among the Rāhus of the moon and so on, there is no other Rāhu that is equal to it.

original: ni nges pa'o //🔽da ni mtshan ma'i 'thab mo la 'thab mo pa'i stobs gsungs pa dbyangs dman 'thab mo pa ni mnyam pa'i g-yul mtshan ma'i 'thab mo dang mi mnyam pa'i g-yul gnyi ga'i dpung gi 'khrug pa la ste /
analyzed: ni nges pa'o // da ni mtshan ma'i 'thab mo la 'thab mo pa'i stobs gsungs pa dbyangs dman 'thab mo pa ni mnyam pa'i g-yul mtshan ma'i 'thab mo dang mi mnyam pa'i g-yul gnyi ga'i dpung gi 'khrug pa la ste /
translated: This is the ascertainment.🔽Now, the power of the warrior in the battle of the signs is stated: The warrior with a deficient vowel conquers in both the battle of the signs of equal battle and the battle of the signs of unequal battle,

original: mnyam pa mi mnyam g-yul la lhag pa dag gis te dbyangs kyi yi ge lhag pa'i ming gis 'joms par byed pa ste dbyangs thung ngu dbyangs ring pos 'joms par byed do //
analyzed: mnyam pa mi mnyam g-yul la lhag pa dag gis te dbyangs kyi yi ge lhag pa'i ming gis 'joms par byed pa ste dbyangs thung ngu dbyangs ring pos 'joms par byed do //
translated: with the extra syllables in the equal and unequal battles. The name with the extra syllable of the vowel conquers, the short vowel is conquered by the long vowel.

original: dbyangs ring po ni dbyangs shin tu ring pos 'joms par byed do //
analyzed: dbyangs ring po ni dbyangs shin tu ring pos 'joms par byed do //
translated: A long vowel is destroyed by a very long vowel.

original: slar yang mtshan ma @215a * //
analyzed: slar yang mtshan ma @215a * //
translated: Again, the other signs:

original: gzhan ni dbugs la gnyis kyi ming gang snying la rab tu 'jug na de ni 'khrug pa dag las rgyal bar 'gyur /
analyzed: gzhan ni dbugs la gnyis kyi ming gang snying la rab tu 'jug na de ni 'khrug pa dag las rgyal bar 'gyur /
translated: If the name of the one who is to be killed enters the heart in the breath, he will be victorious over the disturbances.

original: gang gi ming dbugs phyir 'thon pa la yin pa de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi ming dbugs phyir 'thon pa la yin pa de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If the name of the one who is to die comes out in the breath, he will die.

original: sbyor ba gzhan ni pho nyas brjod pa dang po'i ming de rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur te phyis kyi ming ni pham par 'gyur zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba gzhan ni pho nyas brjod pa dang po'i ming de rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur te phyis kyi ming ni pham par 'gyur zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
translated: The other application is that the name of the messenger at the beginning will be victorious, and the name at the end will be defeated.

original: 'du ba zhes pa ni rgyal mtshan dang du ba dang seng ge dang khyi dang glang dang bong bu dang glang po che dang bya rog ces pa'i 'du ba rnams so //
analyzed: 'du ba zhes pa ni rgyal mtshan dang du ba dang seng ge dang khyi dang glang dang bong bu dang glang po che dang bya rog ces pa'i 'du ba rnams so //
translated: The “assemblies” are the assemblies of banner, smoke, lion, dog, ox, donkey, elephant, and crow.

original: kha dog ni ljang khu dang dkar po dang dmar po dang nag po ste de bzhin du bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs so //
analyzed: kha dog ni ljang khu dang dkar po dang dmar po dang nag po ste de bzhin du bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs so //
translated: The colors are green, white, red, and black, and likewise, brahmin, kṣatriya, vaiśya, and śūdra.

original: dbyangs la sogs pa ni yi ge'i tshogs nyis 'gyur dang dbyangs kyi tshogs bzhi 'gyur bdun gyi cha'i lhag ma ni 'bras bu ste dbyangs la sogs pa 'di dag dang dbang phyug gis spros pas brjod pa gzhan mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par 'gyur pa rnams kyis kyang
analyzed: dbyangs la sogs pa ni yi ge'i tshogs nyis 'gyur dang dbyangs kyi tshogs bzhi 'gyur bdun gyi cha'i lhag ma ni 'bras bu ste dbyangs la sogs pa 'di dag dang dbang phyug gis spros pas brjod pa gzhan mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par 'gyur pa rnams kyis kyang
translated: The remaining portion of the seven parts of the vowels and so on, which are the double set of syllables and the fourfold set of vowels, is the result.

original: 'bras med ston pa nyid de gang gi phyir mngon par shes pa lnga med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras med ston pa nyid de gang gi phyir mngon par shes pa lnga med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The result is taught to be nonexistent because the five superknowledges do not exist.

original: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad thams cad kyis byis pa rnams kun tu rmongs pa skyed par byed pa'i tshig rang gi las kyi 'bras bu la longs spyod pa dang bral ba ni gza' la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i zol gyis drang srong rnams kyis brdzun gyi bkod pa byas
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad thams cad kyis byis pa rnams kun tu rmongs pa skyed par byed pa'i tshig rang gi las kyi 'bras bu la longs spyod pa dang bral ba ni gza' la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i zol gyis drang srong rnams kyis brdzun gyi bkod pa byas
translated: The words that generate the delusion of childish beings through all worldly conventions, which are devoid of the experience of the result of one’s karma, are the false fabrications of the sages, who are like planets and so on.

original: pa'o // dbang phyug gi chos la gnas pa rnams kyis dbyangs 'char ba'i bkod pa byas te /
analyzed: pa'o // dbang phyug gi chos la gnas pa rnams kyis dbyangs 'char ba'i bkod pa byas te /
translated: The followers of the doctrine of Īśvara created the fabrications of the rising of the vowels.

original: dbang phyug gis gsungs so zhes pa'i brdzun gyi tshig gis 'jig rten rnams rab tu slu bar phyed do //
analyzed: dbang phyug gis gsungs so zhes pa'i brdzun gyi tshig gis 'jig rten rnams rab tu slu bar phyed do //
translated: The world is completely deceived by the false words, It is said by Īśvara.

original: spros pa 'di ni rgya cher mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes grub pa las brjod par bya ste 'dir ni cho ga'o //
analyzed: spros pa 'di ni rgya cher mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes grub pa las brjod par bya ste 'dir ni cho ga'o //
translated: This elaboration should be stated in the Establishment of Supreme Immutable Wisdom, but here it is the procedure.

original: da ni rtsa ba'i sgra gcan gyi stobs gsungs pa dus zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: da ni rtsa ba'i sgra gcan gyi stobs gsungs pa dus zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Now, the strength of the basic Rāhu is stated by time, etc.

original: 'dir sa la rgyu skar byas nas zhes pa ni rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad po rnams te rgyu skar gang la nyi ma yod pa'i rgyu skar de shar gyi skar ma bdun po rnams kyi dbus su yin zhing g-yas dang g-yas min du rgyu skar gsum ste
analyzed: 'dir sa la rgyu skar byas nas zhes pa ni rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad po rnams te rgyu skar gang la nyi ma yod pa'i rgyu skar de shar gyi skar ma bdun po rnams kyi dbus su yin zhing g-yas dang g-yas min du rgyu skar gsum ste
translated: Here, making the lunar mansions into the ground is the twenty-eight lunar mansions. The lunar mansion in which the sun is located is the eastern lunar mansion, which is in the middle of the seven eastern lunar mansions. To the right and left are three lunar mansions each.

original: thub pa zhes pa bdun ni shar du'o //
analyzed: thub pa zhes pa bdun ni shar du'o //
translated: The seven sages are in the east.

original: dus kyis bsgyur ba ni shar du ji lta ba de bzhin du byang dang nub dang gshin rjer ro //
analyzed: dus kyis bsgyur ba ni shar du ji lta ba de bzhin du byang dang nub dang gshin rjer ro //
translated: Changed by time is as in the east, so also in the north, west, and south.

original: 'khor lo 'khor bar byed pa ni g-yas skor @215b gyis te rgyu skar dgod pa ni g-yon skor gyis so //
analyzed: 'khor lo 'khor bar byed pa ni g-yas skor @215b gyis te rgyu skar dgod pa ni g-yon skor gyis so //
translated: The wheel is made to turn by the right-hand rotation, and the asterisms are set by the left-hand rotation.

original: nyin mtshan gyis rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad po rnams so sor 'char ba la longs spyod do //
analyzed: nyin mtshan gyis rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad po rnams so sor 'char ba la longs spyod do //
translated: The asterisms, twenty-eight in number, rise in the day and night, each in turn, and are enjoyed.

original: 'dir 'khor ba'i dbang gis rgyu skar gang la dus te sgra gcan gyi mjug mar gyur pa dang mun can du yang rab gyur zhes pa ste 'thab mo'i sa la mi bdag rnams kyi g-yas su dus dang gal te g-yas min du mun can sgra gcan gyi gdong
analyzed: 'dir 'khor ba'i dbang gis rgyu skar gang la dus te sgra gcan gyi mjug mar gyur pa dang mun can du yang rab gyur zhes pa ste 'thab mo'i sa la mi bdag rnams kyi g-yas su dus dang gal te g-yas min du mun can sgra gcan gyi gdong
translated: Here, by the power of the revolution, in which asterism is the time, the end of Rāhu, and also the head of Ketu, in the place of battle, the kings' right, if it is not the right, the head of Ketu, the face of Rāhu,

original: du gyur pa na de'i tshe g-yul du lha'i mgon po dag ni 'phrog byed drag po dang bcas mi rnams kyis kyang 'joms par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: du gyur pa na de'i tshe g-yul du lha'i mgon po dag ni 'phrog byed drag po dang bcas mi rnams kyis kyang 'joms par 'gyur ro //
translated: then at that time, in the battle, the lords of the gods, together with the fierce Rāhu, are robbed, and also the men are defeated.

original: lta ba ltung bas gdong dang mjug ma'i sgra gcan gnyis po de dag la yang g-yul du dgra'i sde rnams dag ni 'phral du nges par ltung ste lto yi dbus su rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lta ba ltung bas gdong dang mjug ma'i sgra gcan gnyis po de dag la yang g-yul du dgra'i sde rnams dag ni 'phral du nges par ltung ste lto yi dbus su rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The enemy army will immediately fall in the battle to the two planets of the face and the tail, and the victor will be in the middle of the belly.

original: 'dir gal te shar du gdong pa dang nub tu mjug ma yod na de'i tshe lhor lta ba dang byang du lto ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir gal te shar du gdong pa dang nub tu mjug ma yod na de'i tshe lhor lta ba dang byang du lto ba'o //
translated: Here, if the face is in the east and the tail is in the west, then the back is in the south and the belly is in the north.

original: gang gi tshe me la gdong ba yod na de'i tshe rlung du mjug ma dang bden bral du lta ba dang dbang ldan du lto ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe me la gdong ba yod na de'i tshe rlung du mjug ma dang bden bral du lta ba dang dbang ldan du lto ba'o //
translated: If the face is in Agni, then the tail is in Vayu, the back is in Nirriti, and the belly is in Indra.

original: gang gi tshe lhor gdong pa yod pa de'i tshe byang du mjug ma dang chur lta ba dang shar du lto ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe lhor gdong pa yod pa de'i tshe byang du mjug ma dang chur lta ba dang shar du lto ba'o //
translated: If the face is in the south, then the tail is in the north, the back is in Varuna, and the belly is in the east.

original: gang gi tshe bden bral du gdong pa yod pa de'i tshe dbang ldan du mjug ma dang rlung du lta ba dang mer lto ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe bden bral du gdong pa yod pa de'i tshe dbang ldan du mjug ma dang rlung du lta ba dang mer lto ba'o //
translated: If the face is in Nirriti, then the tail is in Indra, the back is in Vayu, and the belly is in Agni.

original: gang gi tshe chur gdong ba yod pa de'i tshe shar du mjug ma dang byang du lta ba dang lhor lto ba'o //🔽gang gi tshe rlung du gdong pa yod pa de'i tshe mir mjug ma dang dbang ldan du lta ba dang bden bral du lto ba'o //🔽gang gi tshe byang du gdong pa yod pa de'i tshe lhor mjug ma dang shar du lta ba dang nub tu  lto ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe chur gdong ba yod pa de'i tshe shar du mjug ma dang byang du lta ba dang lhor lto ba'o // gang gi tshe rlung du gdong pa yod pa de'i tshe mir mjug ma dang dbang ldan du lta ba dang bden bral du lto ba'o // gang gi tshe byang du gdong pa yod pa de'i tshe lhor mjug ma dang shar du lta ba dang nub tu  lto ba'o //
translated: When Rāhu is in the northeast, the head is in the northeast, the tail is in the southwest, and the belly is in the southeast.🔽When Rāhu is in the southeast, the head is in the southeast, the tail is in the northwest, and the belly is in the southwest.🔽When Rāhu is in the southwest, the head is in the southwest, the tail is in the northeast, and the belly is in the northwest.🔽When Rāhu is in the northwest, the head is in the northwest, the tail is in the southeast, and the belly is in the northeast.

original: gang gi tshe dbang ldan du gdong pa yod pa de'i tshe bden bral du mjug ma dang mer lta ba dang rlung du lto ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe dbang ldan du gdong pa yod pa de'i tshe bden bral du mjug ma dang mer lta ba dang rlung du lto ba'o //
translated: When Rāhu is in the nadir, the head is in the nadir, the tail is in the zenith, and the belly is in the cardinal directions.🔽When Rāhu is in the zenith, the head is in the zenith, the tail is in the nadir, and the belly is in the intermediate directions.

original: de ltar sgra gcan dus la gnas pa rnams te gdong la gnas pa dang mjug ma la gnas pa rnams ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar sgra gcan dus la gnas pa rnams te gdong la gnas pa dang mjug ma la gnas pa rnams ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, Rāhu moves through the directions in accordance with the seasons. Those who are in the head and tail of Rāhu die.

original: dpung rnams mnyam du ltung bar 'gyur ba ni lta ba'i cha la gnas pa rnams te 'dir lta ba'i cha ni lta ba la gnas pa'i rgyu skar bcu gnyis rnams kyi g-yas dang g-yon nas gsum pa'i cha rgyu skar bzhi ni sgra gcan gyi yin la bzhi ni
analyzed: dpung rnams mnyam du ltung bar 'gyur ba ni lta ba'i cha la gnas pa rnams te 'dir lta ba'i cha ni lta ba la gnas pa'i rgyu skar bcu gnyis rnams kyi g-yas dang g-yon nas gsum pa'i cha rgyu skar bzhi ni sgra gcan gyi yin la bzhi ni
translated: The part of the zodiac is the twelve zodiacs. The three parts of the four zodiacs on the right and left are Rāhu’s.🔽The four are

original: dus kyi ste /
analyzed: dus kyi ste /
translated: of time.🔽The army is destroyed there by the power of the movement of the crab.🔽Those who are in the part of the zodiac are destroyed when the army falls together.

original: brang 'gro 'gro ba'i dbang gis der ni sde rnams bcom par 'gyur ro //🔽lta ba'i cha ni spangs pa rnams @216a * //🔽ni lto la gnas pa'i rgyu skar bcu gnyis rnams kyi gsum pa'i cha ni ltor zhugs pa ste rgyu skar bzhi g-yas dang bzhi g-yas min du'o //
analyzed: brang 'gro 'gro ba'i dbang gis der ni sde rnams bcom par 'gyur ro // lta ba'i cha ni spangs pa rnams @216a * // ni lto la gnas pa'i rgyu skar bcu gnyis rnams kyi gsum pa'i cha ni ltor zhugs pa ste rgyu skar bzhi g-yas dang bzhi g-yas min du'o //
translated: Those who are in the part of the zodiac are destroyed when the army falls together.🔽Those who are in the part of the zodiac are destroyed when the army falls together.🔽Those who are in the part of the zodiac are destroyed when the army falls together.🔽Those who are in the part of the zodiac are destroyed when the army falls together.🔽Those who are in the part of the zodiac are destroyed when the army falls together.🔽Those who are in the part of the zodiac are destroyed when the army falls together.🔽Those who are in the part of the zodiac are destroyed when the army falls together.🔽Those who are in the part of the zodiac are destroyed when the army falls together.🔽Those who are in the part of the zodiac are destroyed when the army falls together.🔽Those who are in the part of the zodiac are destroyed when the army falls together.🔽Those who are in the part of the zodiac are destroyed when the army falls together.🔽Those who are in the part of the zodiac are destroyed when the army falls together.🔽Those who are in the part of the zodiac are destroyed when the army falls together.🔽Those who are in the part of the zodiac are destroyed when the army falls together.🔽Those who are in the part of the zodiac are destroyed when the army falls together.🔽Those who are in the part of the zodiac are destroyed when the army falls together.🔽Those who are in the part of the zodiac are destroyed when the army falls together.🔽Those who are in the part of the zodiac are destroyed when the army falls together.🔽Those who are in the part of the zodiac are destroyed when the army falls together.🔽Those who are in the part of the zodiac are destroyed when the army falls together.🔽Those who are in the part of the zodiac are destroyed when the army falls together.🔽Those who are in the part of the zodiac are destroyed when the army falls together.

original: 'dir lta ba'i cha la gnas pa rnams lto'i char zhugs pa rnams la mngon par phyogs par 'gyur te de rnams dang lhan cig 'thab bo //
analyzed: 'dir lta ba'i cha la gnas pa rnams lto'i char zhugs pa rnams la mngon par phyogs par 'gyur te de rnams dang lhan cig 'thab bo //
translated: Those who are in the part of the zodiac are destroyed when the army falls together.🔽Those who are in the part

original: de ltar dpal ldan rtsa ba'i sgra gcan bla ma'i gsung la gnas pa dus kyi 'khor lor shes par bya ste bla ma'i gsung ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung ngo //
analyzed: de ltar dpal ldan rtsa ba'i sgra gcan bla ma'i gsung la gnas pa dus kyi 'khor lor shes par bya ste bla ma'i gsung ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung ngo //
translated: Thus, one should know the glorious root Rāhu, abiding in the speech of the guru, as the Wheel of Time. The speech of the guru is the speech of the Buddha.

original: rgyu de'i phyir dpal ldan rtsa ba'i sgra gcan srid gsum rnam rgyal te 'khyog po zhes pa ni gza' drag po'o //
analyzed: rgyu de'i phyir dpal ldan rtsa ba'i sgra gcan srid gsum rnam rgyal te 'khyog po zhes pa ni gza' drag po'o //
translated: For that reason, the glorious root Rāhu is the Conqueror of the Three Worlds, and “crooked” is the fierce planet.

original: lha min zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ma drug cu ste 'khyog po drag po lha min de dag gi nang na rnam par rgyal ba'o //
analyzed: lha min zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ma drug cu ste 'khyog po drag po lha min de dag gi nang na rnam par rgyal ba'o //
translated: “Demigod” is the sixty yoginīs, and Rāhu is victorious among those crooked fierce demigods.

original: g-yul gyi dus su sa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas shes par bya ste gzhan du dgra ni nyams pa med /
analyzed: g-yul gyi dus su sa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas shes par bya ste gzhan du dgra ni nyams pa med /
translated: One should know that at the time of battle, he abides in the circle of the earth, and the enemy is not destroyed elsewhere.

original: de ltar brjod pa'i rim pas sgra gcan shes par bya'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar brjod pa'i rim pas sgra gcan shes par bya'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
translated: Thus, one should know Rāhu in the described way. This is the conclusion.

original: 'dir rnal 'byor ma la sogs pa'i stobs thams cad btang nas rgyal rigs rnams kyis sgra gcan 'di gcig pu gzung bar bya ste gang gis nyi ma zla ba za zhing skabs gsum pa rnams 'jigs par byed la drag po'i gzugs can mig sman gyi mdog ste /
analyzed: 'dir rnal 'byor ma la sogs pa'i stobs thams cad btang nas rgyal rigs rnams kyis sgra gcan 'di gcig pu gzung bar bya ste gang gis nyi ma zla ba za zhing skabs gsum pa rnams 'jigs par byed la drag po'i gzugs can mig sman gyi mdog ste /
translated: Here, having abandoned all the powers of the yoginīs, etc., the kṣatriyas should seize this Rāhu alone, who swallows the sun and moon, terrifies the three worlds, and has a fierce form and the color of collyrium.

original: sa la gang zhig nyin mtshan gyis shar dang nub dang lho dang byang gi phyogs kyi cha ste phyogs brgyad po rnams su 'khor ba de nyid gzung bar bya'o zhes pa ni g-yul gyi stobs la nges pa'o //
analyzed: sa la gang zhig nyin mtshan gyis shar dang nub dang lho dang byang gi phyogs kyi cha ste phyogs brgyad po rnams su 'khor ba de nyid gzung bar bya'o zhes pa ni g-yul gyi stobs la nges pa'o //
translated: He who moves in the eight directions, east, west, south, and north, by day and night, on the earth, should be seized. This is the certainty of the power of battle.

original: da ni gdug pa'i dgra'i rdzong gzhom pa'i don du 'khrul 'khor rnams gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni gdug pa'i dgra'i rdzong gzhom pa'i don du 'khrul 'khor rnams gsungs pa /
translated: Now, for the purpose of destroying the fortress of wicked enemies, the machines are taught.

original: g-yul du zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: g-yul du zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: [The verse] beginning with “in battle” and so on.

original: g-yul du pha ma pa'i dgra bo dag ni gal te 'phral la mkhar gyi nang du zhugs par gyur pa na de'i tshe phyi rol du 'khrul 'khor byas te 'khrul 'khor de dag gis 'phangs ba rgyun chad med par ltung ba'i rdo dang me mda' rab tu 'bab
analyzed: g-yul du pha ma pa'i dgra bo dag ni gal te 'phral la mkhar gyi nang du zhugs par gyur pa na de'i tshe phyi rol du 'khrul 'khor byas te 'khrul 'khor de dag gis 'phangs ba rgyun chad med par ltung ba'i rdo dang me mda' rab tu 'bab
translated: If the enemy, who is the father and mother of the battle, enters the fort, then at that time, outside, one should make a machine, and by those machines, the continuous falling of stones and the falling of flaming arrows,

original: pa dang / ral gri la sogs gcod pa'i 'khrul 'khor dag gis rang gi khyim bsrung ba byas nas sa gzhi'i gnas la rdo rje'i gur dang lcogs ni dbye ba dag gis kyang de yi rdzong ni phye mar byas te nyin zhag nyung zad dag gis gdug pa de ni bsgrub
analyzed: pa dang / ral gri la sogs gcod pa'i 'khrul 'khor dag gis rang gi khyim bsrung ba byas nas sa gzhi'i gnas la rdo rje'i gur dang lcogs ni dbye ba dag gis kyang de yi rdzong ni phye mar byas te nyin zhag nyung zad dag gis gdug pa de ni bsgrub
translated: and by the machines that cut with swords and so forth, one should protect one's house. Having made the fort into dust with the vajra fence and moat of the site, one should accomplish that evil one in a few days.

original: par bya zhes pa ni rigs pa'o //
analyzed: par bya zhes pa ni rigs pa'o //
translated: This is the reasoning.

original: 'dir thang gi ra ba'i rdzong la rdo'i 'khrul 'khor gyi mtshan nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'dir thang gi ra ba'i rdzong la rdo'i 'khrul 'khor gyi mtshan nyid gsungs pa /
translated: Here, the characteristics of the stone machine of the fort of the field of battle are stated:

original: ka ba @216b bzhi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ka ba @216b bzhi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The four pillars, and so on.

original: ka ba bzhi ni brgyad gnyis khru ldan zhes pa ni khru bcu drug pa gru bzhi pa zheng du sor bcu drug pa ste /
analyzed: ka ba bzhi ni brgyad gnyis khru ldan zhes pa ni khru bcu drug pa gru bzhi pa zheng du sor bcu drug pa ste /
translated: The four pillars are sixteen cubits long.

original: 'khrul 'khor rab kyi'o //
analyzed: 'khrul 'khor rab kyi'o //
translated: This is the best type of machine.

original: 'bring gi ka ba ni khru bcu bzhi pa ste zheng du sor bcu bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: 'bring gi ka ba ni khru bcu bzhi pa ste zheng du sor bcu bzhi pa'o //
translated: The medium type of pillar is fourteen cubits long and fourteen fingerbreadths wide.

original: tha ma'i ka ba ni khru bcu gnyis pa ste zheng du sor bcu gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: tha ma'i ka ba ni khru bcu gnyis pa ste zheng du sor bcu gnyis pa'o //
translated: The worst type of pillar is twelve cubits long and twelve fingerbreadths wide.

original: de dag kyang gnas brgyad du phug par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de dag kyang gnas brgyad du phug par gyur pa ste /
translated: They are also divided into eight sections.

original: mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas nas so //
analyzed: mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas nas so //
translated: From the equal and unequal sections.

original: mnyam pa ni shar dang nub kyi mtha' ste /
analyzed: mnyam pa ni shar dang nub kyi mtha' ste /
translated: The equal sections are the east and west ends.

original: mi mnyam pa ni lho dang byang gi mtha'o //
analyzed: mi mnyam pa ni lho dang byang gi mtha'o //
translated: The unequal sections are the south and north ends.

original: gnas brgyad po de dag tu phug par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: gnas brgyad po de dag tu phug par gyur pa ste /
translated: These eight sections are divided into eight holes.

original: bug pa'i tshad ni gsum gyi cha'o /
analyzed: bug pa'i tshad ni gsum gyi cha'o /
translated: The size of the holes is one third of the pillar.

original: de dag tha dad pa rnams ni mdun du rdang bu bzhi dang g-yas su bzhi dang g-yon du bzhi dang rgyab tu 'og gi char gcig gis so /
analyzed: de dag tha dad pa rnams ni mdun du rdang bu bzhi dang g-yas su bzhi dang g-yon du bzhi dang rgyab tu 'og gi char gcig gis so /
translated: The holes are different. There are four holes in the front, four holes on the right, four holes on the left, and one hole in the lower part of the back.

original: rgyab kyi ka ba dag la bug pa lnga nyid de mdun gyi ka ba dag la ni brgyad do //
analyzed: rgyab kyi ka ba dag la bug pa lnga nyid de mdun gyi ka ba dag la ni brgyad do //
translated: There are five holes in the rear pillars and eight in the front pillars.

original: 'khrul 'khor gyi tshad ni rtsa bar khru bcu ste steng du khru lnga'o //
analyzed: 'khrul 'khor gyi tshad ni rtsa bar khru bcu ste steng du khru lnga'o //
translated: The size of the machine is ten cubits at the base and five cubits at the top.

original: sgyogs mda' ni ka ba rnams las khru gnyis kyis dman pa'o //
analyzed: sgyogs mda' ni ka ba rnams las khru gnyis kyis dman pa'o //
translated: The catapult is two cubits less than the pillars.

original: ao log gcu'i tshad ni khru drug pa ste /
analyzed: ao log gcu'i tshad ni khru drug pa ste /
translated: The size of the catapult is six cubits.

original: ao log gcu'i g-yon dang g-yas su ba lang gi mjug ma'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: ao log gcu'i g-yon dang g-yas su ba lang gi mjug ma'i rnam pa'o //
translated: To the left and right of the catapult, there are shapes like cow tails.

original: dbus kyi zlum por phyed bcas khru gnyis dag go //
analyzed: dbus kyi zlum por phyed bcas khru gnyis dag go //
translated: The middle circle is two cubits and a half.

original: ngos gnyis kar sor nyi shu'o //
analyzed: ngos gnyis kar sor nyi shu'o //
translated: On both sides, it is twenty finger breadths.

original: rtse mo'i bum pa dag la sor sum cu'o //
analyzed: rtse mo'i bum pa dag la sor sum cu'o //
translated: On the top of the vase, it is thirty finger breadths.

original: zlum po 'di'i dbus su bug pa sor bcu bzhi pa zheng du sor bdun pa'o /
analyzed: zlum po 'di'i dbus su bug pa sor bcu bzhi pa zheng du sor bdun pa'o /
translated: In the middle of this circle, there is a hole fourteen finger breadths wide and seven finger breadths across.

original: ao log gcu'i bug pa der sgyogs mda' khru gang dor nas khru bcu gsum po rnams ba lang gi mjug ma'i rnam par byas te sgyogs mda' de de'i bug par rab tu gzhug go ;
analyzed: ao log gcu'i bug pa der sgyogs mda' khru gang dor nas khru bcu gsum po rnams ba lang gi mjug ma'i rnam par byas te sgyogs mda' de de'i bug par rab tu gzhug go ;
translated: Having placed the catapult one cubit away from that hole of the catapult, the thirteen cubits are made into the shape of a cow tail, and that catapult is inserted into its hole.

original: / lcags kyi gzer gyis rgyab kyi char gzer gyis gdab ste /
analyzed: / lcags kyi gzer gyis rgyab kyi char gzer gyis gdab ste /
translated: The back part of the catapult is to be fastened with iron nails.

original: brtan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brtan par 'gyur ro //
translated: It will be firm.

original: sgyogs mda'i mgo bo khru gang gi tshad la sum cha'i bar du bug pa gnyis so //
analyzed: sgyogs mda'i mgo bo khru gang gi tshad la sum cha'i bar du bug pa gnyis so //
translated: The head of the catapult is one cubit in size, with two holes two-thirds of the way in.

original: bug pa de dag tu aa long gnyis te /
analyzed: bug pa de dag tu aa long gnyis te /
translated: In those holes are two rings,

original: zlum skor du sor drug cu pa lcags kyi dbyug gu zlum po'i rgyar sor drug pa'o /
analyzed: zlum skor du sor drug cu pa lcags kyi dbyug gu zlum po'i rgyar sor drug pa'o /
translated: six finger-breadths in circumference, with a round iron handle six finger-breadths in diameter.

original: re re la thag pa lnga bcu gdags par bya ste /
analyzed: re re la thag pa lnga bcu gdags par bya ste /
translated: Each is to be attached with fifty ropes,

original: mgo bor aa long dag la zhes so //
analyzed: mgo bor aa long dag la zhes so //
translated: and the rings are on the head.

original: sgyogs mda'i mthar gnya' non zlum po sor bcu gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: sgyogs mda'i mthar gnya' non zlum po sor bcu gnyis pa'o //
translated: At the end of the catapult is a twelve-finger-breadth round neck.

original: sgyogs mda'i rtse mor mdzub mo dang bcas pa bcug ste /
analyzed: sgyogs mda'i rtse mor mdzub mo dang bcas pa bcug ste /
translated: The tip of the catapult is inserted with a finger and a half,

original: gzer gnyis kyis sgyogs dang bcas pa dang lce dang bcas @217a * //🔽pa la gdab bo //
analyzed: gzer gnyis kyis sgyogs dang bcas pa dang lce dang bcas @217a * // pa la gdab bo //
translated: and two nails are driven into the catapult and the tongue.

original: lce'i rtse mor mdzub mor shes par bya ste /
analyzed: lce'i rtse mor mdzub mor shes par bya ste /
translated: The tip of the tongue should be understood as a finger-breadth.

original: sor drug ni lce'i gnya' non gyi tshad yin la de'i bug par sgyogs mda'i gnya' non gyi bar du bcug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sor drug ni lce'i gnya' non gyi tshad yin la de'i bug par sgyogs mda'i gnya' non gyi bar du bcug par 'gyur ro //
translated: Six finger-breadths is the size of the neck of the tongue, and in its hole the neck of the catapult is inserted.

original: sgyogs mda'i mdzub mo 'di la 'ur mthil thag pa dang bcas pa la khru gsum pa ste /
analyzed: sgyogs mda'i mdzub mo 'di la 'ur mthil thag pa dang bcas pa la khru gsum pa ste /
translated: The length of the finger of the catapult is three cubits, including the palm and the rope.

original: 'dir pags pa'i 'ur mthil sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa dbus kyi zheng la sor bcu gnyis pa g-yas dang g-yas min du ba lang gi mjug ma'i rnam pa'o //🔽ngos gnyis kar srad bu'i rang bzhin gyi thag pa gnyis te /
analyzed: 'dir pags pa'i 'ur mthil sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa dbus kyi zheng la sor bcu gnyis pa g-yas dang g-yas min du ba lang gi mjug ma'i rnam pa'o // ngos gnyis kar srad bu'i rang bzhin gyi thag pa gnyis te /
translated: Here, the palm of the hand is twenty-four finger-widths in length. The width in the middle is twelve finger-widths. To the right and left are two cow-tail plumes.🔽There are two ropes made of string on both sides.

original: byed dang bcas pa'i khru gnyis lhag pa'o //
analyzed: byed dang bcas pa'i khru gnyis lhag pa'o //
translated: Together with the mechanism, they are two cubits long.

original: 'ur mthil de'i nang du rdo ba rab tu bcug ste /
analyzed: 'ur mthil de'i nang du rdo ba rab tu bcug ste /
translated: A stone is placed inside the palm.

original: stobs ldan 'then byed rnams kyis thag pa rnams 'then par gyur pa dag btang ba ni 'phral la myur du nam mkhar 'gro ste /
analyzed: stobs ldan 'then byed rnams kyis thag pa rnams 'then par gyur pa dag btang ba ni 'phral la myur du nam mkhar 'gro ste /
translated: When the strong pullers let go of the ropes that they have pulled, it goes quickly and swiftly into the sky.

original: song  nas 'phral la nges par ltung zhing khang steng la sogs pa ra ba'am lam srang dag tu mtha' dag phye mar byas nas rdo ba sa yi 'og tu 'gro ste /
analyzed: song  nas 'phral la nges par ltung zhing khang steng la sogs pa ra ba'am lam srang dag tu mtha' dag phye mar byas nas rdo ba sa yi 'og tu 'gro ste /
translated: Having gone, it falls immediately and shatters everything on the roof, etc., or in the streets into dust and the stone goes under the ground.

original: rdo rje 'bab pa ji lta ba nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: rdo rje 'bab pa ji lta ba nyid bzhin no //
translated: It is just like a falling thunderbolt.

original: 'khrul 'khor de yi mdzub mo zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa ni sa gzhi'i gnas su tshangs pa'i ri mo mdzub mo'i mgo dang mnyam par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khrul 'khor de yi mdzub mo zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa ni sa gzhi'i gnas su tshangs pa'i ri mo mdzub mo'i mgo dang mnyam par 'gyur ro //
translated: The half-moon shape of the finger of that machine is the line of Brahmā on the ground, equal to the head of the finger.

original: de'i ngos gnyis su mtho re re'i bar gyis rdo ba gtang ba'i gnas brgyad du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i ngos gnyis su mtho re re'i bar gyis rdo ba gtang ba'i gnas brgyad du 'gyur ro //
translated: Between the two sides, at the height of one finger, there are eight places for throwing the stone.

original: lag pa gnyis ka'i khu tshur bcings pa las ni gtang bar bya ba yin te /
analyzed: lag pa gnyis ka'i khu tshur bcings pa las ni gtang bar bya ba yin te /
translated: The fists of both hands are clenched, and then they are released.

original: gtong ba'i dus su rdo bas la reg par 'gyur ro //🔽mnyam pa'i rkang pa ni rkang pa g-yas pa 'khrul 'khor gyi nang du zhugs pa ste /
analyzed: gtong ba'i dus su rdo bas la reg par 'gyur ro // mnyam pa'i rkang pa ni rkang pa g-yas pa 'khrul 'khor gyi nang du zhugs pa ste /
translated: At the time of release, the stone touches the ground.🔽Equal feet are the right foot entering the machine.

original: mi mnyam pa'i rkang pa ni rkang pa g-yon pa zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: mi mnyam pa'i rkang pa ni rkang pa g-yon pa zhugs pa'o //
translated: Unequal feet are the left foot entering.

original: rang 'dod rdo ba lhung ste /
analyzed: rang 'dod rdo ba lhung ste /
translated: One's own desire is the falling of the stone.

original: rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis ni g-yon dang g-yas dang dbus kyi bgrod pa'i dbang gis te /
analyzed: rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis ni g-yon dang g-yas dang dbus kyi bgrod pa'i dbang gis te /
translated: By the power of the three paths, it is by the power of the left, right, and middle paths.

original: rdzong  ni rnam par gzhom pa'i don du'o zhes pa thang gi rdzong  dbye ba'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: rdzong  ni rnam par gzhom pa'i don du'o zhes pa thang gi rdzong  dbye ba'i nges pa'o //
translated: The fortress is for the purpose of being conquered. This is the determination of dividing the fortress on the plain.

original: gang zhig bsnun pas glang chen zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: gang zhig bsnun pas glang chen zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: Whoever is struck by the elephant, and so on, is easy to understand.

original: da ni chu'i rdzong  blang ba'i slad du chu'i 'khrul 'khor gyi mtshan nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni chu'i rdzong  blang ba'i slad du chu'i 'khrul 'khor gyi mtshan nyid gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in order to take up the water-reservoir, he states the characteristics of the water-machine:

original: ka ba zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
