original: slar yang sngar gyi nyin zhag gi tshogs stong brgyad cu po de las phyogs kyis bcad pa mngon par brjod pa zhes pa ni bcva lnga'i chas thob pa ni lha dang lha mo rnams kyis mngon par brjod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: slar yang sngar gyi nyin zhag gi tshogs stong brgyad cu po de las phyogs kyis bcad pa mngon par brjod pa zhes pa ni bcva lnga'i chas thob pa ni lha dang lha mo rnams kyis mngon par brjod par 'gyur te /
translated: Again, from the aforementioned collection of 1,800 days, the division by fifteen is called the abode. The obtained [constellations] of fifteen parts are the abode of the gods and goddesses.

original: dus kyi 'khor lo'i bdag po zung dang lhan cig bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni lha dang lha mo'i mtshan nyid do zhes pa ni lo gsum gyi dbye bas rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: dus kyi 'khor lo'i bdag po zung dang lhan cig bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni lha dang lha mo'i mtshan nyid do zhes pa ni lo gsum gyi dbye bas rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi nges pa'o //
translated: The lord of the Wheel of Time together with the pairs [of wisdom and means] are the seventy-two. This is the definition of the gods and goddesses. This is the determination of the Yoginī Tantras by the division of three years.

original: 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyis rigs gsum dang rigs drug dang rigs sum cu rtsa drug gi rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud de rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi nges pa'o ;
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyis rigs gsum dang rigs drug dang rigs sum cu rtsa drug gi rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud de rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi nges pa'o ;
translated: The yoga tantras of yoginis are the three families, the six families, and the thirty-six families, by the conventional reality of the world.

original: / da ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhes pa la sogs pas bya ba'i rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud rnams rnam pa gsum dang drug gi dbye bas gsungs te /
analyzed: / da ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhes pa la sogs pas bya ba'i rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud rnams rnam pa gsum dang drug gi dbye bas gsungs te /
translated: Now, the three and six divisions of the action tantras and yoga tantras are stated by “the web of illusion,” and so on.

original: 'dir dbu ma'i phyogs gsum gyi nyin hag ni nyin zhag bzhi bcu rtsa lnga ste nyin zhag so so la dus sbyor bcu gnyis kyi dbye bas bcu gnyis kyis bsgyur ba ni nyin zhag gi yan lag bzhi bcu'i lhag pa'i lnga brgya'i grangs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir dbu ma'i phyogs gsum gyi nyin hag ni nyin zhag bzhi bcu rtsa lnga ste nyin zhag so so la dus sbyor bcu gnyis kyi dbye bas bcu gnyis kyis bsgyur ba ni nyin zhag gi yan lag bzhi bcu'i lhag pa'i lnga brgya'i grangs su 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, the three positions of the central channel are the forty-five days, and each day is divided into twelve two-hour periods, multiplied by twelve, which is the number of five hundred plus forty branch days.

original: nyin zhag gi yan lag bzhi bcu lhag pa'i lnga brgya po de las tha dad du byas pa ni skyu 'phrul dra ba rnam pa gsum du yang 'gyur te bug pa rig byed ces pa lha zung bzhi bcu rtsa dgus gcig tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyin zhag gi yan lag bzhi bcu lhag pa'i lnga brgya po de las tha dad du byas pa ni skyu 'phrul dra ba rnam pa gsum du yang 'gyur te bug pa rig byed ces pa lha zung bzhi bcu rtsa dgus gcig tu 'gyur ro //
translated: The forty-nine deities of the “hole-knowledge” are one.

original: slar yang 'byung ba rgya mtshos 'gyur zhes pa ni lha zung bzhi bcu rtsa lngas gnyis par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: slar yang 'byung ba rgya mtshos 'gyur zhes pa ni lha zung bzhi bcu rtsa lngas gnyis par 'gyur ro //
translated: “ Again, the ocean of elements” is the second, with forty-five deities.

original: me dang chu gter gyis te lha zung bzhi bcu rtsa gsum gyis gzhan du'o //
analyzed: me dang chu gter gyis te lha zung bzhi bcu rtsa gsum gyis gzhan du'o //
translated: “ By the fire and water treasure” is the third, with forty-three deities.🔽These, which are different from the forty-nine-day limbs,

original: nyin zhag gi yan lag 'di las tha dad du byas pa rnams ni gsum gyi dbye bas @242a * //
analyzed: nyin zhag gi yan lag 'di las tha dad du byas pa rnams ni gsum gyi dbye bas @242a * //
translated: are the three divisions.

original: sum cu rtsa bdun lhag pa'i brgya'i grangs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa bdun lhag pa'i brgya'i grangs su 'gyur ro //
translated: They are the number of two hundred and seventy-seven.

original: lha dang lha mo rnams ni nyis 'gyur te bdun cu rtsa bzhi lhag pa'i nyis brgya'i grangs su 'gyur ro zhes pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i nges pa ste /
analyzed: lha dang lha mo rnams ni nyis 'gyur te bdun cu rtsa bzhi lhag pa'i nyis brgya'i grangs su 'gyur ro zhes pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i nges pa ste /
translated: The gods and goddesses are doubled, making the number of four hundred and seventy-four.🔽This is the certainty of the Magical Net.

original: 'di'i spros pa'i don ni le'u lnga pa las brjod par bya'o zhes pa ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'i spros pa'i don ni le'u lnga pa las brjod par bya'o zhes pa ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi nges pa'o //
translated: The meaning of its elaboration will be stated in the fifth chapter. This is the ascertainment of the Yoga Tantra called Magical Net.

original: da ni 'dus pa rnam pa drug gi dbye ba gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni 'dus pa rnam pa drug gi dbye ba gsungs te /
translated: Now, the division of the six assemblies is stated:

original: tha dad du byas pa'i lhag pa'i nyin zhag gi yan lag de las dpal ldan 'dus pa dus kyi dbye ba ni zhes pa ste /
analyzed: tha dad du byas pa'i lhag pa'i nyin zhag gi yan lag de las dpal ldan 'dus pa dus kyi dbye ba ni zhes pa ste /
translated: The glorious assembly is the division of time from that branch of the extra day made different.

original: de nyid ces bya zhes pa ni nyin zhag gi yan lag de las tha dad du byas pa'i lha zung nyi shu rtsa lngas nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya zhes pa ni nyin zhag gi yan lag de las tha dad du byas pa'i lha zung nyi shu rtsa lngas nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: That very one called twenty-five is from that branch of the day made different by the twenty-five pairs of deities, it becomes twenty-five.

original: lha bcu dgu tha dad du byas pas nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di las drug gis dman pa gzhan bcu dgu'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lha bcu dgu tha dad du byas pas nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di las drug gis dman pa gzhan bcu dgu'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: By making nineteen deities different, it becomes nineteen from this twenty-five, deficient by six.

original: nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid dang bcu dgu'i bdag nyid de dag gi phyed kyi dbye bas rnam par phye ba ni dbye ba gzhan du yang 'gyur te nyi shu rtsa lnga'i phyed ni phyed dang bcas pa'i bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid dang bcu dgu'i bdag nyid de dag gi phyed kyi dbye bas rnam par phye ba ni dbye ba gzhan du yang 'gyur te nyi shu rtsa lnga'i phyed ni phyed dang bcas pa'i bcu gnyis so //
translated: The twenty-five and the nineteen are divided into halves, and thus there are other divisions. The half of twenty-five is twelve and a half.

original: bcu dgu'i phyed ni phyed dang bcas pa'i dgu ste 'di las phyed ni phyed dang bcas pa'i bcu gnyis la 'jug go //
analyzed: bcu dgu'i phyed ni phyed dang bcas pa'i dgu ste 'di las phyed ni phyed dang bcas pa'i bcu gnyis la 'jug go //
translated: The half of nineteen is nine and a half. Here, the half of twelve and a half is six and a quarter.

original: de la gcig ni dgu'i bdag nyid du 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: de la gcig ni dgu'i bdag nyid du 'dus pa'o //
translated: One of them is included in the nature of nine.

original: gzhan ni bcu gsum gyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan ni bcu gsum gyi bdag nyid do //
translated: The other is the nature of thirteen.

original: slar yang bsres pa ni 'dus pa'i dbye ba gzhan gnyis su 'gyur te bcu gsum zhes pa ni bcu dang gsum mo //
analyzed: slar yang bsres pa ni 'dus pa'i dbye ba gzhan gnyis su 'gyur te bcu gsum zhes pa ni bcu dang gsum mo //
translated: Again, the mixture is another division of the union, which is thirteen.

original: bcu dgu ni nyi shur gcig gis  mtshang ba ste bcu gsum dang bcu dgu po 'di dag gis kyang lha zung sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi 'dus par 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: bcu dgu ni nyi shur gcig gis  mtshang ba ste bcu gsum dang bcu dgu po 'di dag gis kyang lha zung sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi 'dus par 'gyur ro ;
translated: Nineteen is twenty minus one. These thirteen and nineteen are also the union of the thirty-two pairs of deities.

original: / bug pa ste dgu dang de nyid bcas te nyi shu rtsa lnga dang bcas pa ni lha zung sum cu rtsa bzhis 'dus pa gnyis par 'gyur te de ltar 'dus pa drug gi dbye ba tha dad do //
analyzed: / bug pa ste dgu dang de nyid bcas te nyi shu rtsa lnga dang bcas pa ni lha zung sum cu rtsa bzhis 'dus pa gnyis par 'gyur te de ltar 'dus pa drug gi dbye ba tha dad do //
translated: The nine orifices, plus the twenty-five, plus reality, make thirty-four pairs of deities. Thus, there are six different sets of gatherings.

original: rgyud kyi rgyal po drug po'i de  dag la lha zung gi grangs sum cu rtsa gnyis lhag pa'i brgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyud kyi rgyal po drug po'i de  dag la lha zung gi grangs sum cu rtsa gnyis lhag pa'i brgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: In those six kings of tantras, there are one hundred and thirty-two pairs of deities.

original: nyis 'gyur ni lha dang lha mo'i grangs te drug cu rtsa bzhi lhag pa'i brgya phrag gnyis so //
analyzed: nyis 'gyur ni lha dang lha mo'i grangs te drug cu rtsa bzhi lhag pa'i brgya phrag gnyis so //
translated: The “double” is the number of male and female deities, two hundred and sixty-four.

original: de ltar na 'dus pa dang sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dgu pa rnams la bdag po zung dang bcas pa bzhi bcu lhag pa'i lnga brgya'i nyin zhag gi yan lag gi grangs kyi lha dang lha mor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na 'dus pa dang sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dgu pa rnams la bdag po zung dang bcas pa bzhi bcu lhag pa'i lnga brgya'i nyin zhag gi yan lag gi grangs kyi lha dang lha mor 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, in the nine kings of tantras, including the Gathering and the Magical Net, there are five hundred and forty male and female deities, which is the number of the limbs of the days.

original: rgyud @242b 'di rnams la phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang zla ba dang nyi ma'i rkang pa rdzogs pa'i dbye bas tha dad pa ni mngal du ji lta ba de bzhin du le'u lnga pa las gdan gyi dbye bas brjod par bya'o zhes pa ni rnal🔽'byor gyi rgyud kyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud @242b 'di rnams la phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang zla ba dang nyi ma'i rkang pa rdzogs pa'i dbye bas tha dad pa ni mngal du ji lta ba de bzhin du le'u lnga pa las gdan gyi dbye bas brjod par bya'o zhes pa ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi nges pa'o //
translated: In these tantras, the differences due to the completion of the aggregates, elements, and sense-fields, and the moon and sun, should be expressed by the division of the seats in chapter five, just as they are in the womb. This is the yoga tantra.

original: 'dir mngal nas skyes pa'i phung po dang khams rdzogs pa ni dgu'i bdag nyid kyi 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir mngal nas skyes pa'i phung po dang khams rdzogs pa ni dgu'i bdag nyid kyi 'dus pa'o //
translated: Here, the completion of the aggregates and elements born from the womb is the union of the nature of nine.

original: de bzhin du phung po dang khams dang lhan cig skyes pa dang chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i 'khor lo rdzogs pa ni bcu gsum gyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin du phung po dang khams dang lhan cig skyes pa dang chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i 'khor lo rdzogs pa ni bcu gsum gyi bdag nyid do //
translated: Similarly, the completion of the aggregates and elements together with the innate, and the completion of the dharma, enjoyment, and emanation wheels is the nature of thirteen.

original: de bzhin du phung po dang khams dang 'khor lo dang yul rdzogs pa ni bcu dgu'i bdag nyid do ;
analyzed: de bzhin du phung po dang khams dang 'khor lo dang yul rdzogs pa ni bcu dgu'i bdag nyid do ;
translated: Similarly, the completion of the aggregates, elements, wheels, and objects is the nature of nineteen.

original: / de bzhin du phung po dang khams dang 'khor lo dang yul dang mig la sogs pa drug rdzogs pa ni nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: / de bzhin du phung po dang khams dang 'khor lo dang yul dang mig la sogs pa drug rdzogs pa ni nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid do //
translated: Similarly, the perfection of the aggregates, elements, wheels, objects, and the six sense faculties such as the eyes is the nature of twenty-five.

original: de bzhin du phung po dang khams dang 'khor lo dang yul dang dbang po dang las kyi dbang po bzhi dang gsang ba dang gtsug tor gyi padma rdzogs pa ni sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin du phung po dang khams dang 'khor lo dang yul dang dbang po dang las kyi dbang po bzhi dang gsang ba dang gtsug tor gyi padma rdzogs pa ni sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid do //
translated: Similarly, the perfection of the aggregates, elements, six wheels, objects, sense faculties, four action faculties, and the lotuses of the secret place and the crown is the nature of thirty-two.

original: de bzhin du phung po dang khams dang 'khor lo drug dang yul dang dbang po dang las kyi dbang po dang mchog gi dbang po dang dga' ba rdzogs pa ni sum cu rtsa bzhi'i bdag nyid kyi 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du phung po dang khams dang 'khor lo drug dang yul dang dbang po dang las kyi dbang po dang mchog gi dbang po dang dga' ba rdzogs pa ni sum cu rtsa bzhi'i bdag nyid kyi 'dus pa'o //
translated: Similarly, the perfection of the aggregates, elements, six wheels, objects, sense faculties, action faculties, supreme faculty, and joy is the gathering with the nature of thirty-four.

original: mngal bzung nas lo bcu drug gi mtshams kyi bar du byis pa rnams rnam pa drug tu 'byung ba ni 'dus pa'i nges pa ste le'u lnga pa las rgyas par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: mngal bzung nas lo bcu drug gi mtshams kyi bar du byis pa rnams rnam pa drug tu 'byung ba ni 'dus pa'i nges pa ste le'u lnga pa las rgyas par brjod par bya'o //
translated: From conception up to the age of sixteen, the six aspects of children arise. This is the certainty of the gathering, which will be explained extensively in chapter five.

original: de bzhin du sgyu 'phrul dra ba la phung po dang / khams dgu dang  spu la sogs pa'i khams brgyad dang skye mched bcu gnyis 'khor lo bzhi dang bcas pa dang / rlung dang / mkhris pa dang bad kan dang 'dus pa'i khams dang bcas pa'i las kyi dbang po drug ni bzhi bcu rtsa gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi sgyu 'phrul dra ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du sgyu 'phrul dra ba la phung po dang / khams dgu dang  spu la sogs pa'i khams brgyad dang skye mched bcu gnyis 'khor lo bzhi dang bcas pa dang / rlung dang / mkhris pa dang bad kan dang 'dus pa'i khams dang bcas pa'i las kyi dbang po drug ni bzhi bcu rtsa gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi sgyu 'phrul dra ba'o //
translated: Likewise, in the Magical Net, the aggregates, the nine elements, the eight elements such as the hair of the body, the twelve sense-fields together with the four wheels, the winds, the bile, the phlegm, and the humors, and the six organs of action are the essence of the forty-three [deities].

original: gtsug tor dang gsang ba'i padma dang bcas pa'i bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: gtsug tor dang gsang ba'i padma dang bcas pa'i bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid do //
translated: Together with the crown and the secret lotus, [the deities] are the essence of the forty-five.

original: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang bcas pa ni bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i bdag nyid do zhes pa ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i nges pa ste le'u lnga pa las rgyas par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang bcas pa ni bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i bdag nyid do zhes pa ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i nges pa ste le'u lnga pa las rgyas par brjod par bya'o //
translated: Together with passion, aggression, stupidity, and pride, [the deities] are the essence of the forty-nine. This is the ascertainment of the Magical Net, which should be described extensively in the fifth chapter.

original: rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud 'byung ba'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud 'byung ba'i nges pa'o //
translated: This is the ascertainment of the origin of the Yoginī and Yoga tantras.

original: da ni byi dang nang gi phyag rgya gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni byi dang nang gi phyag rgya gsungs te /
translated: Now, the external and internal seals are stated.

original: 'dir thams cad du rgyus 'bras bu @243a * //
analyzed: 'dir thams cad du rgyus 'bras bu @243a * //
translated: Here, in all cases, the effect is not produced by the cause.🔽

original: la rgyas gdab par bya ste 'bras bus kyang rgyu la rgyas gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: la rgyas gdab par bya ste 'bras bus kyang rgyu la rgyas gdab par bya'o //
translated: Here, everywhere, the cause is to be sealed by the result, and the result is to be sealed by the cause.

original: rdul gyi chos can nyid kyi phyir nyi ma ni shes rab ste rgyu'o //
analyzed: rdul gyi chos can nyid kyi phyir nyi ma ni shes rab ste rgyu'o //
translated: Since it has the quality of dust, the sun is wisdom, the cause.

original: khu ba'i chos can nyid kyi phyir zla ba ni thabs te 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: khu ba'i chos can nyid kyi phyir zla ba ni thabs te 'bras bu'o //
translated: Since it has the quality of semen, the moon is method, the result.

original: gzhan la ltos pa las khu ba'i chos can nyid kyi phyir zla ba ni shes rab ste rgyu'o ;
analyzed: gzhan la ltos pa las khu ba'i chos can nyid kyi phyir zla ba ni shes rab ste rgyu'o ;
translated: Since it has the quality of semen in dependence on the other, the moon is wisdom, the cause.

original: / rdul gyi chos can nyid kyi phyir nyi ma ni thabs te 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: / rdul gyi chos can nyid kyi phyir nyi ma ni thabs te 'bras bu'o //
translated: Since it has the quality of dust, the sun is method, the result.

original: de lta na thams cad du stong pa nyid ni shes rab ste rgyu'o //
analyzed: de lta na thams cad du stong pa nyid ni shes rab ste rgyu'o //
translated: Thus, everywhere, emptiness is wisdom, the cause.

original: snying rje ni thabs te 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: snying rje ni thabs te 'bras bu'o //
translated: Compassion is method, the result.

original: 'dir gang zhig zla ba'i cha shas nyin zhag gi tshogs bzhi bcu rtsa lnga ste de dag las gza' yi cha yis thob pa nyin zhag drug ni rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya drug tu 'gyur te 'khor lo dang rna cha dang mgul rgyan dang gdu bu dang
analyzed: 'dir gang zhig zla ba'i cha shas nyin zhag gi tshogs bzhi bcu rtsa lnga ste de dag las gza' yi cha yis thob pa nyin zhag drug ni rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya drug tu 'gyur te 'khor lo dang rna cha dang mgul rgyan dang gdu bu dang
translated: Here, the six hand gestures of the Vajra Holder are the six days of the Vajra Holder, which are obtained by the part of the planet from the forty-five day groups of the moon. They are the wheel, earrings, necklace, bracelets,

original: ske rags dang thal ba dang mchod phyir thogs pa ste dus kyi 'khor lo'i phyi rol gyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: ske rags dang thal ba dang mchod phyir thogs pa ste dus kyi 'khor lo'i phyi rol gyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: belt, ashes, and sacred thread. These are the outer hand gestures of Kālacakra.

original: gzhan pa'i nyin zhag  tshogs te lhag ma gsum gyi grangs ni nang du rdo rje can gyi sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya ste phyi dang nang du phyag rgya dgur rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan pa'i nyin zhag  tshogs te lhag ma gsum gyi grangs ni nang du rdo rje can gyi sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya ste phyi dang nang du phyag rgya dgur rig par bya'o //
translated: The remaining three days, which are the group of other days, are the inner hand gestures of the body, speech, and mind of the Vajra Holder. The hand gestures should be known as nine, outer and inner.

original: shes rab sku zhes pa ni shes rab kyi rgyud dang thabs kyi sku thabs kyi rgyud la dus sbyor gsum rnams ni snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa'i bdag nyid de sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: shes rab sku zhes pa ni shes rab kyi rgyud dang thabs kyi sku thabs kyi rgyud la dus sbyor gsum rnams ni snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa'i bdag nyid de sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid do //
translated: The body of wisdom refers to the three junctures in the wisdom tantra and the body of method refers to the three junctures in the method tantra. They are the nature of sattva, rajas, and tamas, which are the nature of body, speech, and mind.

original: rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las phyag rgya rab tu gsal bar byas pa'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las phyag rgya rab tu gsal bar byas pa'i nges pa'o //
translated: The yoginīs and yogin tantras clearly explain the mudrās.

original: da ni nus ma zhes pa la sogs pas dus kyi 'khor lo'i lha dang lha mo'i grangs gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni nus ma zhes pa la sogs pas dus kyi 'khor lo'i lha dang lha mo'i grangs gsungs te /
translated: Now, beginning with “the powerful ones,” the number of deities and goddesses of the Kālacakra is stated.

original: 'dir 'khor lo drug gi rtsa snga tshogs pa'i rang bzhin rnams lha'i tshogs so //
analyzed: 'dir 'khor lo drug gi rtsa snga tshogs pa'i rang bzhin rnams lha'i tshogs so //
translated: Here, the groups of deities are the natures of the collections of nāḍīs of the six cakras.

original: nus ma khro bo rnams ni rim pas bcu ru rab tu 'gyur te zhes pa la pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ni nus ma bcu dang gtsug tor la sogs pa'i khro bo bcu ste so sor bcu'o //
analyzed: nus ma khro bo rnams ni rim pas bcu ru rab tu 'gyur te zhes pa la pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ni nus ma bcu dang gtsug tor la sogs pa'i khro bo bcu ste so sor bcu'o //
translated: “ The powerful ones and the wrathful ones are ten each in order” means that the ten perfections are the ten powerful ones and the ten wrathful ones beginning with uṣṇīṣa, each ten.

original: lnga ni sangs rgyas lha mo rnams zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga dang rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i lha mo lnga ste so sor lnga'o ;
analyzed: lnga ni sangs rgyas lha mo rnams zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga dang rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i lha mo lnga ste so sor lnga'o ;
translated: “ Five are the buddha goddesses” means that the five buddhas beginning with Akṣobhya and the five goddesses beginning with Vajradhātvīśvarī are each five.

original: / gzugs sogs mig la sogs pa drug ste zhes pa ni gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs pa drug dang sa'i snying po la sogs pa drug ste de bzhin du so sor drug go //
analyzed: / gzugs sogs mig la sogs pa drug ste zhes pa ni gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs pa drug dang sa'i snying po la sogs pa drug ste de bzhin du so sor drug go //
translated: The six beginning with form are the six beginning with the eye, that is, the six beginning with Vajra-form and the six beginning with Kshitigarbha.

original: slar yang lha'i tshogs ni drug gnyis so zhes pa ni dbang po la sogs pa bcu gnyis kyi grangs so //
analyzed: slar yang lha'i tshogs ni drug gnyis so zhes pa ni dbang po la sogs pa bcu gnyis kyi grangs so //
translated: Again, the group of gods is twelve, that is, the twelve beginning with Indra.

original: @243b rnal 'byor ma dang klu dang gtum mo brgyad ces pa ni tsar tsi k'a la sogs pa brgyad dang / mtha' yas la sogs pa brgyad dang / khyi gdong ma sogs pa brgyad de lha'i chogs 'di dag ni sgrub thabs kyi le'u las so sor ming gi dbye bas brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: @243b rnal 'byor ma dang klu dang gtum mo brgyad ces pa ni tsar tsi k'a la sogs pa brgyad dang / mtha' yas la sogs pa brgyad dang / khyi gdong ma sogs pa brgyad de lha'i chogs 'di dag ni sgrub thabs kyi le'u las so sor ming gi dbye bas brjod par bya'o //
translated: The eight yoginis, nagas, and fierce goddesses are the eight beginning with Carcika, the eight beginning with Ananta, and the eight beginning with the dog-faced one. These groups of gods are to be described by their individual names in the chapter on the method of evocation.

original: srid par zhes pa ni phyi rol dang nang du'o //
analyzed: srid par zhes pa ni phyi rol dang nang du'o //
translated: In the world means externally and internally.

original: slar yang 'di dag thams cad shes rab dang thabs kyi dbye bas nyis 'gyur te 'di dag dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo bzhi lhag brgya ste de yi phyed kyang lha lnga bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: slar yang 'di dag thams cad shes rab dang thabs kyi dbye bas nyis 'gyur te 'di dag dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo bzhi lhag brgya ste de yi phyed kyang lha lnga bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid do //
translated: Again, all of these are doubled by the division of wisdom and means, and they are the glorious Wheel of Time with more than four hundred [deities], and even half of that is the nature of fifty-two deities.

original: de ltar nyi ma dang zla ba'i dbye bas te slar yang de dag gcig nyid kyis lha lnga bcu rtsa drug lhag pa'i brgya phrag gcig gi bdag nyid kyi dus kyi 'khor lor rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar nyi ma dang zla ba'i dbye bas te slar yang de dag gcig nyid kyis lha lnga bcu rtsa drug lhag pa'i brgya phrag gcig gi bdag nyid kyi dus kyi 'khor lor rig par bya'o //
translated: Thus, by the division of the sun and moon, and again by their oneness, one should know the Wheel of Time as the nature of one hundred plus fifty-six deities.

original: padma'i lte ba la gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs kyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: padma'i lte ba la gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs kyi nges pa'o //
translated: The certainty of the assembly of deities abiding in the center of the lotus.

original: da ni tsar tsi k'a la sogs pa'i padma'i 'dab ma'i lha mo rnams gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni tsar tsi k'a la sogs pa'i padma'i 'dab ma'i lha mo rnams gsungs te /
translated: Now, the goddesses of the lotus petals beginning with Cārcikā are stated.

original: nyi ma'i cha las te sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi chas dbugs kyi 'khor lo las nyin zhag so sor chu tshod gnyis thob pa gang yin pa de ni zla ba'i dbus su chu tshod drug cur 'gyur te rigs ldan gyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: nyi ma'i cha las te sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi chas dbugs kyi 'khor lo las nyin zhag so sor chu tshod gnyis thob pa gang yin pa de ni zla ba'i dbus su chu tshod drug cur 'gyur te rigs ldan gyi rang bzhin no //
translated: That which is obtained every day from the wheel of breath, two hours from the thirty-two parts of the sun, becomes sixty hours in the middle of the moon, the nature of the yoginīs.

original: de dag rnal 'byor ma ste dus sbyor bsres pa zhes pa la dus sbyor ni thun mtshams bzhi ste de dag rigs ldan la bsres pa ni drug cu rtsa bzhir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag rnal 'byor ma ste dus sbyor bsres pa zhes pa la dus sbyor ni thun mtshams bzhi ste de dag rigs ldan la bsres pa ni drug cu rtsa bzhir 'gyur ro //
translated: Those are the yoginīs, mixed with the dandas. The dandas are the four junctures, and when they are mixed with the yogins, they become sixty-four.

original: de dag kyang shes rab dang thabs kyi dbye bas gnyis kyis bsgyur ba ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad lhag pa'i brgya'i grangs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag kyang shes rab dang thabs kyi dbye bas gnyis kyis bsgyur ba ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad lhag pa'i brgya'i grangs su 'gyur ro //
translated: Those are doubled by the division of wisdom and means, becoming a count of one hundred plus twenty-eight.

original: slar yang nyi ma'i cha las nyin zhag rab phye ste nyin zhag sum brgya drug cus rab tu phye ba ni nag pa la sogs pa'i tshes ni mtshan nyid kyi lha'i tshogs te /
analyzed: slar yang nyi ma'i cha las nyin zhag rab phye ste nyin zhag sum brgya drug cus rab tu phye ba ni nag pa la sogs pa'i tshes ni mtshan nyid kyi lha'i tshogs te /
translated: Again, the days are distinguished by the parts of the sun, and the days distinguished by three hundred and sixty are the groups of deities of the characteristics of the lunar mansions, etc.

original: de nyid sgeg mo la sogs pa bcu gnyis dang bcas pa nyis 'gyur dag kyang nyi shu lhag pa'i bdun brgya'i grangs kyi lha'i tshogs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid sgeg mo la sogs pa bcu gnyis dang bcas pa nyis 'gyur dag kyang nyi shu lhag pa'i bdun brgya'i grangs kyi lha'i tshogs su 'gyur ro //
translated: Together with those twelve, such as Charm, the pairs make a divine assembly of seven hundred and twenty.

original: mtha' dag bsdus par gyur pa zhes pa ni lha mo 'di dag mngon brjod rnams dang bcas pa ste /
analyzed: mtha' dag bsdus par gyur pa zhes pa ni lha mo 'di dag mngon brjod rnams dang bcas pa ste /
translated: All of them are included means that these goddesses are together with the epithets.

original: lha bdun cu rtsa gnyis dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya drug dang lhan cig pa ni nyi ma'i nyin zhag sum 'gyur lo gsum gyi nyin zhag gi grangs stong brgyad cu'o //
analyzed: lha bdun cu rtsa gnyis dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya drug dang lhan cig pa ni nyi ma'i nyin zhag sum 'gyur lo gsum gyi nyin zhag gi grangs stong brgyad cu'o //
translated: Together with the sixty-two gods, the six seals, and the goddesses, the number of days in three years, which is three times the number of days in a solar year, is one thousand eight hundred.

original: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud la lo gsum gyi nyin zhag gi tshogs kyi lha dang lha mor rig par bya bar dgongs pa ste de ltar na nyi ma lo yi rab tu dbye @244a * //🔽bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud la lo gsum gyi nyin zhag gi tshogs kyi lha dang lha mor rig par bya bar dgongs pa ste de ltar na nyi ma lo yi rab tu dbye @244a * //🔽bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The thought is that in the yoginī tantras, the assembly of gods and goddesses should be known as the collection of days in three years.🔽Thus, the solar year is divided into months.

original: ri bong 'dzin pa la sgyu 'phrul dra ba dang / 'dus pa rnams pa dgu po mtha' dag phyogs kyi dbye ba ste lha'i tshogs bzhi bcu lhag pa'i lnga brgya rnams kyis so //
analyzed: ri bong 'dzin pa la sgyu 'phrul dra ba dang / 'dus pa rnams pa dgu po mtha' dag phyogs kyi dbye ba ste lha'i tshogs bzhi bcu lhag pa'i lnga brgya rnams kyis so //
translated: In the lunar mansion of Bharaṇī, the lunar day is the goddess Bharaṇī, and the lunar mansion is the god Bharaṇī.🔽In the lunar mansion of Āśleṣā, the lunar day is the goddess Āśleṣā, and the lunar mansion is the god Āśleṣā.🔽In the lunar mansion of Maghā, the lunar day is the goddess Maghā, and the lunar mansion is the god Maghā.🔽In the lunar mansion of Puṣya, the lunar day is the goddess Puṣyā, and the lunar mansion is the god Puṣya.🔽In the lunar mansion of Āśleṣā, the lunar day is the goddess Āśleṣā, and the lunar mansion is the god Āśleṣā.🔽In the lunar mansion of Mūlā, the lunar day is the goddess Mūlā, and the lunar mansion is the god Mūla.🔽In the lunar mansion of Pūrvāṣāḍhā, the lunar day is the goddess Pūrvāṣāḍhā, and the lunar mansion is the god Pūrvāṣāḍha.

original: de ltar nyi ma dang zla ba'i lha'i tshogs gcig tu gyur pa rnams kyis kyang dang po'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //🔽dang po'i sangs rgyas de la mkha' lag mi bdag rnams te nyi shu lhag pa'i brgya phrag bcu drug gi grangs so //
analyzed: de ltar nyi ma dang zla ba'i lha'i tshogs gcig tu gyur pa rnams kyis kyang dang po'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro // dang po'i sangs rgyas de la mkha' lag mi bdag rnams te nyi shu lhag pa'i brgya phrag bcu drug gi grangs so //
translated: In the lunar mansion of Uttarāṣāḍhā, the lunar day is the goddess Uttarāṣāḍhā, and the lunar mansion is the god Uttarāṣāḍha.

original: lha dang lha mo de dag rnams kyi shes rab thabs dag mtshan ma nyin mo zhes pa ni grangs bzhin du shes rab mtshan mo'i cha dang thabs nyin mo'i cha'o //
analyzed: lha dang lha mo de dag rnams kyi shes rab thabs dag mtshan ma nyin mo zhes pa ni grangs bzhin du shes rab mtshan mo'i cha dang thabs nyin mo'i cha'o //
translated: In the lunar mansion of Śravaṇa, the lunar day is the goddess Śravaṇa, and the lunar mansion is the god Śravaṇa.🔽In the lunar mansion of Dhaniṣṭhā, the lunar day is the goddess Dhaniṣṭhā, and the lunar mansion is the god Dhaniṣṭhā.

original: mnyam pa'i cha ste nyin phyed nas mtshan phyed dang mtshan phyed nas nyin phyed la rgyu skar phyed dang bcas pa'i bcu gsum gyis te /
analyzed: mnyam pa'i cha ste nyin phyed nas mtshan phyed dang mtshan phyed nas nyin phyed la rgyu skar phyed dang bcas pa'i bcu gsum gyis te /
translated: In the lunar mansion of Śatabhiṣā, the lunar day is the goddess Śatabhiṣā, and the lunar mansion is the god Śatabhiṣā.🔽In the lunar mansion of Bharaṇī, the lunar day is the goddess

original: dbyug gu'am chu tshod bcu lhag pa'i brgyad brgya rnams kyis mtshan mo'i cha'o //
analyzed: dbyug gu'am chu tshod bcu lhag pa'i brgyad brgya rnams kyis mtshan mo'i cha'o //
translated: The night is made up of the remaining eight hundred periods of forty-eight minutes each.

original: de bzhin du nyin mo'i cha ste dpal ldan rgyu skar gyi dkyil 'khor dang po'i sangs rgyas la lha'i tshogs rgyu skar gyi chu tshod kyi grangs kyi bdag nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du nyin mo'i cha ste dpal ldan rgyu skar gyi dkyil 'khor dang po'i sangs rgyas la lha'i tshogs rgyu skar gyi chu tshod kyi grangs kyi bdag nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
translated: In the same way, the day is made up of the same number of periods of forty-eight minutes each. The first Buddha of the glorious circle of stars is the Lord of the gods, who is the essence of the number of periods of forty-eight minutes of the stars.

original: phyi rol du skar ma'i chu tshod rnams gza' thams cad kyi longs spyod yin pa ji lta ba de bzhin du nang du sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes ni dbang po drug gi chos rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: phyi rol du skar ma'i chu tshod rnams gza' thams cad kyi longs spyod yin pa ji lta ba de bzhin du nang du sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes ni dbang po drug gi chos rnams kyi'o //
translated: Just as the periods of forty-eight minutes of the stars are the enjoyment of all the planets externally, in the same way, the body, speech, mind, and gnosis are the enjoyment of the six sense organs internally.

original: gang gis rang gi lus la shes par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: gang gis rang gi lus la shes par gyur pa ste /
translated: One who knows this is a knower of the body.

original: de ltar brjod pa'i rim pas shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid dang po'i sangs rgyas gang gis rang gi lus la nyin mtshan dus thun mtshams dang thun tshod la sogs pa'i dbye ba dang zla ba 'pho ba'i dbye ba bcu gnyis rnams kyis shes par gyur pa'i
analyzed: de ltar brjod pa'i rim pas shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid dang po'i sangs rgyas gang gis rang gi lus la nyin mtshan dus thun mtshams dang thun tshod la sogs pa'i dbye ba dang zla ba 'pho ba'i dbye ba bcu gnyis rnams kyis shes par gyur pa'i
translated: By this process of description, the yogin who knows the nature of wisdom and means, the primordial Buddha, in his own body, by the divisions of day and night, the divisions of periods, sessions, and so forth, and by the twelve divisions of the transits of the moon,

original: rnal 'byor pa de ni dpal ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms sangs rgyas skye ba 'di nyid dag la'o zhes pa ni bsdus pa'i rgyud dang rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi lha 'byung ba'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa de ni dpal ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms sangs rgyas skye ba 'di nyid dag la'o zhes pa ni bsdus pa'i rgyud dang rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi lha 'byung ba'i nges pa'o //
translated: in this very life becomes the Buddha who conquers the fears of the world, glorious Mañjuvajra. This is the ascertainment of the arising of the deities of the root and condensed tantras.

original: da ni sum cu zhes pa la sogs pas mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas 'di las bsdus pa'i rgyud 'byung ba gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni sum cu zhes pa la sogs pas mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas 'di las bsdus pa'i rgyud 'byung ba gsungs te /
translated: Now, beginning with “thirty,” he declares the arising of the condensed tantra from this Supreme Primordial Buddha.

original: 'dir mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas nyi shu lhag pa'i brgya phrag bcu drug las sum cu'i cha yis thob pa ni lha lnga bcu rtsa bzhir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas nyi shu lhag pa'i brgya phrag bcu drug las sum cu'i cha yis thob pa ni lha lnga bcu rtsa bzhir 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, thirty parts of one hundred and sixteen more than twenty of the Supreme Primordial Buddha are obtained, which become fifty-four deities.

original: slar yang gsum gyis bsgyur ba ste sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis bsgyur ba @244b ni drug cu rtsa gnyis lhag pa'i brgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: slar yang gsum gyis bsgyur ba ste sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis bsgyur ba @244b ni drug cu rtsa gnyis lhag pa'i brgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: Again, multiplied by three, that is, by body, speech, and mind, it becomes one hundred and sixty-two.

original: de rnams las dkyil 'khor gyi lha ni lnga bcu rtsa bzhi lhag pa'i brgya'i grangs te dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo thabs dang shes rab zung zhig dang phyi rol gyi phyag rgya drug go //
analyzed: de rnams las dkyil 'khor gyi lha ni lnga bcu rtsa bzhi lhag pa'i brgya'i grangs te dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo thabs dang shes rab zung zhig dang phyi rol gyi phyag rgya drug go //
translated: From among those, the deities of the mandala are one hundred and fifty-four, that is, the principal deity of the mandala, the pair of method and wisdom, and the six outer seals.

original: bcu'i chas mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las dus kyi 'khor lo 'byung ba ste ai da la sogs pa dung can ma'i mtha'i rtsa'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: bcu'i chas mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las dus kyi 'khor lo 'byung ba ste ai da la sogs pa dung can ma'i mtha'i rtsa'i dbye bas so //
translated: From the supreme first buddha, the Wheel of Time arises, in the portion of the ten, by the divisions of the channels from the navel to the conch-shell channel.

original: phyi rol du ni drang ba'i don to //🔽bsdus pa'i dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: phyi rol du ni drang ba'i don to // bsdus pa'i dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi nges pa'o //
translated: Externally, it is the interpretable meaning.🔽This is the ascertainment of the Concise Wheel of Time Tantra.

original: da ni 'khor lo dag gi rtsa rnams de bzhin nyid ces pa sogs pas dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni 'khor lo dag gi rtsa rnams de bzhin nyid ces pa sogs pas dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams gsungs te /
translated: Now, the channels of the wheels are stated by “The channels of the Wheel of Time,” and so on.

original: 'dir lus la rigs gsum gyi rtsa gsum ni lte ba dang gsang ba dang rdo rje nor bur lus dang ngag dang sems kyi thig le 'dzin pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'dir lus la rigs gsum gyi rtsa gsum ni lte ba dang gsang ba dang rdo rje nor bur lus dang ngag dang sems kyi thig le 'dzin pa rnams so //
translated: Here, the three channels of the three families are the three places navel, secret place, and vajra jewel, which hold the vital essence of body, speech, and mind.

original: de bzhin du rigs drug gi rtsa rnams ni la la n'a dang ra sa n'a dang aa ba dh'u t'i dang bshang ba dang gci ba dang khu ba 'bab pa rnams so //
analyzed: de bzhin du rigs drug gi rtsa rnams ni la la n'a dang ra sa n'a dang aa ba dh'u t'i dang bshang ba dang gci ba dang khu ba 'bab pa rnams so //
translated: Similarly, the channels of the six families are the channels of the lalana, rasana, and avadhuti, and the channels of feces, urine, and semen.

original: de bzhin du rigs sum cu rtsa drug gi rtsa rnams ni gtsug tor la sogs pa 'khor lo drug gi rtsa drug dang / sgra 'dzin pa gnyis dang rig pa 'dzin pa gnyis dang gzugs 'dzin pa gnyis dang ro 'dzin pa gnyis dang / dri 'dzin pa gnyis po 'di dag ni rtsa bcu'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rigs sum cu rtsa drug gi rtsa rnams ni gtsug tor la sogs pa 'khor lo drug gi rtsa drug dang / sgra 'dzin pa gnyis dang rig pa 'dzin pa gnyis dang gzugs 'dzin pa gnyis dang ro 'dzin pa gnyis dang / dri 'dzin pa gnyis po 'di dag ni rtsa bcu'o //
translated: Similarly, the channels of the thirty-six families are the six channels of the six chakras, beginning with the crown, the two channels of sound, the two channels of awareness, the two channels of form, the two channels of taste, and the two channels of smell. These are the ten channels.

original: lte ba'i 'khor lo'i nang dang gzhan gyi zlum po rnams la 'pho ba bcu gnyis kyi rtsa rnams dang thun tshod brgyad kyi rtsa rnams te /
analyzed: lte ba'i 'khor lo'i nang dang gzhan gyi zlum po rnams la 'pho ba bcu gnyis kyi rtsa rnams dang thun tshod brgyad kyi rtsa rnams te /
translated: In the center of the navel chakra and on the other circles are the channels of the twelve transits and the channels of the eight periods.

original: de ltar thams cad rigs sum cu rtsa drug gi gtso mor 'gyur te ro'i rang bzhin can drug dang khams kyi rang bzhin can drug dang / dbang po'i rang bzhin can drug dang / yul gyi rang bzhin can drug dang / las kyi dbang po'i rang bzhin can drug dang /
analyzed: de ltar thams cad rigs sum cu rtsa drug gi gtso mor 'gyur te ro'i rang bzhin can drug dang khams kyi rang bzhin can drug dang / dbang po'i rang bzhin can drug dang / yul gyi rang bzhin can drug dang / las kyi dbang po'i rang bzhin can drug dang /
translated: Thus, there are thirty-six principal nāḍīs, six with the nature of flesh, six with the nature of the elements, six with the nature of the sense organs, six with the nature of the objects, six with the nature of the action faculties,

original: las kyi dbang po'i yul gyi rang bzhin can drug go //
analyzed: las kyi dbang po'i yul gyi rang bzhin can drug go //
translated: and six with the nature of the objects of the action faculties.🔽Similarly, there are six that engage form, six that engage feeling, six that engage discrimination, six that engage compositional factors, six that engage consciousness, and six that engage pristine consciousness.

original: de bzhin du gzugs 'jug par byed pa drug dang / tshor ba 'jug par byed pa drug dang 'du shes 'jug par byed pa drug dang / 'du byed 'jug par byed pa drug dang / rnam par shes pa 'jug par byed pa drug dang ye shes 'jug par byed pa drug ste rigs sum cu rtsa drug gi rtsa rnams kyang rten dang brten pa'i 'brel pas bdun cu rtsa gnyis so zhes shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs 'jug par byed pa drug dang / tshor ba 'jug par byed pa drug dang 'du shes 'jug par byed pa drug dang / 'du byed 'jug par byed pa drug dang / rnam par shes pa 'jug par byed pa drug dang ye shes 'jug par byed pa drug ste rigs sum cu rtsa drug gi rtsa rnams kyang rten dang brten pa'i 'brel pas bdun cu rtsa gnyis so zhes shes par bya'o //
translated: Thus, there are thirty-six nāḍīs of the families. Since they are related as support and supported, there are seventy-two.

original: de bzhin du dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams gsungs pa /
translated: In the same way, the Kalacakra Tantra teaches the channels:

original: @245a * // gtsug tor la ni chu gter zhes pa ni 'dab ma bzhi'i gzugs can bzhi ste thun mtshams bzhi 'jug par byed pa rnams so //
analyzed: @245a * // gtsug tor la ni chu gter zhes pa ni 'dab ma bzhi'i gzugs can bzhi ste thun mtshams bzhi 'jug par byed pa rnams so //
translated: The “ocean” in the crown is four petals, the four that cause the four periods to enter.

original: snying khar brgyad de zhes pa ni rtsa snar ma la sogs pa mnyam gnas pa la sogs pa rnams kyi rten du gyur pa rnams te nyin zhag so sor thun gyi dbye bas gza' brgyad rgyu bar byed pa rnams so //
analyzed: snying khar brgyad de zhes pa ni rtsa snar ma la sogs pa mnyam gnas pa la sogs pa rnams kyi rten du gyur pa rnams te nyin zhag so sor thun gyi dbye bas gza' brgyad rgyu bar byed pa rnams so //
translated: “ Eight in the heart” are the channels such as the iśvaraṇī, which are the supports of the samāna and so on, and they cause the eight planets to move by the division of periods in each day.

original: 'dir 'og dang steng gi rtsa gnyis kyi rten pa ni rlung ngo //
analyzed: 'dir 'og dang steng gi rtsa gnyis kyi rten pa ni rlung ngo //
translated: Here the supports of the upper and lower channels are the winds.

original: spyi bor mi bdag ces pa ni tshes bcu drug 'jug par byed pa rnams so //
analyzed: spyi bor mi bdag ces pa ni tshes bcu drug 'jug par byed pa rnams so //
translated: “ The lord of men in the head” are the sixteen that cause the sixteenth lunar day to enter.

original: mgrin pa la yang so yi grangs zhes pa ni mgrin pa'i 'khor lo la rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang dbyug gu'i skar ma bzhi 'jug par byed pa sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: mgrin pa la yang so yi grangs zhes pa ni mgrin pa'i 'khor lo la rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang dbyug gu'i skar ma bzhi 'jug par byed pa sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
translated: “ The number of teeth in the throat” are the thirty-two that cause the twenty-eight lunar mansions, the four asterisms of the club, and the moon to enter the throat cakra.

original: lte bar te lte ba'i padma la khyim gyi rtsa ba'i phyi rol du chu tshod kyi rtsa brgyad ni brgyad kyis bsgyur ba rtsa drug cu rtsa bzhi ste dkyil 'khor drug cu 'bab par byed pa dang stong pa bzhi 'bab par byed pa ste dbyug gu drug cu
analyzed: lte bar te lte ba'i padma la khyim gyi rtsa ba'i phyi rol du chu tshod kyi rtsa brgyad ni brgyad kyis bsgyur ba rtsa drug cu rtsa bzhi ste dkyil 'khor drug cu 'bab par byed pa dang stong pa bzhi 'bab par byed pa ste dbyug gu drug cu
translated: At the navel, that is, in the lotus of the navel, outside the root of the house, the eight nāḍīs of the hours are multiplied by eight, making sixty-four nāḍīs, which cause the flow of the sixty maṇḍalas and the flow of the four voids.

original: rtsa bzhi 'bab par byed pa'o ;
analyzed: rtsa bzhi 'bab par byed pa'o ;
translated: They cause the flow of sixty-four ghaṭikās.

original: / nyis 'gyur mi bdag ces pa ni sum cu rtsa gnyis te gsang ba'i dbus su gsang ba'i padma'i rtsa khu ba la sogs pa'i khams sum cu rtsa gnyis 'jug par byed pa rnams so //
analyzed: / nyis 'gyur mi bdag ces pa ni sum cu rtsa gnyis te gsang ba'i dbus su gsang ba'i padma'i rtsa khu ba la sogs pa'i khams sum cu rtsa gnyis 'jug par byed pa rnams so //
translated: “The double of the lords of men” is thirty-two. In the middle of the secret place, in the secret lotus, the nāḍīs cause the flow of the thirty-two constituents, such as semen.

original: 'di rnams las rtsa drug ni 'khor lo 'gog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di rnams las rtsa drug ni 'khor lo 'gog par 'gyur ro //
translated: From among these, six nāḍīs cause the cakras to cease.

original: bcus yul 'gog par 'gyur te de rnams ni 'dus pa'i rang bzhin no //🔽slar yang de dag nyis 'gyur ni bad kan gyi cha ste nyi shu'o //
analyzed: bcus yul 'gog par 'gyur te de rnams ni 'dus pa'i rang bzhin no // slar yang de dag nyis 'gyur ni bad kan gyi cha ste nyi shu'o //
translated: Ten cause the objects to cease. They are the nature of the aggregates.🔽Again, their double is the phlegm part, twenty.

original: slar yang nyis 'gyur ni mkhris pa'i cha ste bzhi bcur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: slar yang nyis 'gyur ni mkhris pa'i cha ste bzhi bcur 'gyur ro //
translated: Again, their double is the bile part, making forty.

original: slar yang de dag rlung gi cha brgyad cur 'gyur te de ltar 'khor lo drug po rnams la rtsa lnga bcu rtsa drug lhag pa'i brgya rnam par gnas pa ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsar rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: slar yang de dag rlung gi cha brgyad cur 'gyur te de ltar 'khor lo drug po rnams la rtsa lnga bcu rtsa drug lhag pa'i brgya rnam par gnas pa ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsar rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Again, these [channels] become the eighty parts of the wind. Thus, in the six cakras, the channels are understood to be the Kālacakra channels, which are one hundred and fifty-six.

original: 'di dag nges par 'chi ba ster byed bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis tshe dang nad med dag kyang ster /
analyzed: 'di dag nges par 'chi ba ster byed bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis tshe dang nad med dag kyang ster /
translated: These [channels] definitely bestow death, but by the power of the guru's initiation, they also bestow longevity and health.

original: 'khor lo drug la dus kyi rtsa brjod pa rnams bla ma'i man ngag gis bsgoms par gyur na 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog ste rnal 'byor ba rnams kyi 'di la ngo mtshar med do //
analyzed: 'khor lo drug la dus kyi rtsa brjod pa rnams bla ma'i man ngag gis bsgoms par gyur na 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog ste rnal 'byor ba rnams kyi 'di la ngo mtshar med do //
translated: If the channels of time in the six cakras are meditated on by the guru's instructions, the fear of death is removed. This is not surprising for yogins.

original: gtsug tor la ni chu gter te bzhi'o //
analyzed: gtsug tor la ni chu gter te bzhi'o //
translated: In the uṣṇīṣa, there are four oceans.

original: dpral bar rgya mtshos bsnun pa'i dus rnams zhes pa bcu drug ste rtsa nyi shu po 'di dag ni bad kan gyi khams rab tu 'khrug pa'o //
analyzed: dpral bar rgya mtshos bsnun pa'i dus rnams zhes pa bcu drug ste rtsa nyi shu po 'di dag ni bad kan gyi khams rab tu 'khrug pa'o //
translated: On the forehead, there are sixteen times the ocean, which are the twenty channels that disturb the phlegm element.

original: mgrin par so dang zhes pa ni rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: mgrin par so dang zhes pa ni rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
translated: In the throat, there are thirty-two channels called teeth.

original: @245b snying kha'i chu skyes dag la mig gis bsgyur ba'i dus rnams zhes pa ni rtsa brgyad de rtsa bzhi bcu po 'di dag ni mkhris pa'i khams dgu rab tu 'khrug pa'o //
analyzed: @245b snying kha'i chu skyes dag la mig gis bsgyur ba'i dus rnams zhes pa ni rtsa brgyad de rtsa bzhi bcu po 'di dag ni mkhris pa'i khams dgu rab tu 'khrug pa'o //
translated: The “times of the eyes’ movements on the heart’s lotus” are the eight channels, and these forty channels are the disturbance of the nine humors of bile.

original: lte ba dang gsang ba bdag la grangs bzhin du chu gter drug cu zhes pa ni rtsa drug cu rtsa bzhi'o //
analyzed: lte ba dang gsang ba bdag la grangs bzhin du chu gter drug cu zhes pa ni rtsa drug cu rtsa bzhi'o //
translated: “The sixty oceans at the navel and the secret place” are the sixty-four channels.

original: mi bdag dag kyang ste gsang ba'i padma'i phyi rol yongs su bskor ba la rtsa bcu drug go //
analyzed: mi bdag dag kyang ste gsang ba'i padma'i phyi rol yongs su bskor ba la rtsa bcu drug go //
translated: “The lords of men” are the sixteen channels that surround the secret lotus.

original: rtsa brgyad cu po 'di dag ni rlung gi khams rab tu 'khrugs pa'o //
analyzed: rtsa brgyad cu po 'di dag ni rlung gi khams rab tu 'khrugs pa'o //
translated: These eighty channels are the disturbance of the wind humor.

original: gsang bar gzhan ni phyogs dang zhes pa ni yongs su bskor ba la rtsa bcu'o //
analyzed: gsang bar gzhan ni phyogs dang zhes pa ni yongs su bskor ba la rtsa bcu'o //
translated: “The other directions at the secret place” are the ten channels that surround the secret place.

original: gzhan drug kyang grangs bzhin du snying po'i yongs su bskor ba la'o //
analyzed: gzhan drug kyang grangs bzhin du snying po'i yongs su bskor ba la'o //
translated: The other six are also, in order, the ten channels that surround the heart.

original: 'dus pa dag ste zhes pa ni 'dus pa rab tu 'khrug pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus pa dag ste zhes pa ni 'dus pa rab tu 'khrug pa'o //
translated: “The gatherings” are the disturbances of the gatherings.

original: 'gog pa'o zhes pa ni 'khor lo drug 'gog pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'gog pa'o zhes pa ni 'khor lo drug 'gog pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: “The cessation” is the nature of the cessation of the six cakras.

original: de ltar na lnga bcu rtsa drug gi lhag pa'i brgya ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa lha dang lha mo'i rang bzhin gyis gnas pa byis pa rnams la 'chi ba ste bar byed pa ste ;
analyzed: de ltar na lnga bcu rtsa drug gi lhag pa'i brgya ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa lha dang lha mo'i rang bzhin gyis gnas pa byis pa rnams la 'chi ba ste bar byed pa ste ;
translated: Thus, the remaining one hundred and fifty-six are the nature of the deities of the Kālacakra mandala. They cause death to the childish.

original: rigs drug gi rtsa dang lhan cig drug cu rtsa gnyis lhag pa'i brgya'i dus kyi 'khor lo 'khor lo drug gi rtsa'i bdag nyid can bsgoms par gyur pa na rnal 'byor pa rnams la bde ba ster bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: rigs drug gi rtsa dang lhan cig drug cu rtsa gnyis lhag pa'i brgya'i dus kyi 'khor lo 'khor lo drug gi rtsa'i bdag nyid can bsgoms par gyur pa na rnal 'byor pa rnams la bde ba ster bar byed pa'o //
translated: When the yogī/nī meditates on the Kālacakra with the sixty-two nadīs of the six families, which is the nature of the one hundred and fifty-six nadīs of the six cakras, it bestows bliss to the yogī/nī.

original: slar yang rtsa drug cu rtsa gnyis lhag pa'i brgya po de dag gi rtsa so so la rlung bcu rab tu rgyu ba dang phung po dang khams bcu'i rang bzhin gyis rnam pa bcur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: slar yang rtsa drug cu rtsa gnyis lhag pa'i brgya po de dag gi rtsa so so la rlung bcu rab tu rgyu ba dang phung po dang khams bcu'i rang bzhin gyis rnam pa bcur 'gyur ro //
translated: Again, each of those one hundred and fifty-six nadīs has ten vāyus moving within them, and they become tenfold by the nature of the ten aggregates and elements.

original: de ltar thams cad bcus bsgyur ba ni nyi shu lhag pa'i brgya phrag bcu drug gi grangs su 'gyur te rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi chu tshong 'bab pa rnams so //
analyzed: de ltar thams cad bcus bsgyur ba ni nyi shu lhag pa'i brgya phrag bcu drug gi grangs su 'gyur te rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi chu tshong 'bab pa rnams so //
translated: Thus, all of them multiplied by ten are sixteen hundred and twenty, which is the number of the twenty-seven lunar mansions.

original: de bzhin du dpal ldan rgyu skar gyi dkyil 'khor mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas la shes rab dang thabs kyi 'di snyed kyi lha'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dpal ldan rgyu skar gyi dkyil 'khor mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas la shes rab dang thabs kyi 'di snyed kyi lha'o //
translated: Likewise, in the maṇḍala of the glorious constellations, there are this many deities of method and wisdom in the primordial buddha.

original: rgyu skar gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas pa 'di las 'jig rten kun rdzob kyis bad kan la sogs pa'i khams 'bab pa'i lha rnams 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'am rang gi lus bsgrub pa'i slad du 'jam dpal gyis phyung ba ni 'khor lo drug gi gtso mo rnams
analyzed: rgyu skar gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas pa 'di las 'jig rten kun rdzob kyis bad kan la sogs pa'i khams 'bab pa'i lha rnams 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'am rang gi lus bsgrub pa'i slad du 'jam dpal gyis phyung ba ni 'khor lo drug gi gtso mo rnams
translated: From this extensive maṇḍala of the constellations, the worldly siddhis are accomplished by the deities of the descending constituents, such as phlegm, and so on, and in order to accomplish one’s body, Mañjuśrī emanated the principal ones of the six cakras.

original: so // dus kyis 'khor lo'i rtsa sdom pa'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: so // dus kyis 'khor lo'i rtsa sdom pa'i nges pa'o //
translated: This is the definition of the binding of the nāḍīs of the Kālacakra.

original: da ni drug ces pa la sogs pas rigs drug gi rtsa bsrung ba gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni drug ces pa la sogs pas rigs drug gi rtsa bsrung ba gsungs te /
translated: Now, beginning from “six,” the protection of the nāḍīs of the six families is explained.

original: 'dir lus la gang zhig rtsa drug gi 'khor lo 'gog par brjod pa rnams @246a * //
analyzed: 'dir lus la gang zhig rtsa drug gi 'khor lo 'gog par brjod pa rnams @246a * //
translated: Here, the ones who are said to block the cakras of the six nāḍīs in the body

original: gsum gyi lam la gnas pa ni steng du zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgra gcan te g-yon dang g-yas dang dbu ma'i lam la gnas pa dang / 'og tu zla ba dang nyi ma dang me yi dbye bas bshang ba dang gci ba dang khu ba'i lam la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: gsum gyi lam la gnas pa ni steng du zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgra gcan te g-yon dang g-yas dang dbu ma'i lam la gnas pa dang / 'og tu zla ba dang nyi ma dang me yi dbye bas bshang ba dang gci ba dang khu ba'i lam la gnas pa'o //
translated: The three paths are the paths of the left, right, and middle, which are the moon, sun, and Rāhu, respectively, above, and the paths of feces, urine, and semen, respectively, below, which are the moon, sun, and fire.

original: de ni rnal 'byor pas lus la bsrung bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ni rnal 'byor pas lus la bsrung bar bya'o //
translated: The yogī should protect the body with these.

original: gang gis zhe na bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis zhes pa la bla ma'i nges pa ni sbyar ba yan lag drug ste des 'chi ba las bsrung bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang gis zhe na bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis zhes pa la bla ma'i nges pa ni sbyar ba yan lag drug ste des 'chi ba las bsrung bar bya'o //
translated: By what? By the guru’s instructions. The guru’s instructions are the six-branched yoga. By that, one should protect against death.

original: gang zhig srog chags rnams la 'chi ba ster ba ni drug po 'di rnams la srog zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig srog chags rnams la 'chi ba ster ba ni drug po 'di rnams la srog zhugs pa'o //
translated: The one who grants death to living beings is the life force that enters these six.

original: drug la gal te srog ni rab zhugs gyur na de tshe mi rnams kyi ni dus thams cad du 'chi ba 'joms par nges te mtha' gcig tu'o //
analyzed: drug la gal te srog ni rab zhugs gyur na de tshe mi rnams kyi ni dus thams cad du 'chi ba 'joms par nges te mtha' gcig tu'o //
translated: If the life force enters the six, then at that time, for humans, death is always destroyed, without a doubt.

original: drug po 'di dag gi nang nas phra mo ni dbu ma aa ba dh'u t'i ste phra mo de la srog ma zhugs par gyur na rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis 'chi ba'i yul ni gang du gcod par byed de nges par 'chi ba'i yul gcod par mi byed
analyzed: drug po 'di dag gi nang nas phra mo ni dbu ma aa ba dh'u t'i ste phra mo de la srog ma zhugs par gyur na rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis 'chi ba'i yul ni gang du gcod par byed de nges par 'chi ba'i yul gcod par mi byed
translated: From among these six, the subtle one is the central channel avadhūtī. If the life force does not enter that subtle channel, then in which place do yogis cut off death? They definitely do not cut off the place of death.

original: do // bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i 'grel bshad rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od las nang du 'khor los sgyur ba dang kla klo'i 'khrug pa dang dus kyi 'khor lo'i rigs kyi rgyud dang
analyzed: do // bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i 'grel bshad rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od las nang du 'khor los sgyur ba dang kla klo'i 'khrug pa dang dus kyi 'khor lo'i rigs kyi rgyud dang
translated: The Stainless Light, a commentary on the root tantra, the twelve thousand verse King of Glorious Sutras, the Wheel of Time, states that the third chapter is about the internal cakravartins, the disturbances of the barbarians, the tantra of the Wheel of Time's family,

original: rtsa'i rigs 'byung ba'i mdor bsdus chen po ste gsum pa'o /
analyzed: rtsa'i rigs 'byung ba'i mdor bsdus chen po ste gsum pa'o /
translated: and the great summary of the channels' families.

original: // / da ni srog ces pa la sogs pas lus can rnams kyi dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid gsungs te /
analyzed: // / da ni srog ces pa la sogs pas lus can rnams kyi dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid gsungs te /
translated: Now, beginning with the line life force, the text states the characteristics of untimely death for embodied beings.

original: 'dir lus la lte ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i khyim gyi 'khor lo ste lug la sogs pa mi mnyam pa'i dus sbyor gyi bdag nyid gcig gis bar du chod pa dang de bzhin du glang la sogs pa mnyam pa'i dus sbyor gyi bdag nyid gcig gis
analyzed: 'dir lus la lte ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i khyim gyi 'khor lo ste lug la sogs pa mi mnyam pa'i dus sbyor gyi bdag nyid gcig gis bar du chod pa dang de bzhin du glang la sogs pa mnyam pa'i dus sbyor gyi bdag nyid gcig gis
translated: Here, the navel cakra has twelve spokes, the wheel of the houses, with one sign of the unequal lunar mansions, Aries and so on, in the middle and one sign of the equal lunar mansions, Taurus and so on, in the middle.

original: bar du chod pa'i 'dab ma ste /
analyzed: bar du chod pa'i 'dab ma ste /
translated: The petals are the twelve houses.

original: de'i phyir na sna bug la srog yang dag par rgyu ba ni lug la sogs pa mi mnyam pa'i dus sbyor drug la g-yon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir na sna bug la srog yang dag par rgyu ba ni lug la sogs pa mi mnyam pa'i dus sbyor drug la g-yon du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the movement of the life force in the nostrils is on the left for the six signs of the unequal lunar mansions, Aries and so on.

original: glang la sogs pa mnyam pa'i 'dus sbyor rnams la sna bug g-yas su srog yang dag par rgyu bar 'gyur te dbyug gu lnga lngas 'pho ba bcu gnyis rnams nyin zhag so sor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: glang la sogs pa mnyam pa'i 'dus sbyor rnams la sna bug g-yas su srog yang dag par rgyu bar 'gyur te dbyug gu lnga lngas 'pho ba bcu gnyis rnams nyin zhag so sor 'gyur ro //
translated: The movement of the life force in the right nostril is for the signs of the equal lunar mansions, Taurus and so on. Five ghaṭikās each for the twelve transits occur in each day.

original: de ltar nyin mtshan gyi dbyug gu drug cus 'pho ba bcu gnyis te drug ni g-yon @246b gyi sna bug la'o //
analyzed: de ltar nyin mtshan gyi dbyug gu drug cus 'pho ba bcu gnyis te drug ni g-yon @246b gyi sna bug la'o //
translated: Thus, the twelve transits occur in sixty ghaṭikās of day and night. Six occur in the left nostril.

original: drug ni g-yas kyi sna bug la'o //
analyzed: drug ni g-yas kyi sna bug la'o //
translated: Six occur in the right nostril.

original: dbu ma la bcu gnyis rab tu 'jug pa rnams su'o //
analyzed: dbu ma la bcu gnyis rab tu 'jug pa rnams su'o //
translated: In the twelve channels of the body.

original: lus la nad dang bral ba rnams ni khams mnyam pa nyid de nad kyis zil gyis mnan pa rnams ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi khams mi mnyam pa nyid do //
analyzed: lus la nad dang bral ba rnams ni khams mnyam pa nyid de nad kyis zil gyis mnan pa rnams ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi khams mi mnyam pa nyid do //
translated: Those whose body is free from disease have a balanced humoral constitution; those who are overcome by disease have an unbalanced humoral constitution, with an excess of wind, bile, or phlegm.

original: mi mnyam pa de las srog mi mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa de las srog mi mnyam pa ste /
translated: From that imbalance comes an imbalance of life.

original: des na rtsa gcig ste g-yon pa la nyin dang mtshan mor gal te 'bab na de'i tshe 'tsho bdag ni dus kyi lo ste /
analyzed: des na rtsa gcig ste g-yon pa la nyin dang mtshan mor gal te 'bab na de'i tshe 'tsho bdag ni dus kyi lo ste /
translated: If the life force flows in the left channel, day and night, for one hundred years, that is the measure of the life span of humans.

original: dbu ma'i lo brgya rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni mi rnams kyi 'tsho ba'i grangs su 'gyur ro //🔽gal te phyogs gcig rnam par  ma chad 'bab na de'i tshe phyed dang bcas pa'i lo ni tsher 'gyur te de nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbu ma'i lo brgya rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni mi rnams kyi 'tsho ba'i grangs su 'gyur ro // gal te phyogs gcig rnam par  ma chad 'bab na de'i tshe phyed dang bcas pa'i lo ni tsher 'gyur te de nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The measure of the life span of humans is the completion of one hundred years in the central channel.🔽If the life force flows in the left channel, day and night, for fifty years, that is the measure of the life span of humans.🔽If the life force flows in the left channel, day and night, for one month, that is the measure of the life span of humans.🔽If the life force flows in the left channel, day and night, for one month, that is the measure of the life span of humans.🔽If the life force flows in the left channel, day and night, for one month, that is the measure of the life span of humans.🔽If the life force flows in the left channel, day and night, for one month, that is the measure of the life span of humans.🔽If the life force flows in the left channel, day and night, for one month, that is the measure of the life span of humans.🔽If the life force flows in the left channel, day and night, for one month, that is the measure of the life span of humans.🔽If the life force flows in the left channel, day and night, for one month, that is the measure of the life span of humans.🔽If the life force flows in the left channel, day and night, for one month, that is the measure of the life span of humans.🔽If the life force flows in the left channel, day and night, for one month, that is the measure of the life span of humans.🔽If the life force flows in the left channel, day and night, for one month, that is the measure of the life span of humans.🔽If the life force flows in the left channel, day and night, for one month, that is the measure of the life span of humans.

original: gal te zla ba gcig tu rnam par  ma chad de bar chad med par rtsa g-yon par 'bab na de'i tshe 'tsho ba zla ba gsum du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te zla ba gcig tu rnam par  ma chad de bar chad med par rtsa g-yon par 'bab na de'i tshe 'tsho ba zla ba gsum du 'gyur ro //
translated: If the life force flows in the left channel, day and night, for one month, that is the measure of the life span of humans.🔽If the life force flows in the left channel,

original: de ltar rnal 'byor pas ni rang lus ngag la zla bgrod 'chi ba dus kyi 'khor lor shes par bya zhes pa ni 'chi ltas kyi yul la dus kyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i khyim gyi 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: de ltar rnal 'byor pas ni rang lus ngag la zla bgrod 'chi ba dus kyi 'khor lor shes par bya zhes pa ni 'chi ltas kyi yul la dus kyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i khyim gyi 'khor lo ste /
translated: The wheel of time is the wheel of the houses with twelve spokes in the domain of the signs of death.

original: de nyid sa la bris nas 'dab ma dang po la 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag gcig dang tshe'i zla ba sum cu rtsa drug dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid sa la bris nas 'dab ma dang po la 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag gcig dang tshe'i zla ba sum cu rtsa drug dgod par bya'o //
translated: Having drawn that on the ground, one should set down one day of the signs of death and thirty-six months on the first petal.

original: de nas zla gcig mi 'bab bo ;
analyzed: de nas zla gcig mi 'bab bo ;
translated: Then, for one month, the life does not flow.

original: /'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag 'phel ba ni zla ba gnyis pa'i mthar zla ba gsum pa 'jug pa na g-yon pa'i rtsa de nyid kyi 'dab ma la nyin zhag gnyis 'bab bo //
analyzed: /'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag 'phel ba ni zla ba gnyis pa'i mthar zla ba gsum pa 'jug pa na g-yon pa'i rtsa de nyid kyi 'dab ma la nyin zhag gnyis 'bab bo //
translated: The increase of the days of the signs of death is that at the end of the second month, when the third month enters, the life flows for two days on the petal of that left channel.

original: de nas zla ba gsum pa ni mi 'bab bo //
analyzed: de nas zla ba gsum pa ni mi 'bab bo //
translated: Then, for the third month, the life does not flow.

original: de nas zla ba bzhi pa'i mthar zla ba lnga pa 'jug pa na g-yon pa'i rtsar nyin zhag gsum du srog 'bab bo //
analyzed: de nas zla ba bzhi pa'i mthar zla ba lnga pa 'jug pa na g-yon pa'i rtsar nyin zhag gsum du srog 'bab bo //
translated: Then, at the end of the fourth month, when the fifth month enters, the life flows for three days in the left channel.

original: zla ba lnga pa de nas zla ba drug pa la mi 'bab bo //
analyzed: zla ba lnga pa de nas zla ba drug pa la mi 'bab bo //
translated: Then, for the fifth month, the life does not flow.

original: de ltar na zla ba drug gis 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag gsum ste /
analyzed: de ltar na zla ba drug gis 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag gsum ste /
translated: Thus, in six months, three days of the signs of death have passed.

original: bar gyi nyin zhag gsum ni mthar g-yas dang g-yon gyi 'chi ltas kyi chos can no //
analyzed: bar gyi nyin zhag gsum ni mthar g-yas dang g-yon gyi 'chi ltas kyi chos can no //
translated: The three intermediate days are the right and left signs of death at the end.

original: 'chi ltas zhes bya ba ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba ste 'chi ltas min pa ni lo brgya'i mtshams su 'chi ba'o //
analyzed: 'chi ltas zhes bya ba ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba ste 'chi ltas min pa ni lo brgya'i mtshams su 'chi ba'o //
translated: The signs of death are untimely death, and the absence of signs of death is death at the end of a hundred years.

original: de ltar na 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag dang bcas pa /
analyzed: de ltar na 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag dang bcas pa /
translated: Thus, together with the days of the signs of death,

original: 'tsho ba'i zla ba sum cu rtsa drug las zla ba drug song ste /
analyzed: 'tsho ba'i zla ba sum cu rtsa drug las zla ba drug song ste /
translated: thirty-six months of life have passed, and six months remain.

original: de nas 'dab ma de la srog gi rlung yang dag par rgyu ba med do //🔽'pho ba bcu gcig dang dbugs 'byung ba dang 'jug pa drug @247a * //
analyzed: de nas 'dab ma de la srog gi rlung yang dag par rgyu ba med do // 'pho ba bcu gcig dang dbugs 'byung ba dang 'jug pa drug @247a * //
translated: Then, in that petal, the life-sustaining wind does not flow properly.

original: brgya lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis nyin mtshan du 'gyur te /
analyzed: brgya lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis nyin mtshan du 'gyur te /
translated: Eleven transits and six hundred and twenty-one breaths make a day and night.

original: 'dir khyim gyi 'dab ma yongs su dor yang dbugs kyi 'khor lo ni dman pa med do //
analyzed: 'dir khyim gyi 'dab ma yongs su dor yang dbugs kyi 'khor lo ni dman pa med do //
translated: Here, although the petal of the house is abandoned, the wheel of breath does not decrease.

original: de nas 'dab ma gnyis pa la nyin zhag bzhi pa dang nyin zhag lnga pa dang nyin zhag drug pa ni zla ba bdun pa dang brgyad pa dang dgu pa la grangs bzhin du 'bab ste 'tsho ba'i zla ba'i tshogs sum cu po de las zla ba gsum
analyzed: de nas 'dab ma gnyis pa la nyin zhag bzhi pa dang nyin zhag lnga pa dang nyin zhag drug pa ni zla ba bdun pa dang brgyad pa dang dgu pa la grangs bzhin du 'bab ste 'tsho ba'i zla ba'i tshogs sum cu po de las zla ba gsum
translated: From those thirty days of the life month, three months have passed.

original: song ngo // de nas zla ba nyi shu rtsa bdun bzung nas 'dab ma gsum pa la srog yang dag par rgyu'o //
analyzed: song ngo // de nas zla ba nyi shu rtsa bdun bzung nas 'dab ma gsum pa la srog yang dag par rgyu'o //
translated: Then, having taken twenty-seven days, the life force moves correctly on the third petal.

original: 'dab ma gnyis spangs shing 'pho ba bcus nyin mtshan byed de 'dab ma bcu la srog yang dag par 'pho'o //
analyzed: 'dab ma gnyis spangs shing 'pho ba bcus nyin mtshan byed de 'dab ma bcu la srog yang dag par 'pho'o //
translated: Having abandoned two petals, ten transits make day and night. The life force moves correctly on ten petals.

original: zla ba nyi shu rtsa bdun las slar yang zla ba so so la nyin zhag bdun g-yon gyi rtsar 'bab ste nyin zhag brgyad dang nyin zhag dgu 'bab pa'o //
analyzed: zla ba nyi shu rtsa bdun las slar yang zla ba so so la nyin zhag bdun g-yon gyi rtsar 'bab ste nyin zhag brgyad dang nyin zhag dgu 'bab pa'o //
translated: From twenty-seven days, each month has seven days in the left channel, and eight and nine days, respectively, in the right channel.

original: de nas zla ba nyi shu rtsa bdun las zla ba gzhan gsum gyis dman par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas zla ba nyi shu rtsa bdun las zla ba gzhan gsum gyis dman par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, from twenty-seven days, three months are subtracted.

original: de bzhin du sngar brjod pa'i cho gas khyim gyi 'dab ma gsum pa dor te 'dab ma dgu la srog yang dag par 'pho bar byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin du sngar brjod pa'i cho gas khyim gyi 'dab ma gsum pa dor te 'dab ma dgu la srog yang dag par 'pho bar byed do //
translated: In the same way, by the previously mentioned process, he abandons the third petal of the house and the life force moves into the nine petals.

original: de bzhin du nyin zhag bcu dang / nyin zhag bcu gcig dang / nyin zhag bcu gnyis g-yon gyi rtsar 'bab bo //
analyzed: de bzhin du nyin zhag bcu dang / nyin zhag bcu gcig dang / nyin zhag bcu gnyis g-yon gyi rtsar 'bab bo //
translated: In the same way, the life force moves into the left channel for ten days, eleven days, and twelve days.

original: de nas 'dab ma bzhi pa dor te 'tsho ba'i zla ba nyi shu rtsa bzhi las zla ba gsum gyis dman par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas 'dab ma bzhi pa dor te 'tsho ba'i zla ba nyi shu rtsa bzhi las zla ba gsum gyis dman par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, abandoning the fourth petal, the life force moves into the twenty-four petals of the life moon, which is diminished by three months.

original: de bzhin du nyin zhag bcu gsum dang / nyin zhag bcu bzhi dang / nyin zhag bcva lnga ste de nas 'dab ma lnga pa dor te 'dab ma bdun la 'pho bar byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin du nyin zhag bcu gsum dang / nyin zhag bcu bzhi dang / nyin zhag bcva lnga ste de nas 'dab ma lnga pa dor te 'dab ma bdun la 'pho bar byed do //
translated: In the same way, the life force moves into the thirteenth, fourteenth, and fifteenth petals. Then, abandoning the fifth petal, the life force moves into the seven petals.

original: zla ba nyi shu rtsa gcig las zla ba gsum gyis dman par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zla ba nyi shu rtsa gcig las zla ba gsum gyis dman par 'gyur ro //
translated: The life moon is diminished by three months from twenty-one days.

original: de bzhin du nyin zhag bcu drug dang nyin zhag bcu bdun dang / nyin zhag bcva brgyad zla ba so sor rim pa bzhin du 'bab bo //
analyzed: de bzhin du nyin zhag bcu drug dang nyin zhag bcu bdun dang / nyin zhag bcva brgyad zla ba so sor rim pa bzhin du 'bab bo //
translated: In the same way, the life force moves into the sixteenth, seventeenth, and eighteenth petals, respectively, for one month.

original: de nas 'dab ma drug pa dor te 'dab ma drug la 'pho bar byed cing 'tsho ba'i zla ba bcva brgyad las zla ba gsum gyis dman par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas 'dab ma drug pa dor te 'dab ma drug la 'pho bar byed cing 'tsho ba'i zla ba bcva brgyad las zla ba gsum gyis dman par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, having discarded the sixth petal, the life force moves to the six petals, and the life of eighteen months is reduced by three months.

original: de bzhin du nyin zhag bcu dgu dang nyin zhag nyi shu dang nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig 'bab bo //
analyzed: de bzhin du nyin zhag bcu dgu dang nyin zhag nyi shu dang nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig 'bab bo //
translated: In the same way, it moves for nineteen days, twenty days, and twenty-one days.

original: de nas khyim gyi 'dab ma bdun pa dor te khyim gyi 'dab ma lnga la nyin mtshan gyi srog 'pho bar byed do //
analyzed: de nas khyim gyi 'dab ma bdun pa dor te khyim gyi 'dab ma lnga la nyin mtshan gyi srog 'pho bar byed do //
translated: Then, having discarded the seventh petal of the house, the life force moves to the five petals of the house for day and night.

original: de nas 'tsho ba'i zla ba bcva lnga las zla ba gsum gyis dman par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas 'tsho ba'i zla ba bcva lnga las zla ba gsum gyis dman par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, the life of fifteen months is reduced by three months.

original: @247b de bzhin du nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang / nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gsum dang / nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bzhi bar chad med par gang gi tshe 'bab pa de'i tshe 'dab ma brgyad 'dor te 'dab ma bzhi la 'pho bar byed do //
analyzed: @247b de bzhin du nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang / nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gsum dang / nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bzhi bar chad med par gang gi tshe 'bab pa de'i tshe 'dab ma brgyad 'dor te 'dab ma bzhi la 'pho bar byed do //
translated: In the same way, when it moves uninterruptedly for twenty-two days, twenty-three days, and twenty-four days, then having discarded the eighth petal, it moves to the four petals.

original: 'tsho ba'i zla ba bcu gnyis las zla ba gsum gyis dman par 'gyur ro //🔽de bzhin du nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa lnga dang / nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa drug dang / nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdug gang gi tshe 'bab pa de'i tshe 'dab ma dgu pa dor te 'dab ma gsum pa la 'pho bar byed do //🔽'tsho ba'i zla ba dgu las zla ba gsum gyis dman par 'gyur ro //🔽de bzhin du nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa dgu dang / nyin zhag sum cu gang gi tshe 'bab pa de'i tshe 'dab ma bcu pa dor te 'dab ma gnyis la 'pho bar byed do //
analyzed: 'tsho ba'i zla ba bcu gnyis las zla ba gsum gyis dman par 'gyur ro // de bzhin du nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa lnga dang / nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa drug dang / nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdug gang gi tshe 'bab pa de'i tshe 'dab ma dgu pa dor te 'dab ma gsum pa la 'pho bar byed do // 'tsho ba'i zla ba dgu las zla ba gsum gyis dman par 'gyur ro // de bzhin du nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa dgu dang / nyin zhag sum cu gang gi tshe 'bab pa de'i tshe 'dab ma bcu pa dor te 'dab ma gnyis la 'pho bar byed do //
translated: The life of twelve months is reduced by three months.

original: 'tsho ba'i zla ba drug las zla ba gsum gyis dman par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'tsho ba'i zla ba drug las zla ba gsum gyis dman par 'gyur ro //
