translated: In the same way, when the wind moves for twenty-five days, twenty-six days, twenty-seven days, twenty-eight days, twenty-nine days, thirty days, thirty-one days, thirty-two days, thirty-three days, thirty-four days, thirty-five days, thirty-six days, thirty-seven days, thirty-eight days, thirty-nine days, forty days, forty-one days, forty-two days, forty-three days, forty-four days, forty-five days, forty-six days, forty-seven days, forty-eight days, forty-nine days, fifty days, fifty-one days, fifty-two days, fifty-three days, fifty-four days, fifty-five days, fifty-six days, fifty-seven days, fifty-eight days, fifty-nine days, sixty days, sixty-one days, sixty-two days, sixty-three days, sixty-four days, sixty-five days, sixty-six days, sixty-seven days, sixty-eight days, sixty-nine days, seventy days, seventy-one days, seventy-two days, seventy-three days, seventy-four days, seventy-five days, seventy-six days, seventy-seven days, seventy-eight days, seventy-nine days, eighty days, eighty-one days, eighty-two days, eighty-three days, eighty-four days, eighty-five days, eighty-six days, eighty-seven days, eighty-eight days, eighty-nine days, ninety days, ninety-one days, ninety-two days, ninety-three days, ninety-four days, ninety-five days, ninety-six days, ninety-seven days, ninety-eight days, ninety-nine days, one hundred days, one hundred and one days, one hundred and two days, one hundred and three days, one hundred and four days, one hundred and five days, one hundred and six days, one hundred and seven days, one hundred and eight days, one hundred and nine days, one hundred and ten days, one hundred and eleven days, one hundred and twelve days, one hundred and thirteen days, one hundred and fourteen days, one hundred and fifteen days, one hundred and sixteen days, one hundred and seventeen days, one hundred and eighteen days, one hundred and nineteen days, one hundred and twenty days, one hundred and twenty

original: de bzhin du nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gcig dang / nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum gang gi tshe 'bab pa de'i tshe 'dab ma bcu gcig pa dor te /
analyzed: de bzhin du nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gcig dang / nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum gang gi tshe 'bab pa de'i tshe 'dab ma bcu gcig pa dor te /
translated: In the same way, when it descends in thirty-one days, thirty-two days, or thirty-three days, then it abandons the eleventh petal,

original: 'dab ma gcig la 'pho bar byed do //
analyzed: 'dab ma gcig la 'pho bar byed do //
translated: and moves to the single petal.

original: 'tsho ba'i zla ba gsum las nyin zhag dgu bcus dman par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'tsho ba'i zla ba gsum las nyin zhag dgu bcus dman par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the three months of life, it is diminished by ninety days.

original: de nas sngar gyi 'dab ma la ma babs pa'i nyin zhag gsum po ni 'dab ma bcu gnyis pa la nyin zhag gnyis 'bab bo //
analyzed: de nas sngar gyi 'dab ma la ma babs pa'i nyin zhag gsum po ni 'dab ma bcu gnyis pa la nyin zhag gnyis 'bab bo //
translated: Then, the three days that have not descended on the previous petal descend on the twelfth petal in two days.

original: de nas 'dab ma bcu gnyis pa 'dor ro //
analyzed: de nas 'dab ma bcu gnyis pa 'dor ro //
translated: Then, it abandons the twelfth petal.

original: de nas lte ba la nyin zhag gcig 'bab ste /
analyzed: de nas lte ba la nyin zhag gcig 'bab ste /
translated: Then, it descends on the navel for one day,

original: srog gi 'khor lo'i dbugs chad par 'gyur ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: srog gi 'khor lo'i dbugs chad par 'gyur ba'i bar du'o //
translated: until the life-wheel breath is cut off.

original: de nas rtsa g-yon pa'i 'chi ltas kyis gang dag rnal 'byor pa ma yin pa'i mi rnams 'chi par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas rtsa g-yon pa'i 'chi ltas kyis gang dag rnal 'byor pa ma yin pa'i mi rnams 'chi par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, by the death-omen of the left channel, non-yogis die.

original: g-yon pa'i rtsa la zla ba'i 'chi ltas kyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i rtsa la zla ba'i 'chi ltas kyi nges pa'o //
translated: The left channel is the lunar death-omen.

original: snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa'i dbye bas zla ba so sor 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag re re lhag pas 'phel lo //
analyzed: snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa'i dbye bas zla ba so sor 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag re re lhag pas 'phel lo //
translated: The moon increases by adding one day of death omens each month, due to the divisions of sattva, rajas, and tamas.

original: 'dir khyim gyi 'khor lo dgod pa ni khyim gyi 'khor lo'i rim pa gnyis pa byas nas rim pa dang po la 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag rnams dang / rim pa phyi ma la 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag gi lhag ma'i tshe'i zla ba rnams so //
analyzed: 'dir khyim gyi 'khor lo dgod pa ni khyim gyi 'khor lo'i rim pa gnyis pa byas nas rim pa dang po la 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag rnams dang / rim pa phyi ma la 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag gi lhag ma'i tshe'i zla ba rnams so //
translated: Here, the wheel of houses is set out as follows: having made a second wheel of houses, on the first level are the days of death omens and on the outer level are the months of remaining life, which are the remainder of the days of death omens.

original: de la 'khor lo'i rtsibs dang po la 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag gsum dang / @248a * //
analyzed: de la 'khor lo'i rtsibs dang po la 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag gsum dang / @248a * //
translated: On the first spoke of the wheel are three days of death omens

original: zla ba sum cu'o //
analyzed: zla ba sum cu'o //
translated: and thirty months.

original: rtsibs gnyis pa la 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag drug dang lhag ma tshe'i zla ba nyi shu rtsa bdun no //
analyzed: rtsibs gnyis pa la 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag drug dang lhag ma tshe'i zla ba nyi shu rtsa bdun no //
translated: On the second spoke are six days of death omens and twenty-seven months of remaining life.

original: de bzhin du rtsibs gsum pa la 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag dgu dang de bzhin du zla ba nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rtsibs gsum pa la 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag dgu dang de bzhin du zla ba nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
translated: Similarly, on the third spoke are nine days of death omens and twenty-four months.

original: bzhi pa la nyin zhag bcu gnyis dang / zla ba nyi shu rtsa gcig go //
analyzed: bzhi pa la nyin zhag bcu gnyis dang / zla ba nyi shu rtsa gcig go //
translated: On the fourth are twelve days and twenty-one months.

original: lnga pa la nyin zhag bcva lnga dang / zla ba bcva brgyad do //
analyzed: lnga pa la nyin zhag bcva lnga dang / zla ba bcva brgyad do //
translated: On the fifth, fifteen days and eight months.

original: drug pa la nyin zhag bcva brgyad dang zla ba bcva lnga'o //
analyzed: drug pa la nyin zhag bcva brgyad dang zla ba bcva lnga'o //
translated: On the sixth, eighteen days and fifteen months.

original: bdun pa la nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang zla ba bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: bdun pa la nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang zla ba bcu gnyis so //
translated: On the seventh, twenty-one days and twelve months.

original: brgyad pa la nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang zla ba dgu'o //
analyzed: brgyad pa la nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang zla ba dgu'o //
translated: On the eighth, twenty-four days and nine months.

original: dgu pa la nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun dang zla ba drug go //
analyzed: dgu pa la nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun dang zla ba drug go //
translated: On the ninth, twenty-seven days and six months.

original: bcu pa la nyin zhag sum cu dang zla ba gsum mo //
analyzed: bcu pa la nyin zhag sum cu dang zla ba gsum mo //
translated: On the tenth, thirty days and three months.

original: 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu gcig pa la 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum dang mjug tu zla ba gsum zad pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu gcig pa la 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum dang mjug tu zla ba gsum zad pa'o //
translated: On the eleventh house, thirty-three days and three months.

original: de nas khyim gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs dang po la sngar ma rgyus pa'i nyin zhag gsum po gang yin pa de'i nyin zhag gnyis ni 'dab ma bcu gnyis pa la g-yas kyi rtsa zad pa'i don du g-yas kyi rtsal 'bab bo //
analyzed: de nas khyim gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs dang po la sngar ma rgyus pa'i nyin zhag gsum po gang yin pa de'i nyin zhag gnyis ni 'dab ma bcu gnyis pa la g-yas kyi rtsa zad pa'i don du g-yas kyi rtsal 'bab bo //
translated: Then, on the first spoke of the house wheel, the two days of the three days not previously traversed are traversed on the right channel for the purpose of exhausting the right channel on the twelfth spoke.

original: nyin zhag gcig ni dbugs kyi 'khor lo zad pa'i don du dbu ma aa ba dhu t'i la 'bab po //
analyzed: nyin zhag gcig ni dbugs kyi 'khor lo zad pa'i don du dbu ma aa ba dhu t'i la 'bab po //
translated: One day and night is the falling of the vāyu of the central nāḍī, which is the exhaustion of the vāyu cakras.

original: de nas zla ba'i 'chi ltas kyi g-yon gyi rtsa las srog 'gro ste zla ba'i 'chi ltas kyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zla ba'i 'chi ltas kyi g-yon gyi rtsa las srog 'gro ste zla ba'i 'chi ltas kyi nges pa'o //
translated: Then, the life leaves through the lalanā, which is the certainty of the lunar death omens.

original: da ni lnga nas zhes pa la sogs pas rtsa g-yas pa la nyi ma'i 'chi ltas gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni lnga nas zhes pa la sogs pas rtsa g-yas pa la nyi ma'i 'chi ltas gsungs te /
translated: Now, beginning with “five,” the solar death omens in the right nāḍī are explained.

original: 'dir lus la zla bas nyi ma'i yon tan snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa rnams bzung nas 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag nges par bstan te /
analyzed: 'dir lus la zla bas nyi ma'i yon tan snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa rnams bzung nas 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag nges par bstan te /
translated: Here, the moon takes the qualities of the sun—passion, purity, and darkness—in the body and teaches the certainty of the lunar death omens in one day.

original: nyi mas zla ba'i yon tan sgra dang / reg pa dang / gzugs dang / ro dang / dri rnams bzung nas 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag nges par bstan to //
analyzed: nyi mas zla ba'i yon tan sgra dang / reg pa dang / gzugs dang / ro dang / dri rnams bzung nas 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag nges par bstan to //
translated: The sun takes the qualities of the moon—sound, touch, form, taste, and smell—and teaches the certainty of the solar death omens in one day.

original: khyim lnga'i bar du lnga lhag pa ste lnga pa lngas so //
analyzed: khyim lnga'i bar du lnga lhag pa ste lnga pa lngas so //
translated: Up to the fifth house, there are five days.

original: de nas khyim gnyis ni gcig lhag pas so //
analyzed: de nas khyim gnyis ni gcig lhag pas so //
translated: Then, in two houses, there is one day.

original: de nas rtsa ba nas brtsams nas nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bar du rgyu ste /
analyzed: de nas rtsa ba nas brtsams nas nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bar du rgyu ste /
translated: Then, beginning from the root, the life force moves for thirty-three days.

original: nyin zhag bcva lngas khyim brgyad pa 'dor ro //
analyzed: nyin zhag bcva lngas khyim brgyad pa 'dor ro //
translated: Fifteen days eliminate the eighth house.

original: bcus khyim dgu pa 'dor ro //
analyzed: bcus khyim dgu pa 'dor ro //
translated: Ten days eliminate the ninth house.

original: lngas khyim bcu pa 'dor ro //
analyzed: lngas khyim bcu pa 'dor ro //
translated: Five days eliminate the tenth house.

original: gsum gyis khyim bcu gcig pa 'dor te /
analyzed: gsum gyis khyim bcu gcig pa 'dor te /
translated: Three days eliminate the eleventh house.

original: de ltar na nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum du g-yas kyi rtsa la srog rgyu'o //
analyzed: de ltar na nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum du g-yas kyi rtsa la srog rgyu'o //
translated: Thus, the life force moves in the right channel for thirty-three days.

original: @248b de nas khyim bcu gnyis pa la g-yon gyi rtsa'i khams zad pa'i don du g-yon gyi rtsa las nyin zhag gnyis so /
analyzed: @248b de nas khyim bcu gnyis pa la g-yon gyi rtsa'i khams zad pa'i don du g-yon gyi rtsa las nyin zhag gnyis so /
translated: Then, in the twelfth house, for two days the life force moves in the left channel in order to exhaust the elements of the left channel.

original: dbugs kyi 'khor lo zad pa'i don du dbu ma'i rtsa la nyin zhag gcig ste /
analyzed: dbugs kyi 'khor lo zad pa'i don du dbu ma'i rtsa la nyin zhag gcig ste /
translated: For one day the life force moves in the central channel in order to exhaust the wheel of breath.

original: de nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, death occurs.

original: 'di lta ste mtshams kyi nyin zhag lnga nas nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar du nyin zhag bgrod pa skye ba lnga ni 'phel ba dag gis skye ba ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste mtshams kyi nyin zhag lnga nas nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar du nyin zhag bgrod pa skye ba lnga ni 'phel ba dag gis skye ba ste /
translated: Thus, from the fifth to the twenty-fifth day of the intermediate period, the five days of the ascending path of the life force arise.

original: nyin zhag lnga dang / bcu dang / bcva lnga dang / nyi shu dang / nyi shu rtsa lnga rnams te /
analyzed: nyin zhag lnga dang / bcu dang / bcva lnga dang / nyi shu dang / nyi shu rtsa lnga rnams te /
translated: five, ten, fifteen, twenty, and twenty-five days.

original: skyes pa nas khyim lnga rnams la'o //
analyzed: skyes pa nas khyim lnga rnams la'o //
translated: From birth, these are the five houses.

original: de nas re re lhag pas khyim drug pa dang bdun pa la rim pa bzhin du snying stobs dang rdul zad pa'i don du nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa drug dang nyi shu rtsa bdun no //
analyzed: de nas re re lhag pas khyim drug pa dang bdun pa la rim pa bzhin du snying stobs dang rdul zad pa'i don du nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa drug dang nyi shu rtsa bdun no //
translated: Then, with one day added each time, there are twenty-six and twenty-seven days in the sixth and seventh houses, respectively, for the purpose of exhausting sattva and rajas.

original: de nas dus ni rdzogs par gyur na bcu ni gsum gyis bsgyur bdag khyim brgyad pa dang / dgu pa dang bcu pa la srog rgyu'o //
analyzed: de nas dus ni rdzogs par gyur na bcu ni gsum gyis bsgyur bdag khyim brgyad pa dang / dgu pa dang bcu pa la srog rgyu'o //
translated: Then, when the time is complete, there are ten days in the eighth, ninth, and tenth houses, with three added each time, for the movement of life.

original: de nas bcu gcig pa la gsum lhag pa'i zla bar 'gyur ba ji srid pa nyid do //
analyzed: de nas bcu gcig pa la gsum lhag pa'i zla bar 'gyur ba ji srid pa nyid do //
translated: Then, in the eleventh house, there are the same number of days as the remainder of the month.

original: lo rnams ni 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag gi lhag ma'i lo ste /
analyzed: lo rnams ni 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag gi lhag ma'i lo ste /
translated: The years are the years remaining of the death omens.

original: khyim gyi 'khor lo la skye ba'i khyim la sogs pa'i khyim bcu gnyis po rnams la'o //
analyzed: khyim gyi 'khor lo la skye ba'i khyim la sogs pa'i khyim bcu gnyis po rnams la'o //
translated: The houses are the twelve houses beginning with the house of birth in the wheel of houses.

original: gsum mig zla ba ste skye ba'i khyim la 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag gi lhag ma lo gsum mo //
analyzed: gsum mig zla ba ste skye ba'i khyim la 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag gi lhag ma lo gsum mo //
translated: Three years are the remaining days of the sign of death in the house of birth.

original: gnyis pa la gnyis so //
analyzed: gnyis pa la gnyis so //
translated: Two years are the remaining days of the sign of death in the second house.

original: gsum pa la lo gcig ste 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag gi lhag ma 'tsho ba'i lo rnams so //
analyzed: gsum pa la lo gcig ste 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag gi lhag ma 'tsho ba'i lo rnams so //
translated: One year is the remaining days of the sign of death in the third house.

original: de nas drug gsum zung dang zla ba gang zhes pa ni khyim bzhi pa la zla ba drug po de dag rnams so //
analyzed: de nas drug gsum zung dang zla ba gang zhes pa ni khyim bzhi pa la zla ba drug po de dag rnams so //
translated: Then, the six, three, pair, and month are the six months in the fourth house.

original: lnga pa la zla ba gsum mo //
analyzed: lnga pa la zla ba gsum mo //
translated: Three months are in the fifth house.

original: drug pa la zla ba gnyis so //
analyzed: drug pa la zla ba gnyis so //
translated: Two months are in the sixth house.

original: bdun pa la 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag gi lhag ma 'tsho ba'i zla ba gcig go //
analyzed: bdun pa la 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag gi lhag ma 'tsho ba'i zla ba gcig go //
translated: One month is the remaining days of the sign of death in the seventh house.

original: skye ba'i gnas de nas bdun pa'i gnas ni rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba'i gnas de nas bdun pa'i gnas ni rdzogs pa'o //
translated: From that place of birth, the seventh place is complete.

original: mngal nas skyes pa rnams kyi mngal bzung ba'i zla ba ni chu srin no //
analyzed: mngal nas skyes pa rnams kyi mngal bzung ba'i zla ba ni chu srin no //
translated: The month of conception for those born from a womb is Capricorn.

original: de nas bdun pa ni srog skye ba'i zla ba ste ka rka ta'o //
analyzed: de nas bdun pa ni srog skye ba'i zla ba ste ka rka ta'o //
translated: Then, the seventh is the month of birth of life, Cancer.

original: zla ba'i rtsa 'phel ba yongs su btang ba'i phyir khyim bcu gnyis pa'i mthar slar yang chu srin du 'gyur te /
analyzed: zla ba'i rtsa 'phel ba yongs su btang ba'i phyir khyim bcu gnyis pa'i mthar slar yang chu srin du 'gyur te /
translated: The moon, having completed its waxing, again becomes Makara at the end of the twelfth house.

original: mngal bzung ba nas zla ba bcu gsum pa'o //
analyzed: mngal bzung ba nas zla ba bcu gsum pa'o //
translated: From the time of conception, this is the thirteenth month.

original: de'i phyir ka rka ta ni srog gi skye ba'i gnas te nyi ma kho na'i ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir ka rka ta ni srog gi skye ba'i gnas te nyi ma kho na'i ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, Cancer is the house of life, not the sun alone.

original: de nas 'char te skye ba de nas chu srin 'char ba ste /
analyzed: de nas 'char te skye ba de nas chu srin 'char ba ste /
translated: Then, rising from there, it is Makara.

original: khyim bdun pa @249a * //
analyzed: khyim bdun pa @249a * //
translated: Rising in the seventh house,

original: 'char ba na nyi ma nub pa zhes bya ba rdzogs pa'i dus so //
analyzed: 'char ba na nyi ma nub pa zhes bya ba rdzogs pa'i dus so //
translated: the sun sets, the time of completion.

original: rdzogs pa'i dus de nas srog phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i dus de nas srog phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te /
translated: From that time of completion, life does not return.

original: lha dang / lha ma yin dang / mi rnams kyis lus la brtan par bya bar mi nus so //
analyzed: lha dang / lha ma yin dang / mi rnams kyis lus la brtan par bya bar mi nus so //
translated: It cannot be stabilized in the body by gods, demigods, or humans.

original: mtshan mo'i cha la zla ba 'char ba'i dus zhes pa la zla ba 'char ba zhes bya ba ni khu ba'i khams la 'chi ba 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan mo'i cha la zla ba 'char ba'i dus zhes pa la zla ba 'char ba zhes bya ba ni khu ba'i khams la 'chi ba 'jug pa'o //
translated: In the part of the night, the time of the moon rising, the moon rising is the entry of death into the element of semen.

original: 'chi ba 'char ba yin gyi khu ba'i khams ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'chi ba 'char ba yin gyi khu ba'i khams ni ma yin te /
translated: Death is rising, not the element of semen.

original: 'chi ltas kyi rlung zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'chi ltas kyi rlung zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the wind of the sign of death has entered.

original: rdzogs pa'i dus de nas khu ba zad pa'i don du rtsa g-yas pa la srog nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum rgyu'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i dus de nas khu ba zad pa'i don du rtsa g-yas pa la srog nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum rgyu'o //
translated: From that time of completion, for the sake of the exhaustion of semen, the life-force moves in the right channel for thirty-three days.

original: de nas rtsa g-yon pa la nyin zhag gnyis dang / rtsa dbu ma la nyin zhag gcig ste /
analyzed: de nas rtsa g-yon pa la nyin zhag gnyis dang / rtsa dbu ma la nyin zhag gcig ste /
translated: Then, for two days in the left channel, and for one day in the central channel.

original: 'tsho ba'i nyin zhag lhag ma ni tshes zhes pa bco lnga dang / phyogs zhes pa bcu dang / mda' zhes pa lnga dang / yon tan zhes pa gsum dang / gnyis zhes pa gnyis dang / nyin zhag gcig ste /
analyzed: 'tsho ba'i nyin zhag lhag ma ni tshes zhes pa bco lnga dang / phyogs zhes pa bcu dang / mda' zhes pa lnga dang / yon tan zhes pa gsum dang / gnyis zhes pa gnyis dang / nyin zhag gcig ste /
translated: The remaining days of life are the fifteen “lunar days,” the ten “directions,” the five “arrows,” the three “virtues,” the two “twos,” and one “day.”

original: nyi ma'i 'chi ltas la bshad pa gcig gi nges pa'o //
analyzed: nyi ma'i 'chi ltas la bshad pa gcig gi nges pa'o //
translated: This is the first explanation of the signs of death of the sun.

original: da ni rang gi gnas nas zhes pa la sogs pas bshad pa gnyis pa gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni rang gi gnas nas zhes pa la sogs pas bshad pa gnyis pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, the second explanation is stated by “from one’s own place,” and so on.

original: 'dir lus kyi lte ba'i padma la rtsa bcu gnyis kyi bdag nyid can khyim gyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: 'dir lus kyi lte ba'i padma la rtsa bcu gnyis kyi bdag nyid can khyim gyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: Here, the wheel of houses is the twelve channels in the navel lotus of the body.

original: de la skye ba'i gnas ni khyim dang po'i rtsa ste /
analyzed: de la skye ba'i gnas ni khyim dang po'i rtsa ste /
translated: The place of birth is the channel of the first house.

original: mngal nas skyes pa'i byis pa'i dus sbyor gang yin pa de nyid glang la sogs pa mnyam pa'i rtsa'i rang bzhin can no //
analyzed: mngal nas skyes pa'i byis pa'i dus sbyor gang yin pa de nyid glang la sogs pa mnyam pa'i rtsa'i rang bzhin can no //
translated: The period of the child born from the womb is the same as that of the elephant and so on, which is the nature of the equalizing nāḍī.
